exampleZh: 為了安全起見，下陡峭樓梯時請握住扶手。

exampleEn: A firm handshake is often considered a sign of confidence and professionalism.
exampleZh: 堅定的握手通常被認為是自信和專業的標誌。

exampleEn: The handsome young actor has become very popular among teenage fans recently.
exampleZh: 這位英俊的年輕演員最近在青少年粉絲中變得非常受歡迎。

exampleEn: The doctor's handwriting was so messy that the pharmacist couldn't read prescription clearly.
exampleZh: 醫生的筆跡太凌亂，藥劑師無法清楚閱讀處方。

exampleEn: It's always handy to keep a flashlight nearby in case of power outages.
exampleZh: 在停電時隨時準備手電筒總是很方便的。

exampleEn: Please hang your coat on the hook by the door when you arrive.
exampleZh: 你到達時請把外套掛在門邊的掛鉤上。

exampleEn: There is a beautiful painting hanging on the wall in the living room.
exampleZh: 客廳的牆上掛著一幅美麗的畫。

exampleEn: Accidents can happen when people don't follow safety rules carefully and properly.
exampleZh: 當人們不仔細適當地遵守安全規則時，事故可能會發生。

exampleEn: The children played happily in the park all afternoon without any problems.
exampleZh: 孩子們整個下午在公園裡快樂地玩耍，沒有任何問題。

exampleEn: True happiness comes from meaningful relationships rather than material possessions and wealth.
exampleZh: 真正的幸福來自有意義的關係，而不是物質財富。

exampleEn: I'm so happy that you could join us for the celebration tonight.
exampleZh: 我很高興你今晚能加入我們的慶祝活動。

exampleEn: The harbor was filled with fishing boats returning from the sea with catch.
exampleZh: 港口擠滿了從海上帶著漁獲歸來的漁船。

exampleEn: Mathematics can be hard for some students but practice makes it easier.
exampleZh: 數學對某些學生來說可能很難，但練習會使它變得更容易。

exampleEn: Back up your important files to an external hard drive regularly to prevent loss.
exampleZh: 定期將重要文件備份到外部硬碟以防止丟失。

exampleEn: I can hardly hear what you're saying because the music is too loud.
exampleZh: 我幾乎聽不到你在說什麼，因為音樂太大聲了。

exampleEn: The family endured great hardship during the war but survived together courageously.
exampleZh: 這個家庭在戰爭期間忍受了巨大的艱難，但勇敢地一起倖存下來。

exampleEn: The computer hardware needs upgrading to run the latest software programs efficiently.
exampleZh: 電腦硬體需要升級才能有效運行最新的軟體程式。

exampleEn: She is a hard-working student who always gets good grades in her exams.
exampleZh: 她是一個勤奮的學生，考試總是用功並取得好成績。

exampleEn: Smoking can cause serious harm to your health and should be avoided completely.
exampleZh: 吸菸會對你的健康造成嚴重傷害，應該完全避免。

exampleEn: Excessive exposure to sunlight can be harmful to your skin over time.
exampleZh: 長時間過度暴露在陽光下可能會對你的皮膚有害。

exampleEn: The snake looks scary but is actually completely harmless to humans and pets.
exampleZh: 這條蛇看起來很可怕，但實際上對人類和寵物完全無害。

exampleEn: The choir sang in perfect harmony creating beautiful music that moved the audience.
exampleZh: 合唱團完美和諧地歌唱，創造出感動觀眾的美妙音樂。

exampleEn: The climber checked his safety harness before starting the ascent up the mountain.
exampleZh: 登山者在開始登山之前檢查了他的安全帶。

exampleEn: The farmer used a harrow to break up the soil after plowing fields.
exampleZh: 農民在犁田後用耙子打碎土壤。

exampleEn: Farmers work hard during harvest season to gather crops before winter arrives soon.
exampleZh: 農民在收穫季節努力工作，在冬天很快到來之前收集農作物。

exampleEn: She has three children who all attend the same school nearby together.
exampleZh: 她有三個孩子，他們都一起在附近的同一所學校上學。

exampleEn: In your haste to leave, you forgot to lock the front door.
exampleZh: 在你匆忙離開時，你忘了鎖前門。

exampleEn: He hastily packed his bags and left for the airport to catch flight.
exampleZh: 他匆忙收拾行李，前往機場趕飛機。

exampleEn: Don't make a hasty decision; take time to think about all options.
exampleZh: 不要做出草率的決定；花時間思考所有選項。

exampleEn: Don't forget to wear a hat to protect yourself from the sun.
exampleZh: 別忘了戴帽子以保護自己免受陽光照射。

exampleEn: The baby birds will hatch from their eggs in about two weeks.
exampleZh: 小鳥將在大約兩週內從蛋中孵化出來。

exampleEn: The children watched excitedly as the eggs started hatching in the incubator.
exampleZh: 孩子們興奮地看著雞蛋在孵化器中開始孵化。

exampleEn: I hate getting up early in the morning especially on cold winter days.
exampleZh: 我討厭早起，尤其是在寒冷的冬天。

exampleEn: Hatred and prejudice have no place in a civilized society that values equality.
exampleZh: 仇恨和偏見在重視平等的文明社會中沒有立足之地。

exampleEn: The old house is rumored to be haunted by spirits of former owners.
exampleZh: 據傳這座老房子出沒著前任主人的靈魂。

exampleEn: The melody was beautiful but haunting, staying in my mind for days.
exampleZh: 這旋律很美但令人難忘，在我的腦海中停留了幾天。

exampleEn: We have to finish this project before the deadline next Friday afternoon.
exampleZh: 我們必須在下週五下午的截止日期前完成這個專案。

exampleEn: I have to finish this assignment before I can go out with friends.
exampleZh: 我必須先完成這項作業，然後才能和朋友出去。

exampleEn: The park is a quiet haven in the middle of the busy city.
exampleZh: 公園是繁忙城市中寧靜的避風港。

exampleEn: The farmer stored hay in the barn to feed the animals during winter.
exampleZh: 農民在穀倉裡儲存乾草以在冬天餵養動物。

exampleEn: Slippery floors are a potential safety hazard that should be addressed immediately.
exampleZh: 滑溜的地板是潛在的安全隱患，應立即處理。

exampleEn: Chemical waste is hazardous to the environment and must be disposed of properly.
exampleZh: 化學廢物對環境有害，必須妥善處理。

exampleEn: He is my best friend who has always supported me through everything.
exampleZh: 他是我最好的朋友，一直在一切事情上支持我。

exampleEn: I have a terrible headache and need to lie down for a while.
exampleZh: 我頭痛得很厲害，需要躺一會兒。

exampleEn: Stress and lack of sleep often cause headaches that can be quite painful.
exampleZh: 壓力和睡眠不足經常導致可能相當痛苦的頭痛。

exampleEn: The shocking headline grabbed everyone's attention on the front page this morning.
exampleZh: 今天早上頭版上令人震驚的標題吸引了所有人的注意。

exampleEn: He put on his headphones to listen to music without disturbing others.
exampleZh: 他戴上耳機聽音樂，以免打擾他人。

exampleEn: The company's headquarters are located in downtown Manhattan near Central Park beautifully.
exampleZh: 公司總部位於曼哈頓市中心中央公園附近，環境優美。

exampleEn: The headteacher is responsible for the overall management of the school and staff.
exampleZh: 校長負責學校和教職員工的整體管理。

exampleEn: The wound will take several weeks to heal completely with proper care.
exampleZh: 傷口需要幾週時間才能在適當護理下完全癒合。

exampleEn: Rest and proper nutrition are essential for the body's natural healing process.
exampleZh: 休息和適當的營養對於身體的自然癒合過程至關重要。

exampleEn: Regular exercise and healthy eating are essential for maintaining good health always.
exampleZh: 定期運動和健康飲食對於始終保持健康至關重要。

exampleEn: Access to affordable health care is a fundamental right for all citizens.
exampleZh: 獲得負擔得起的醫療保健是所有公民的基本權利。

exampleEn: Eating a healthy balanced diet helps prevent many chronic diseases effectively over time.
exampleZh: 吃健康均衡的飲食有助於隨著時間有效預防許多慢性疾病。

exampleEn: There was a huge heap of dirty laundry piled on the floor.
exampleZh: 地板上堆著一大堆髒衣服。

exampleEn: I can hear music playing softly from the apartment next door right now.
exampleZh: 我現在能聽到隔壁公寓輕輕播放的音樂。

exampleEn: His hearing has deteriorated with age and he needs a hearing aid now.
exampleZh: 他的聽力隨著年齡惡化，現在需要助聽器。

exampleEn: The heart pumps blood throughout the body continuously every single day without stopping.
exampleZh: 心臟每天不停地持續將血液泵送到全身。

exampleEn: Regular exercise and a healthy diet can reduce the risk of heart attack.
exampleZh: 定期運動和健康飲食可以降低心臟病發作的風險。

exampleEn: It was heartbreaking to see the devastation caused by the earthquake on news.
exampleZh: 在新聞上看到地震造成的破壞令人心碎。

exampleEn: She is a kind-hearted person who always helps those in need willingly.
exampleZh: 她是一個心地善良的人，總是樂意幫助有需要的人。

exampleEn: The movie tells a heartwarming story about friendship and loyalty overcoming obstacles.
exampleZh: 這部電影講述了一個關於友誼和忠誠克服障礙的感人故事。

exampleEn: We enjoyed a hearty breakfast of eggs, bacon, and toast before the hike.
exampleZh: 在健行之前，我們享用了豐盛的雞蛋、培根和吐司早餐。

exampleEn: The intense summer heat made it uncomfortable to work outside during daytime.
exampleZh: 強烈的夏季高溫使得白天在戶外工作很不舒服。

exampleEn: Turn on the heater because it's getting very cold in here tonight.
exampleZh: 打開暖氣，因為今晚這裡變得非常冷。

exampleEn: The central heating system keeps the house warm and comfortable during winter.
exampleZh: 中央供暖系統在冬天保持房子溫暖舒適。

exampleEn: Many religions teach that good people go to heaven after they die.
exampleZh: 許多宗教教導好人死後會去天堂。

exampleEn: The dessert tasted heavenly with its rich chocolate flavor and creamy texture.
exampleZh: 這道甜點味道極佳，有濃郁的巧克力味和奶油質地。

exampleEn: It rained heavily all night causing flooding in several low-lying areas nearby.
exampleZh: 整夜下大雨，導致附近幾個低窪地區淹水。

exampleEn: The box is too heavy for me to lift alone without help.
exampleZh: 這個箱子太重了，我一個人無法搬動，需要幫助。

exampleEn: A tall hedge surrounds the garden, providing privacy from the street view.
exampleZh: 高高的樹籬環繞著花園，提供街道視野的隱私。

exampleEn: She twisted her ankle and hurt her heel while running in the park.
exampleZh: 她在公園跑步時扭傷了腳踝並傷到了腳跟。

exampleEn: The height of Mount Everest is approximately 8,849 meters above sea level.
exampleZh: 珠穆朗瑪峰的高度約為海拔八千八百四十九公尺。

exampleEn: The rescue helicopter airlifted injured climbers from the mountain safely to hospital.
exampleZh: 救援直升機將受傷的登山者從山上安全空運到醫院。

exampleEn: The soldiers described the battlefield as hell with constant danger and death.
exampleZh: 士兵們將戰場描述為地獄，充滿持續的危險和死亡。

exampleEn: Hello! It's nice to meet you for the first time today.
exampleZh: 你好！很高興今天第一次見到你。

exampleEn: Always wear a helmet when riding a motorcycle for safety and protection.
exampleZh: 騎摩托車時始終戴頭盔以確保安全和保護。

exampleEn: Can you help me carry these heavy bags to the car please?
exampleZh: 你能幫我把這些重袋子搬到車上嗎？

exampleEn: My little sister loves being a helper in the kitchen when mom cooks.
exampleZh: 我妹妹喜歡在媽媽做飯時在廚房幫忙。

exampleEn: The librarian was very helpful in finding the books I needed for research.
exampleZh: 圖書館員在幫我找到研究所需的書籍方面非常有幫助。

exampleEn: The baby bird looked helpless after falling from its nest high above.
exampleZh: 小鳥從高處的巢中掉下來後看起來很無助。

exampleEn: Hemp fibers are used to make rope, paper, and durable clothing fabrics.
exampleZh: 大麻纖維用於製造繩索、紙張和耐用的服裝面料。

exampleEn: I gave her the book she wanted to borrow from the library.
exampleZh: 我把她想從圖書館借的書給了她。

exampleEn: Fresh herbs like basil and rosemary add wonderful flavor to Italian dishes.
exampleZh: 像羅勒和迷迭香這樣的新鮮香草為義大利菜餚增添了美妙的風味。

exampleEn: A large herd of cattle grazed peacefully in the green meadow yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天一大群牛在綠色草地上平靜地吃草。

exampleEn: Please come here and help me move this heavy furniture right now.
exampleZh: 請過來這裡幫我搬這個沉重的家具。

exampleEn: We should be proud of our cultural heritage and preserve it for future.
exampleZh: 我們應該為我們的文化遺產感到自豪，並為未來保存它。

exampleEn: The firefighter was hailed as a hero for rescuing children from burning building.
exampleZh: 這位消防員因從燃燒的建築物中救出孩子而被譽為英雄。

exampleEn: That beautiful red car parked outside is hers, not mine at all.
exampleZh: 停在外面那輛漂亮的紅色汽車是她的，根本不是我的。

exampleEn: She taught herself to play piano without any formal lessons or teachers.
exampleZh: 她在沒有任何正式課程或老師的情況下自學彈鋼琴。

exampleEn: Don't hesitate to ask for help when you need it from others.
exampleZh: 當你需要時，不要猶豫向他人尋求幫助。

exampleEn: Without hesitation, she jumped into the water to save the drowning child.
exampleZh: 她毫不猶豫地跳進水裡救溺水的孩子。

exampleEn: Hey, do you want to come to the movies with us tonight?
exampleZh: 嘿，你今晚想和我們一起去看電影嗎？

exampleEn: Hi! How are you doing today? It's been a long time!
exampleZh: 嗨！你今天好嗎？好久不見了！

exampleEn: The treasure was hidden in a secret cave deep within the forest.
exampleZh: 寶藏藏在森林深處的一個秘密洞穴裡。

exampleEn: The children love to hide and seek in the backyard during summer.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在夏天在後院玩捉迷藏。

exampleEn: The mountain peak is so high that climbers need oxygen to reach summit.
exampleZh: 山峰如此之高，登山者需要氧氣才能到達頂峰。

exampleEn: After graduating from high school, she plans to attend university to study law.
exampleZh: 高中畢業後，她計畫上大學學習法律。

exampleEn: The concert's highlight was the surprise appearance by a famous guest singer.
exampleZh: 音樂會的亮點是一位著名客座歌手的驚喜出現。

exampleEn: She is highly respected in her field for groundbreaking research and discoveries.
exampleZh: 她因開創性的研究和發現在她的領域受到高度尊重。

exampleEn: The new factory uses high-tech equipment to increase production efficiency significantly.
exampleZh: 新工廠使用高科技設備顯著提高生產效率。

exampleEn: The new highway will reduce travel time between the two cities significantly.
exampleZh: 新高速公路將顯著減少兩個城市之間的旅行時間。

exampleEn: Terrorists attempted to hijack the plane, but security forces intervened successfully.
exampleZh: 恐怖分子試圖劫持飛機，但安全部隊成功干預。

exampleEn: We plan to hike up the mountain trail early tomorrow morning together.
exampleZh: 我們計畫明天一早一起沿著山路健行。

exampleEn: Hiking in the mountains is a great way to exercise and enjoy nature.
exampleZh: 在山上健行是鍛煉身體和享受大自然的好方法。

exampleEn: The comedian told hilarious jokes that kept the audience laughing all night.
exampleZh: 喜劇演員講了令人捧腹的笑話，讓觀眾整晚大笑。

exampleEn: The house sits on top of a hill with beautiful views all around.
exampleZh: 房子坐落在山頂上，周圍景色優美。

exampleEn: I saw him at the store yesterday but didn't get chance to talk.
exampleZh: 我昨天在商店看到他，但沒有機會交談。

exampleEn: He taught himself programming by watching online tutorials and practicing daily consistently.
exampleZh: 他通過觀看線上教程並每天持續練習自學程式設計。

exampleEn: The teacher gave us a helpful hint about the answer to difficult question.
exampleZh: 老師給了我們一個有用的提示，關於困難問題的答案。

exampleEn: She broke her hip in a fall and needed surgery immediately.
exampleZh: 她在跌倒中摔斷了髖部，需要立即手術。

exampleEn: Hip hop culture includes music, dance, and art that originated in cities.
exampleZh: 嘻哈文化包括起源於城市的音樂、舞蹈和藝術。

exampleEn: The company plans to hire fifty new employees next month for expansion.
exampleZh: 公司計畫下個月為擴張僱用五十名新員工。

exampleEn: That's his backpack on the chair over there by the window.
exampleZh: 那是他的背包，在窗邊那邊的椅子上。

exampleEn: The historian spent years researching ancient civilizations and their cultures extensively.
exampleZh: 這位歷史學家花了多年時間廣泛研究古代文明及其文化。

exampleEn: The historic building has been preserved as a museum for future generations.
exampleZh: 這座歷史建築已被保存為博物館供後代參觀。

exampleEn: The novel is based on historical events that occurred during World War II.
exampleZh: 這部小說基於第二次世界大戰期間發生的歷史事件。

exampleEn: Studying history helps us understand the present and learn from past mistakes.
exampleZh: 學習歷史幫助我們了解現在並從過去的錯誤中學習。

exampleEn: The baseball player hit a home run in the final inning yesterday.
exampleZh: 這位棒球選手昨天在最後一局打出了全壘打。

exampleEn: Medical advances have made it possible for people with HIV to live long lives.
exampleZh: 醫學進步使愛滋病毒感染者能夠長壽。

exampleEn: Photography is my favorite hobby and I practice it every weekend regularly.
exampleZh: 攝影是我最喜歡的嗜好，我每個週末都定期練習。

exampleEn: Ice hockey is extremely popular in Canada and many northern countries worldwide.
exampleZh: 冰上曲棍球在加拿大和全球許多北方國家極受歡迎。

exampleEn: Please hold the door open for the people carrying heavy boxes behind.
exampleZh: 請為後面搬著重箱子的人開著門。

exampleEn: Please place your passport in the document holder for safekeeping while traveling.
exampleZh: 旅行時請將護照放在文件夾中妥善保管。

exampleEn: There's a large hole in the road that needs repairing soon.
exampleZh: 路上有一個大洞，需要盡快修理。

exampleEn: We're planning a family holiday to Europe next summer for two weeks.
exampleZh: 我們計畫明年夏天去歐洲度假兩週。

exampleEn: The old tree trunk was hollow inside and provided shelter for animals.
exampleZh: 這棵老樹幹內部是空心的，為動物提供了庇護所。

exampleEn: The museum is dedicated to the victims of the Holocaust during World War II.
exampleZh: 該博物館致力於紀念第二次世界大戰期間大屠殺的受害者。

exampleEn: Jerusalem is considered a holy city by three major world religions today.
exampleZh: 耶路撒冷今天被三大世界宗教視為聖城。

exampleEn: There's no place like home where you feel safe and comfortable always.
exampleZh: 沒有地方像家一樣讓你總是感到安全和舒適。

exampleEn: The city is working to provide shelter for homeless people during winter.
exampleZh: 這座城市正在努力為無家可歸的人在冬天提供庇護所。

exampleEn: I visit my hometown every year during holidays to see family and friends.
exampleZh: 我每年假期都會回家鄉看望家人和朋友。

exampleEn: After a long journey, the weary travelers began their homeward journey finally.
exampleZh: 漫長的旅程後，疲憊的旅行者終於開始了回家的旅程。

exampleEn: Students should complete their homework before watching television or playing games tonight.
exampleZh: 學生應該在今晚看電視或玩遊戲之前完成作業。

exampleEn: He practices every day to hone his skills and become a better musician.
exampleZh: 他每天練習以磨練技能並成為更好的音樂家。

exampleEn: Being honest is important even when telling the truth might be difficult.
exampleZh: 即使說實話可能很困難，誠實也很重要。

exampleEn: Honestly, I don't think this plan will work as well as expected.
exampleZh: 老實說，我認為這個計畫不會像預期的那樣有效。

exampleEn: Honesty is the foundation of trust in any relationship between people always.
exampleZh: 誠實始終是人與人之間任何關係中信任的基礎。

exampleEn: Add a spoonful of honey to your tea for natural sweetness and flavor.
exampleZh: 在你的茶中加一勺蜂蜜以獲得天然的甜味和風味。

exampleEn: The newlyweds went to Hawaii for their honeymoon and enjoyed the beaches.
exampleZh: 新婚夫婦去夏威夷度蜜月，享受海灘。

exampleEn: It's a great honor to receive this award from such prestigious organization.
exampleZh: 從如此有聲望的組織獲得這個獎項是一項巨大的榮譽。

exampleEn: He lived an honorable life dedicated to serving others and helping community.
exampleZh: 他過著光榮的生活，致力於為他人服務和幫助社區。

exampleEn: Pull up your hood to keep your head dry in the rain.
exampleZh: 拉起你的兜帽以在雨中保持頭部乾燥。

exampleEn: Hang your jacket on the hook by the door when you come in.
exampleZh: 你進來時把外套掛在門邊的掛鉤上。

exampleEn: The rabbit can hop quickly across the field to escape from predators.
exampleZh: 兔子可以快速跳過田野以逃避捕食者。

exampleEn: I hope you have a wonderful time on your vacation next week.
exampleZh: 我希望你下週假期玩得愉快。

exampleEn: Despite setbacks, she remained hopeful that things would improve soon eventually.
exampleZh: 儘管遭遇挫折，她仍然抱有希望，相信事情最終會很快改善。

exampleEn: Hopefully, the weather will be nice for our outdoor wedding ceremony tomorrow.
exampleZh: 希望明天我們的戶外婚禮天氣會很好。

exampleEn: The situation seemed hopeless until unexpected help arrived just in time.
exampleZh: 情況似乎毫無希望，直到意外的幫助及時到來。

exampleEn: The sun slowly disappeared below the horizon as evening approached peacefully tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚隨著夜幕平靜降臨，太陽慢慢消失在地平線下。

exampleEn: The car horn blared loudly warning pedestrians to move out of way.
exampleZh: 汽車喇叭大聲鳴響，警告行人讓開。

exampleEn: The food at that restaurant was absolutely horrible and we left early.
exampleZh: 那家餐廳的食物絕對糟糕，我們提前離開了。

exampleEn: The gruesome details of the crime horrified everyone who heard them.
exampleZh: 犯罪的可怕細節讓每個聽到的人都感到恐懼。

exampleEn: She watched in horror as the car crashed into the building ahead.
exampleZh: 她驚恐地看著汽車撞向前面的建築物。

exampleEn: The horse galloped across the field with grace and power beautifully yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天這匹馬優雅而有力地美麗地奔馳過田野。

exampleEn: The hospice provides care and comfort for terminally ill patients in their final days.
exampleZh: 臨終關懷醫院為晚期病人在最後的日子裡提供護理和安慰。

exampleEn: The local people were very hospitable and welcomed us into their homes.
exampleZh: 當地人非常好客，歡迎我們到他們家。

exampleEn: The new hospital has state-of-the-art equipment and highly trained medical staff.
exampleZh: 這家新醫院擁有最先進的設備和訓練有素的醫療人員。

exampleEn: Thank you for your warm hospitality during our stay in your city.
exampleZh: 感謝您在我們入住貴市期間的熱情款待。

exampleEn: He had to be hospitalized after the accident due to severe injuries.
exampleZh: 事故發生後，由於受傷嚴重，他不得不住院。

exampleEn: Our host made us feel welcome and comfortable throughout our entire stay.
exampleZh: 我們的主人在我們整個住宿期間讓我們感到受歡迎和舒適。

exampleEn: Backpackers often stay in a youth hostel because it is cheap and social.
exampleZh: 背包客經常住在青年旅館，因為它既便宜又適合社交。

exampleEn: It's extremely hot today, so remember to drink plenty of water regularly.
exampleZh: 今天非常熱，所以記得定期喝大量的水。

exampleEn: We booked a hotel room near the beach for our summer vacation.
exampleZh: 我們為暑假在海灘附近預訂了一間飯店房間。

exampleEn: The meeting lasted for over three hours without any breaks at all.
exampleZh: 會議持續了三個多小時，完全沒有任何休息。

exampleEn: The employees are paid on an hourly basis for their work at the cafe.
exampleZh: 員工在咖啡館的工作是按小時計酬的。

exampleEn: They bought a beautiful house in the suburbs with a large backyard.
exampleZh: 他們在郊區買了一棟有大後院的漂亮房子。

exampleEn: Household chores should be shared equally among all family members fairly always.
exampleZh: 家務應該始終在所有家庭成員之間公平分擔。

exampleEn: The housekeeper cleans the rooms and changes the linens every morning.
exampleZh: 管家每天早上打掃房間並更換床單。

exampleEn: The housemaster is responsible for the welfare of students in the dormitory.
exampleZh: 舍監負責宿舍學生的福利。

exampleEn: The traditional role of housewife has changed significantly in modern society today.
exampleZh: 家庭主婦的傳統角色在今天的現代社會中發生了顯著變化。

exampleEn: Doing housework together as a family can be fun and builds teamwork.
exampleZh: 作為一家人一起做家務可以很有趣並建立團隊合作。

exampleEn: The helicopter hovered over the rescue site to lower the medical team.
exampleZh: 直升機在救援現場上空盤旋，放下醫療隊。

exampleEn: How did you manage to finish all that work so quickly today?
exampleZh: 你今天是怎麼設法這麼快完成所有工作的？

exampleEn: The plan sounds good; however, we need to consider the costs carefully.
exampleZh: 這個計畫聽起來不錯；然而，我們需要仔細考慮成本。

exampleEn: She gave her mother a warm hug when they met at airport.
exampleZh: 當他們在機場見面時，她給了母親一個溫暖的擁抱。

exampleEn: The company made a huge profit this year exceeding all expectations greatly.
exampleZh: 公司今年獲得了巨大的利潤，大大超出了所有預期。

exampleEn: The new product was hugely successful and sold out within days of release.
exampleZh: 新產品非常成功，發布後幾天內就售罄了。

exampleEn: Understanding human behavior is essential for psychologists and social workers everywhere.
exampleZh: 了解人類行為對於各地的心理學家和社會工作者至關重要。

exampleEn: Advocating for human rights is essential for creating a just and fair society.
exampleZh: 倡導人權對於建立公正公平的社會至關重要。

exampleEn: We must treat animals in a humane way and prevent unnecessary suffering.
exampleZh: 我們必須以人道的方式對待動物，防止不必要的痛苦。

exampleEn: As a humanist, she believes in the value and agency of human beings.
exampleZh: 作為一名人道主義者，她相信人類的價值和能動性。

exampleEn: We should show compassion and humanity towards those who are less fortunate.
exampleZh: 我們應該對那些不幸的人表現出同情和人性。

exampleEn: The author tries to humanize the villain by explaining his tragic background.
exampleZh: 作者試圖通過解釋反派的悲慘背景來使其人性化。

exampleEn: Despite his success, he remained humble and kind to everyone around him.
exampleZh: 儘管他很成功，他仍然對周圍的每個人保持謙遜和善良。

exampleEn: The old man dismissed the holiday festivities saying it was all humbug.
exampleZh: 老人駁回了節日慶祝活動，說這都是騙人的。

exampleEn: The weather is hot and humid making it uncomfortable to be outside.
exampleZh: 天氣又熱又潮濕，讓人在外面很不舒服。

exampleEn: He didn't mean to humiliate her in front of her colleagues during the meeting.
exampleZh: 他無意在會議期間在同事面前羞辱她。

exampleEn: It was a humiliating experience to trip and fall on stage during the performance.
exampleZh: 在表演期間在舞台上絆倒是一次丟臉的經歷。

exampleEn: She suffered the humiliation of being fired publicly for a mistake she didn't make.
exampleZh: 她遭受了因她沒有犯的錯誤而被公開解僱的羞辱。

exampleEn: A good sense of humor helps people cope with stress and difficulties.
exampleZh: 良好的幽默感幫助人們應對壓力和困難。

exampleEn: His humorous stories always make everyone laugh and feel happy at parties.
exampleZh: 他幽默的故事總是讓每個人在派對上笑並感到快樂。

exampleEn: Over one hundred people attended the charity event last night successfully together.
exampleZh: 昨晚超過一百人成功一起參加了慈善活動。

exampleEn: Millions of children suffer from hunger and malnutrition in developing countries daily.
exampleZh: 發展中國家每天有數百萬兒童遭受飢餓和營養不良。

exampleEn: I'm so hungry that I could eat a whole pizza by myself.
exampleZh: 我太餓了，我可以自己吃掉整個披薩。

exampleEn: Lions hunt in groups to catch large prey on the African plains.
exampleZh: 獅子在非洲平原上成群狩獵以捕捉大型獵物。

exampleEn: The experienced hunter tracked the deer through the forest patiently for hours.
exampleZh: 經驗豐富的獵人耐心地在森林中追蹤鹿好幾個小時。

exampleEn: Hunting for sport is controversial causing debate between conservationists and hunters.
exampleZh: 為了運動而狩獵是有爭議的，引起了環保主義者和獵人之間的爭論。

exampleEn: They hurriedly packed their bags when they realized they were late for the train.
exampleZh: 當他們意識到趕不上火車時，他們匆忙收拾行李。

exampleEn: We need to hurry or we'll miss the train that leaves soon.
exampleZh: 我們需要趕快，否則我們會錯過即將離開的火車。

exampleEn: I hurt my knee playing basketball and need to rest for weeks.
exampleZh: 我打籃球時傷了膝蓋，需要休息幾週。

exampleEn: Her husband is a doctor who works long hours at the hospital.
exampleZh: 她的丈夫是一名在醫院長時間工作的醫生。

exampleEn: A hush fell over the crowd as the speaker walked onto the stage.
exampleZh: 當演講者走上舞台時，人群安靜了下來。

exampleEn: The small wooden hut provided shelter from the storm last night safely.
exampleZh: 這間小木屋昨晚安全地提供了躲避風暴的庇護所。

exampleEn: Hybrid cars use both gasoline and electricity to improve fuel efficiency significantly.
exampleZh: 混合動力汽車同時使用汽油和電力來顯著提高燃油效率。

exampleEn: Good personal hygiene helps prevent the spread of germs and diseases effectively.
exampleZh: 良好的個人衛生有助於有效防止細菌和疾病的傳播。

exampleEn: The politician's speech was full of hyperbole, exaggerating his achievements.
exampleZh: 這位政治家的演講充滿了誇張，誇大了他的成就。

exampleEn: Use a hyphen to connect compound words like 'well-known' and 'part-time'.
exampleZh: 使用連字號連接復合詞，如“著名的”和“兼職的”。

exampleEn: I love spending time with my family on weekends and holidays always.
exampleZh: 我總是喜歡在週末和假期與家人共度時光。

exampleEn: The ice on the lake is thick enough for skating safely now.
exampleZh: 湖上的冰現在足夠厚，可以安全滑冰了。

exampleEn: Chocolate ice cream is my favorite dessert especially during hot summer days.
exampleZh: 巧克力冰淇淋是我最喜歡的甜點，尤其是在炎熱的夏天。

exampleEn: Ice hockey is a fast and physical sport played on a frozen rink.
exampleZh: 冰球是在冰凍溜冰場上進行的一項快速且充滿身體對抗的運動。

exampleEn: We went ice skating at the outdoor rink in the park last night.
exampleZh: 我們昨晚去公園的戶外溜冰場溜冰。

exampleEn: The discovery of the ancient iceman provided insights into prehistoric life.
exampleZh: 古代冰人的發現提供了對史前生活的見解。

exampleEn: Click on the icon to open the application on your computer desktop.
exampleZh: 點擊圖標在電腦桌面上打開應用程式。

exampleEn: The roads are icy this morning, so drive very carefully and slowly.
exampleZh: 今天早上道路結冰，所以要非常小心緩慢地開車。

exampleEn: Please show your ID card to security personnel before entering the building.
exampleZh: 進入大樓前請向保全人員出示身分證。

exampleEn: You need a valid ID card to open a bank account in this country.
exampleZh: 你需要有效的身分證才能在這個國家開立銀行賬戶。

exampleEn: That's a brilliant idea that could solve our problem completely and effectively.
exampleZh: 那是一個絕妙的主意，可以完全有效地解決我們的問題。

exampleEn: In an ideal world, everyone would have access to quality education and healthcare.
exampleZh: 在理想的世界中，每個人都能獲得優質的教育和醫療保健。

exampleEn: Ideally, we should finish the project by Friday so we can relax on weekend.
exampleZh: 理想情況下，我們應該在週五前完成專案，這樣我們週末就可以放鬆。

exampleEn: The twins look so identical that even their parents sometimes confuse them.
exampleZh: 這對雙胞胎看起來如此相同，甚至他們的父母有時也會混淆。

exampleEn: Please bring proper identification such as passport or driver's license to the interview.
exampleZh: 請攜帶適當的身份證明，如護照或駕照到面試。

exampleEn: Scientists are working to identify the cause of the mysterious disease outbreak.
exampleZh: 科學家正在努力確定神秘疾病爆發的原因。

exampleEn: Protecting your identity online is crucial in today's digital age with cyber threats.
exampleZh: 在當今充滿網路威脅的數位時代，保護你的線上身份至關重要。

exampleEn: The police officer asked to see his identity card to verify who he was.
exampleZh: 警察要求查看他的身分證以核實他是誰。

exampleEn: The political party's ideology focuses on social equality and economic justice.
exampleZh: 該政黨的意識形態側重於社會平等和經濟正義。

exampleEn: Learning idioms is essential for understanding native speakers and cultural expressions fluently.
exampleZh: 學習成語對於流利理解母語人士和文化表達至關重要。

exampleEn: Don't be an idiot; look both ways before crossing the busy street.
exampleZh: 別當傻瓜；過繁忙街道前要看兩邊。

exampleEn: Don't let the engine idle for too long to save fuel and reduce pollution.
exampleZh: 不要讓引擎空轉太久，以節省燃料並減少污染。

exampleEn: The pop star is an idol to millions of teenagers around the world.
exampleZh: 這位流行歌星是全世界數百萬青少年的偶像。

exampleEn: Many young players idolize famous athletes and try to imitate their playing style.
exampleZh: 許多年輕球員崇拜著名運動員並試圖模仿他們的比賽風格。

exampleEn: If you study hard, you will definitely pass the examination successfully.
exampleZh: 如果你努力學習，你一定會成功通過考試。

exampleEn: Ignorance of the law is not an acceptable excuse for breaking rules.
exampleZh: 不知法不是違反規則的可接受藉口。

exampleEn: Being ignorant about important issues prevents people from making informed decisions wisely.
exampleZh: 對重要問題的無知阻止人們明智地做出明智的決定。

exampleEn: Don't ignore warning signs that could indicate serious health problems ahead.
exampleZh: 不要忽視可能表明前方嚴重健康問題的警告信號。

exampleEn: She's been ill with the flu for a week and needs rest.
exampleZh: 她感冒已經一週了，需要休息。

exampleEn: Downloading copyrighted material without permission is illegal in most countries worldwide today.
exampleZh: 未經許可下載受版權保護的材料在當今世界大多數國家都是非法的。

exampleEn: It is illegal to park illegally in a handicap spot without a permit.
exampleZh: 沒有許可證非法停在殘疾人車位是違法的。

exampleEn: Mental illness affects millions of people but is often misunderstood by society.
exampleZh: 精神疾病影響數百萬人，但經常被社會誤解。

exampleEn: Streetlights illuminate the road at night making it safer for drivers and pedestrians.
exampleZh: 路燈在夜間照亮道路，使司機和行人更安全。

exampleEn: The teacher used diagrams to illustrate complex scientific concepts clearly to students.
exampleZh: 老師使用圖表向學生清楚地說明複雜的科學概念。

exampleEn: The book contains beautiful illustrations that bring the story to life vividly.
exampleZh: 這本書包含美麗的插圖，生動地讓故事栩栩如生。

exampleEn: The company is working hard to improve its public image after the scandal.
exampleZh: 公司在醜聞後努力改善其公眾形象。

exampleEn: The poem uses rich imagery to describe the beauty of the natural world.
exampleZh: 這首詩使用豐富的意象來描述自然世界的美麗。

exampleEn: The child has an imaginary friend who plays games with him every day.
exampleZh: 這個孩子有一個想像中的朋友，每天和他一起玩遊戲。

exampleEn: Children have wonderful imaginations that allow them to create amazing fantasy worlds.
exampleZh: 孩子們有美妙的想像力，讓他們能夠創造驚人的幻想世界。

exampleEn: Can you imagine what life will be like fifty years from now?
exampleZh: 你能想像從現在起五十年後的生活會是什麼樣子嗎？

exampleEn: Young children often imitate their parents' behavior and speech patterns naturally.
exampleZh: 幼兒經常自然地模仿父母的行為和說話模式。

exampleEn: This is just a cheap imitation of the original designer handbag.
exampleZh: 這只是原版設計師手提包的廉價仿製品。

exampleEn: The patient needs immediate medical attention or the condition could worsen quickly.
exampleZh: 病人需要立即醫療照顧，否則病情可能會迅速惡化。

exampleEn: Call the emergency services immediately if you see smoke or fire anywhere.
exampleZh: 如果你在任何地方看到煙霧或火災，請立即撥打緊急服務。

exampleEn: To learn a language quickly, immerse yourself in the culture and speak daily.
exampleZh: 要快速學習語言，讓自己沉浸在文化中並每天說話。

exampleEn: Many immigrants face challenges adapting to new culture and learning new language.
exampleZh: 許多移民在適應新文化和學習新語言方面面臨挑戰。

exampleEn: My grandparents decided to immigrate to Canada in search of a better life.
exampleZh: 為了尋求更好的生活，我的祖父母決定移民到加拿大。

exampleEn: Immigration policies vary greatly between different countries around the world today.
exampleZh: 當今世界各國的移民政策差異很大。

exampleEn: It is considered immoral to cheat on exams or lie to gain advantage.
exampleZh: 在考試中作弊或撒謊以獲得優勢被認為是不道德的。

exampleEn: Legends say that the gods are immortal and live forever without aging.
exampleZh: 傳說神是永生的，永遠活著不會變老。

exampleEn: Humans have always sought the secret to immortality to live forever.
exampleZh: 人類一直在尋找永生的秘密以求長生不老。

exampleEn: Climate change will have a significant impact on future generations worldwide.
exampleZh: 氣候變遷將對全球未來世代產生重大影響。

exampleEn: Lack of sleep can impair your ability to concentrate and make decisions.
exampleZh: 缺乏睡眠會削弱你集中注意力和做決定的能力。

exampleEn: A judge must be impartial and decide the case based on facts only.
exampleZh: 法官必須公正，僅根據事實來裁決案件。

exampleEn: The impatient customer complained loudly about the long wait at the restaurant.
exampleZh: 不耐煩的顧客大聲抱怨在餐廳等待時間太長。

exampleEn: He waited impatiently for the bus, checking his watch every few minutes.
exampleZh: 他不耐煩地等公車，每隔幾分鐘看一次手錶。

exampleEn: It is imperative that we take action now to prevent further damage.
exampleZh: 我們必須現在採取行動以防止進一步的損害。

exampleEn: Buddhist philosophy teaches that all things are impermanent and constantly changing.
exampleZh: 佛教哲學教導我們，萬物都是無常的，並且不斷地變化。

exampleEn: The government plans to implement new policies to reduce carbon emissions significantly.
exampleZh: 政府計畫實施新政策，以顯著減少碳排放。

exampleEn: We need to consider the long-term implications of this decision on the environment.
exampleZh: 我們需要考慮這個決定對環境的長期影響。

exampleEn: His silence seemed to imply that he disagreed with the proposal completely.
exampleZh: 他的沉默似乎暗示他完全不同意這個提議。

exampleEn: It's impolite to interrupt someone while they're speaking during important meetings.
exampleZh: 在重要會議中打斷別人說話是不禮貌的。

exampleEn: He spoke impolitely to the waiter, which embarrassed everyone else at the table.
exampleZh: 他對服務員說話很不禮貌，這讓同桌的其他人都感到尷尬。

exampleEn: Many countries import oil and gas to meet their energy needs efficiently.
exampleZh: 許多國家進口石油和天然氣以有效地滿足其能源需求。

exampleEn: The importance of education cannot be overstated in modern society today.
exampleZh: 在當今現代社會中，教育的重要性怎麼強調都不為過。

exampleEn: It's important to arrive on time for job interviews to make good impression.
exampleZh: 準時到達工作面試以留下好印象很重要。

exampleEn: More importantly, we must ensure that everyone has access to clean drinking water.
exampleZh: 更重要的是，我們必須確保每個人都能獲得乾淨的飲用水。

exampleEn: The government decided to impose a new tax on luxury goods next year.
exampleZh: 政府決定明年對奢侈品徵收新稅。

exampleEn: Traveling faster than the speed of light is currently considered a physical impossibility.
exampleZh: 比光速更快地旅行目前被認為是物理上的不可能。

exampleEn: Nothing is impossible if you work hard and never give up on dreams.
exampleZh: 如果你努力工作並永不放棄夢想，沒有什麼是不可能的。

exampleEn: Wearing high heels for hiking is completely impractical and potentially dangerous.
exampleZh: 穿高跟鞋去健行是完全不切實際的，而且可能有危險。

exampleEn: She tried to impress her new colleagues with her knowledge and skills.
exampleZh: 她試圖用她的知識和技能給新同事留下深刻印象。

exampleEn: I was deeply impressed by her intelligence and her ability to solve problems.
exampleZh: 我對她的智慧和解決問題的能力留下了深刻的印象。

exampleEn: First impressions are important and can influence how people perceive you later.
exampleZh: 第一印象很重要，可以影響人們以後如何看待你。

exampleEn: Impressionism describes a style of painting that focuses on light and color effects.
exampleZh: 印象派描述了一種專注於光和色彩效果的繪畫風格。

exampleEn: Claude Monet is one of the most famous Impressionist painters in history.
exampleZh: 克勞德·莫內是歷史上最著名的印象派畫家之一。

exampleEn: The athlete's impressive performance broke several world records at the Olympics yesterday.
exampleZh: 這位運動員昨天在奧運會上令人印象深刻的表現打破了幾項世界紀錄。

exampleEn: The dictator used his power to imprison political opponents and suppress dissent.
exampleZh: 獨裁者利用他的權力監禁政治對手並鎮壓異議。

exampleEn: He was sentenced to life imprisonment for the crimes he committed years ago.
exampleZh: 他因多年前犯下的罪行被判處終身監禁。

exampleEn: It seems highly improbable that it will snow in the middle of summer.
exampleZh: 在仲夏下雪似乎極不可能。

exampleEn: Improper use of the machinery can lead to serious accidents and injuries.
exampleZh: 不當使用機器會導致嚴重的事故和傷害。

exampleEn: The equipment was installed improperly, causing it to malfunction during the test.
exampleZh: 設備安裝不當，導致在測試期間發生故障。

exampleEn: Regular practice is the best way to improve your language skills effectively.
exampleZh: 定期練習是有效提高語言技能的最佳方法。

exampleEn: Her health has improved significantly since she started exercising and eating well.
exampleZh: 自從她開始運動和飲食健康以來，她的健康狀況顯著改善。

exampleEn: There has been significant improvement in air quality since new regulations were implemented.
exampleZh: 自從實施新法規以來，空氣品質有了顯著改善。

exampleEn: He bought the expensive watch on impulse without thinking about the cost.
exampleZh: 他一時衝動買了這塊昂貴的手錶，沒有考慮成本。

exampleEn: She is an impulsive shopper who often buys things she doesn't really need.
exampleZh: 她是一個衝動的購物者，經常買她並不需要的東西。

exampleEn: The keys are in the drawer next to the kitchen sink.
exampleZh: 鑰匙在廚房水槽旁邊的抽屜裡。

exampleEn: The news report was inaccurate and contained several factual errors and mistakes.
exampleZh: 新聞報導不準確，包含幾個事實錯誤和失誤。

exampleEn: The funding for the project was inadequate to complete all the planned activities.
exampleZh: 該專案的資金不足以完成所有計畫的活動。

exampleEn: Children often talk to inanimate objects like toys as if they were alive.
exampleZh: 孩子們經常像對待活物一樣與玩具等無生命物體說話。

exampleEn: Some people believe that musical talent is inborn rather than learned.
exampleZh: 有些人認為音樂天賦是與生俱來的，而不是後天學來的。

exampleEn: The temple was filled with the smell of burning incense during the ceremony.
exampleZh: 儀式期間，寺廟裡充滿了燃燒香的味道。

exampleEn: The company offers a financial incentive to employees who exceed their sales targets.
exampleZh: 公司向超過銷售目標的員工提供經濟獎勵。

exampleEn: The baby grew two inches taller over the past six months remarkably.
exampleZh: 嬰兒在過去六個月中長高了兩英寸，非常顯著。

exampleEn: The police are investigating the incident that occurred downtown last night.
exampleZh: 警方正在調查昨晚在市中心發生的事件。

exampleEn: The price includes breakfast and dinner but not lunch or snacks.
exampleZh: 價格包括早餐和晚餐，但不包括午餐或小吃。

exampleEn: The price of the tour includes all meals, accommodation, and transportation costs.
exampleZh: 旅遊的價格包括所有餐飲、住宿和交通費用。

exampleEn: Their combined income is barely enough to cover basic living expenses monthly.
exampleZh: 他們的總收入勉強足以支付每月的基本生活費用。

exampleEn: It is very inconvenient to have to travel so far for a simple meeting.
exampleZh: 為了簡單的會議不得不長途跋涉是非常不方便的。

exampleEn: The answer you provided on the test was incorrect, so you lost points.
exampleZh: 你在考試中提供的答案是不正確的，所以你丟了分。

exampleEn: The government plans to increase taxes to fund new infrastructure projects nationwide.
exampleZh: 政府計畫增加稅收以資助全國新的基礎設施專案。

exampleEn: People are increasingly concerned about environmental issues and climate change today.
exampleZh: 今天人們越來越關注環境問題和氣候變遷。

exampleEn: The view from the mountain top was absolutely incredible and breathtaking.
exampleZh: 從山頂看到的景色絕對令人難以置信且令人驚嘆。

exampleEn: She's incredibly talented and has won numerous awards for her artistic work.
exampleZh: 她才華橫溢，因其藝術作品贏得了無數獎項。

exampleEn: If you cancel the booking late, you may incur a cancellation fee.
exampleZh: 如果你遲取消預訂，你可能會招致取消費用。

exampleEn: Unfortunately, the disease is currently incurable, but treatments can manage the symptoms.
exampleZh: 不幸的是，這種疾病目前無法治癒，但治療可以控制症狀。

exampleEn: I feel deeply indebted to my parents for their support throughout my education.
exampleZh: 這我深深感激父母在我的教育過程中給予的支持。

exampleEn: The test was indeed very difficult as everyone had warned me beforehand.
exampleZh: 測試確實非常困難，正如每個人事先警告我的那樣。

exampleEn: In English grammar, 'a' and 'an' are known as indefinite articles.
exampleZh: 在英語語法中，'a' 和 'an' 被稱為不定冠詞。

exampleEn: Remember to indent the first line of every paragraph in your essay.
exampleZh: 記得在你文章的每個段落的第一行縮排。

exampleEn: The country celebrates its independence day every year with parades and fireworks.
exampleZh: 這個國家每年用遊行和煙火慶祝獨立日。

exampleEn: Young adults should learn to be financially independent from their parents eventually.
exampleZh: 年輕人最終應該學會在經濟上獨立於父母。

exampleEn: The two researchers arrived at the same conclusion independently of each other.
exampleZh: 這兩位研究人員彼此獨立地得出了相同的結論。

exampleEn: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean was simply indescribable in words.
exampleZh: 海洋上日落的美麗簡直無法用言語形容。

exampleEn: Look at the index at the back of the book to find specific topics.
exampleZh: 查看書後的索引以查找特定主題。

exampleEn: Dark clouds indicate that rain is likely to fall soon this afternoon.
exampleZh: 烏雲表明今天下午很可能很快就會下雨。

exampleEn: He seemed indifferent to the news that didn't affect him personally at all.
exampleZh: 他似乎對完全不影響他個人的新聞漠不關心。

exampleEn: He suffered the indignity of being laughed at by his coworkers publicly.
exampleZh: 他遭受了被同事公開嘲笑的侮辱。

exampleEn: She gave an indirect answer avoiding the question I asked her directly.
exampleZh: 她給了一個間接的答案，避開了我直接問她的問題。

exampleEn: Smoking affects non-smokers indirectly through exposure to harmful secondhand smoke.
exampleZh: 吸菸通過接觸有害的二手菸間接影響非吸菸者。

exampleEn: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of modern life for most people.
exampleZh: 手機已成為大多數人現代生活中不可或缺的一部分。

exampleEn: Each individual has unique talents and abilities that should be recognized and valued.
exampleZh: 每個人都有應該被認可和重視的獨特才能和能力。

exampleEn: The indoor swimming pool is heated and open year-round for members.
exampleZh: 室內游泳池有暖氣，全年對會員開放。

exampleEn: Stay indoors during the storm to avoid danger from lightning and wind.
exampleZh: 在暴風雨期間待在室內以避免閃電和風的危險。

exampleEn: Occasionally, I like to indulge in a piece of rich dark chocolate cake.
exampleZh: 偶爾，我喜歡沉迷於一塊濃郁的黑巧克力蛋糕。

exampleEn: Grandparents are often indulgent with their grandchildren, giving them whatever they want.
exampleZh: 祖父母通常對孫子孫女很縱容，給他們任何他們想要的東西。

exampleEn: The industrial revolution transformed society and changed how people lived and worked.
exampleZh: 工業革命改變了社會，改變了人們的生活和工作方式。

exampleEn: Many developing nations aim to industrialize their economies to increase wealth and stability.
exampleZh: 許多發展中國家旨在使其經濟工業化，以增加財富和穩定性。

exampleEn: The technology industry is growing rapidly and creating many new job opportunities.
exampleZh: 科技產業正在快速增長並創造許多新的工作機會。

exampleEn: The medicine proved to be ineffective in treating the patient's severe symptoms.
exampleZh: 事實證明，這種藥物在治療病人嚴重症狀方面無效。

exampleEn: Noble gases like helium and neon are chemically inert and rarely react.
exampleZh: 像氦和氖這樣的惰性氣體化學性質惰性，很少發生反應。

exampleEn: Change is inevitable, so we must learn to adapt and embrace it.
exampleZh: 變化是不可避免的，所以我們必須學會適應並接受它。

exampleEn: This restaurant offers good food that is relatively inexpensive compared to others nearby.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳提供相對便宜的美食，與附近的相比。

exampleEn: The new driver was inexperienced and struggled to park the car correctly.
exampleZh: 新司機缺乏經驗，難以正確停車。

exampleEn: Infants need constant care and attention from parents during their first year.
exampleZh: 嬰兒在第一年需要父母的持續照顧和關注。

exampleEn: Wash your hands regularly to prevent germs from infecting you or others.
exampleZh: 定期洗手以防止細菌感染你或他人。

exampleEn: Clean the wound thoroughly to prevent it from becoming infected with bacteria.
exampleZh: 徹底清潔傷口以防止細菌感染。

exampleEn: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the bacterial infection in my throat.
exampleZh: 醫生開了抗生素來治療我喉嚨的細菌感染。

exampleEn: The flu is highly infectious and spreads quickly in crowded places like schools.
exampleZh: 流感具有高度傳染性，在學校等擁擠的地方迅速傳播。

exampleEn: From his expression, I could infer that he was not happy about decision.
exampleZh: 從他的表情，我可以推斷他對決定不滿意。

exampleEn: Based on the evidence presented, the jury made an inference about his guilt.
exampleZh: 根據提出的證據，陪審團推斷他有罪。

exampleEn: In the sentence 'I want to go', 'to go' is an infinitive verb.
exampleZh: 在句子 'I want to go' 中，'to go' 是一個不定式動詞。

exampleEn: The doctor prescribed medication to reduce the inflammation and pain in his knee.
exampleZh: 醫生開了藥來減輕他膝蓋的炎症和疼痛。

exampleEn: The politician's speech was inflammatory and incited violence among the angry crowd.
exampleZh: 這位政治家的演講具有煽動性，激起了憤怒人群中的暴力。

exampleEn: Please inflate the tires to the recommended pressure before driving long distances.
exampleZh: 在長途駕駛之前，請將輪胎充氣至建議的壓力。

exampleEn: High inflation reduces the purchasing power of money and increases the cost of living.
exampleZh: 高通貨膨脹降低了貨幣的購買力並增加了生活成本。

exampleEn: Parents have a strong influence on their children's values and behavior patterns.
exampleZh: 父母對孩子的價值觀和行為模式有很大的影響。

exampleEn: She's an influential figure in politics who shapes public opinion significantly.
exampleZh: 她是政治上有影響力的人物，顯著塑造公眾輿論。

exampleEn: The elderly are particularly vulnerable to complications from the influenza virus effectively.
exampleZh: 老年人特別容易受到流感病毒並發症的影響。

exampleEn: Please inform me immediately if there are any changes to the schedule.
exampleZh: 如果時間表有任何變化，請立即通知我。

exampleEn: The meeting will be informal, so you don't need to dress formally.
exampleZh: 會議將是非正式的，所以你不需要穿得正式。

exampleEn: The internet provides access to vast amounts of information on every topic.
exampleZh: 網際網路提供了關於每個主題的大量資訊。

exampleEn: The documentary was very informative and taught me a lot about marine life.
exampleZh: 這部紀錄片非常有教育意義，教會了我很多關於海洋生物的知識。

exampleEn: Copying copyrighted material without permission is illegal and infringes on intellectual property rights.
exampleZh: 未經許可複製受版權保護的材料是非法的，並侵犯了知識產權。

exampleEn: The lawsuit alleged patent infringement by the competing technology company.
exampleZh: 訴訟指控競爭對手的科技公司侵犯專利。

exampleEn: Fresh ingredients are essential for cooking delicious and healthy meals at home.
exampleZh: 新鮮的食材對於在家烹飪美味健康的餐點至關重要。

exampleEn: Many different species of birds inhabit this dense forest during the spring.
exampleZh: 春天許多不同種類的鳥類棲息在這片茂密的森林中。

exampleEn: The island has only a few hundred inhabitants living in small villages.
exampleZh: 這個島只有幾百名居民住在小村莊裡。

exampleEn: Take a deep breath and inhale the fresh mountain air to relax.
exampleZh: 深吸一口氣，吸入新鮮的山間空氣以放鬆。

exampleEn: She will inherit her grandmother's house and valuable antique collection someday.
exampleZh: 她有一天會繼承她祖母的房子和珍貴的古董收藏。

exampleEn: The initial results look promising but we need more data to confirm.
exampleZh: 初步結果看起來很有希望，但我們需要更多數據來確認。

exampleEn: Initially, I was nervous about the presentation but gained confidence gradually.
exampleZh: 最初，我對簡報感到緊張，但逐漸獲得了信心。

exampleEn: The government launched a new initiative to reduce plastic waste nationwide.
exampleZh: 政府發起了一項新倡議，以減少全國的塑膠垃圾。

exampleEn: The nurse will inject the vaccine into your upper arm quickly and safely.
exampleZh: 護士會快速安全地將疫苗注射到你的上臂。

exampleEn: The doctor gave me an injection to relieve the pain immediately.
exampleZh: 醫生給我打了一針以立即緩解疼痛。

exampleEn: Be careful not to injure yourself when using sharp tools or equipment.
exampleZh: 使用鋒利的工具或設備時要小心不要傷到自己。

exampleEn: Several people were injured in the car accident on the highway yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天在高速公路上的車禍中有幾個人受傷。

exampleEn: The athlete suffered a serious knee injury that ended his career prematurely.
exampleZh: 這位運動員遭受了嚴重的膝蓋傷害，使他的職業生涯提前結束。

exampleEn: The printer is out of ink and needs a new cartridge immediately.
exampleZh: 印表機墨水用完了，需要立即更換新墨盒。

exampleEn: Some children seem to have an innate ability to learn languages quickly.
exampleZh: 有些孩子似乎有天生的快速學習語言的能力。

exampleEn: Meditation helps people find inner peace and reduce stress levels effectively.
exampleZh: 冥想幫助人們找到內心的平靜並有效減輕壓力水平。

exampleEn: She shared her innermost thoughts and feelings only with her closest friend.
exampleZh: 她只與最親密的朋友分享她內心最深處的想法和感受。

exampleEn: The court found him innocent of all charges after reviewing the evidence.
exampleZh: 法院在審查證據後認定他所有指控無罪。

exampleEn: The child looked up innocently when asked who broke the valuable vase.
exampleZh: 當被問及誰打破了貴重的花瓶時，孩子無辜地抬頭看。

exampleEn: Innovation drives economic growth and improves quality of life for everyone.
exampleZh: 創新推動經濟增長並改善每個人的生活品質。

exampleEn: The company is known for its innovative products that revolutionize the industry.
exampleZh: 這家公司以其革新產業的創新產品而聞名。

exampleEn: Steve Jobs was a visionary innovator who changed the technology industry forever.
exampleZh: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯是一位有遠見的創新者，永遠改變了科技產業。

exampleEn: We value your input and suggestions for improving our services to customers.
exampleZh: 我們重視您對改善我們對客戶服務的意見和建議。

exampleEn: I am writing to inquire about the job opening advertised on your website.
exampleZh: 我寫信是為了詢問貴公司網站上刊登的職位空缺。

exampleEn: The police launched an official inquiry into the cause of the suspicious fire.
exampleZh: 警方對可疑火災的原因展開了正式調查。

exampleEn: It would be insane to drive at such high speeds in heavy rain.
exampleZh: 在大雨中以如此高的速度駕駛是瘋狂的。

exampleEn: They decided to inscribe their names on the old tree trunk as a memory.
exampleZh: 他們決定在老樹幹上刻下他們的名字作為回憶。

exampleEn: The inscription on the monument honors the soldiers who died in the war.
exampleZh: 紀念碑上的銘文紀念在戰爭中犧牲的士兵。

exampleEn: Many insects play important roles in pollinating plants and maintaining ecosystems.
exampleZh: 許多昆蟲在為植物授粉和維持生態系統方面發揮重要作用。

exampleEn: The two sisters are inseparable and do everything together since they were young.
exampleZh: 這兩姐妹形影不離，從小就一起做所有事情。

exampleEn: It's cold outside, so let's go inside where it's warm and comfortable.
exampleZh: 外面很冷，所以讓我們進去裡面溫暖舒適的地方。

exampleEn: The book provides fascinating insight into the daily life of ancient Romans.
exampleZh: 這本書提供了對古羅馬人日常生活的迷人見解。

exampleEn: She insisted on paying for dinner despite our protests and objections.
exampleZh: 儘管我們抗議和反對，她堅持要付晚餐費用。

exampleEn: The building inspector will inspect the property before approving construction permits.
exampleZh: 建築檢查員將在批准建築許可之前檢查房產。

exampleEn: The health inspection revealed several violations that must be corrected immediately by owner.
exampleZh: 健康檢查發現了幾項必須由業主立即糾正的違規行為。

exampleEn: The safety inspector checked all equipment to ensure it met required standards.
exampleZh: 安全檢查員檢查了所有設備以確保符合所需標準。

exampleEn: Nature provides endless inspiration for artists and writers seeking creative ideas constantly.
exampleZh: 大自然為不斷尋求創意的藝術家和作家提供無盡的靈感。

exampleEn: His speech was truly inspirational and motivated everyone to work harder for success.
exampleZh: 他的演講確實鼓舞人心，激勵每個人為成功而更加努力工作。

exampleEn: Great teachers inspire students to pursue their dreams and reach their full potential.
exampleZh: 偉大的老師激勵學生追求夢想並發揮全部潛力。

exampleEn: You need to install the latest software update to fix the security bugs.
exampleZh: 你需要安裝最新的軟體更新以修復安全漏洞。

exampleEn: For instance, regular exercise can significantly improve your overall health and wellbeing.
exampleZh: 例如，定期運動可以顯著改善你的整體健康和幸福感。

exampleEn: The instant coffee is convenient but doesn't taste as good as freshly brewed.
exampleZh: 即溶咖啡很方便，但味道不如新鮮沖泡的好。

exampleEn: The news spread instantly through social media reaching millions of people worldwide.
exampleZh: 這個新聞通過社交媒體立即傳播，觸及全球數百萬人。

exampleEn: Instead of complaining, try to find solutions to the problems you face.
exampleZh: 與其抱怨，不如試著找到你面臨問題的解決方案。

exampleEn: I'll have tea instead of coffee this morning because I'm trying to reduce caffeine.
exampleZh: 我今天早上喝茶而不是咖啡，因為我正在試圖減少咖啡因。

exampleEn: Parents try to instill good values and manners in their children from young age.
exampleZh: 父母試圖從小向孩子灌輸良好的價值觀和禮貌。

exampleEn: Animals rely on instinct to survive in the wild and find food.
exampleZh: 動物依靠本能在野外生存和尋找食物。

exampleEn: The research institute is conducting groundbreaking studies on renewable energy sources worldwide.
exampleZh: 這個研究所正在全球進行關於可再生能源的開創性研究。

exampleEn: The university is a prestigious institution known for academic excellence and research.
exampleZh: 這所大學是一所以學術卓越和研究聞名的著名機構。

exampleEn: The teacher will instruct students on how to use the laboratory equipment safely.
exampleZh: 老師將指導學生如何安全使用實驗室設備。

exampleEn: Follow the instructions carefully when assembling the furniture to avoid making mistakes.
exampleZh: 組裝家具時仔細遵循說明以避免犯錯。

exampleEn: The driving instructor taught me important skills needed to pass the test.
exampleZh: 駕駛教練教我通過測試所需的重要技能。

exampleEn: The violin is a beautiful musical instrument that requires years of practice.
exampleZh: 小提琴是一種美麗的樂器，需要多年的練習。

exampleEn: There is insufficient evidence to prove that he committed the crime beyond doubt.
exampleZh: 沒有足夠的證據證明他毫無疑問地犯了罪。

exampleEn: His rude comments were clearly intended to insult and hurt her feelings.
exampleZh: 他粗魯的評論顯然是為了侮辱和傷害她的感情。

exampleEn: Health insurance is essential for protecting yourself from unexpected medical expenses and costs.
exampleZh: 健康保險對於保護自己免受意外醫療費用和成本至關重要。

exampleEn: The program aims to integrate refugees into society by providing language classes.
exampleZh: 該計畫旨在通過提供語言課程將難民融入社會。

exampleEn: Universities should be centers of intellectual freedom and critical thinking for all students.
exampleZh: 大學應該是所有學生智力自由和批判性思維的中心。

exampleEn: Artificial intelligence is transforming many industries and changing how we work daily.
exampleZh: 人工智慧正在改變許多產業並改變我們每天的工作方式。

exampleEn: Dolphins are highly intelligent animals capable of complex communication and problem-solving skills.
exampleZh: 海豚是高度聰明的動物，具有複雜的溝通和解決問題的能力。

exampleEn: I intend to finish this project before the deadline next Friday afternoon.
exampleZh: 我打算在下週五下午的截止日期前完成這個專案。

exampleEn: The intense heat during summer makes it difficult to work outdoors safely.
exampleZh: 夏季的強烈高溫使得在戶外安全工作變得困難。

exampleEn: She took an intensive English course to improve her skills before studying abroad.
exampleZh: 她在出國留學前參加了強化英語課程以提高技能。

exampleEn: He was charged with possession of a weapon with intent to harm others.
exampleZh: 他被指控擁有武器並意圖傷害他人。

exampleEn: My intention was to help, not to cause any problems or difficulties.
exampleZh: 我的意圖是幫忙，而不是造成任何問題或困難。

exampleEn: I didn't break the glass intentionally; it was just an accident, I promise.
exampleZh: 我不是故意打破玻璃的；這只是一個意外，我保證。

exampleEn: Children learn social skills by interacting with peers and adults regularly.
exampleZh: 孩子們通過定期與同齡人和成人互動來學習社交技能。

exampleEn: Face-to-face interaction is important for building strong relationships with others effectively.
exampleZh: 面對面的互動對於有效地與他人建立牢固的關係很重要。

exampleEn: The museum has interactive exhibits that allow children to learn through play.
exampleZh: 博物館有互動展品，讓孩子們通過遊戲學習。

exampleEn: Reading books about different cultures has sparked my interest in traveling abroad.
exampleZh: 閱讀關於不同文化的書籍激發了我對出國旅行的興趣。

exampleEn: I'm very interested in learning more about ancient history and civilizations.
exampleZh: 我非常有興趣了解更多關於古代歷史和文明的知識。

exampleEn: The documentary was so interesting that I watched it twice to understand better.
exampleZh: 這部紀錄片非常有趣，我看了兩次以更好地理解。

exampleEn: Please don't interfere with my work when I'm trying to concentrate.
exampleZh: 當我試圖集中注意力時，請不要干擾我的工作。

exampleEn: The interior of the house was beautifully decorated with modern furniture and art.
exampleZh: 房子的內部裝飾精美，有現代家具和藝術品。

exampleEn: This course is designed for intermediate level students who have basic knowledge.
exampleZh: 這門課程是為具有基本知識的中級學生設計的。

exampleEn: There will be a short intermission between the two acts of the play.
exampleZh: 這齣戲的兩幕之間將有短暫的中場休息。

exampleEn: The company is conducting an internal investigation into the financial irregularities discovered.
exampleZh: 公司正在對發現的財務違規行為進行內部調查。

exampleEn: International cooperation is essential for addressing global challenges like climate change effectively.
exampleZh: 國際合作對於有效應對氣候變遷等全球挑戰至關重要。

exampleEn: The musician is known internationally and has performed in major cities around world.
exampleZh: 這位音樂家在國際上享有盛譽，並在世界各地的主要城市演出過。

exampleEn: The Internet has revolutionized how we access information and communicate with each other.
exampleZh: 互聯網徹底改變了我們獲取資訊和相互交流的方式。

exampleEn: Good interpersonal skills are essential for working effectively in a team environment.
exampleZh: 良好的人際交往技巧對於在團隊環境中有效工作至關重要。

exampleEn: It's difficult to interpret the meaning of ancient symbols without proper context.
exampleZh: 沒有適當的背景，很難解釋古代符號的含義。

exampleEn: His interpretation of the poem was very different from what the teacher suggested.
exampleZh: 他對這首詩的解讀與老師的建議非常不同。

exampleEn: She works as an interpreter for the United Nations, translating speeches in real time.
exampleZh: 她在聯合國擔任口譯員，即時翻譯演講。

exampleEn: Please don't interrupt me while I'm speaking during the important meeting.
exampleZh: 在重要會議期間我說話時請不要打斷我。

exampleEn: I apologize for the interruption, but there is an urgent phone call for you.
exampleZh: 我很抱歉打斷，但有你的緊急電話。

exampleEn: Turn left at the next intersection and you will see the bank on corner.
exampleZh: 在下一個十字路口左轉，你會在拐角處看到銀行。

exampleEn: The bus arrives at regular intervals of fifteen minutes throughout the day.
exampleZh: 公車全天以十五分鐘的固定間隔到達。

exampleEn: The job interview went well and I'm hopeful about getting the position.
exampleZh: 工作面試進行得很順利，我對獲得這個職位充滿希望。

exampleEn: The interviewee answered all the questions confidently and impressed the hiring manager.
exampleZh: 受訪者自信地回答了所有問題，給招聘經理留下了深刻印象。

exampleEn: The interviewer asked about my previous work experience and my career goals.
exampleZh: 面試官詢問了我以前的工作經驗和我的職業目標。

exampleEn: They enjoyed an intimate dinner by candlelight to celebrate their wedding anniversary.
exampleZh: 他們在燭光下享用了親密的晚餐，以慶祝他們的結婚紀念日。

exampleEn: Pour the milk into the bowl and mix it with the flour.
exampleZh: 把牛奶倒進碗裡，與麵粉混合。

exampleEn: In the sentence 'Birds fly', the verb 'fly' is intransitive because no object.
exampleZh: 在句子 'Birds fly' 中，動詞 'fly' 是不及物動詞，因為沒有受詞。

exampleEn: The patient received antibiotics through an intravenous drip in the hospital yesterday.
exampleZh: 病人昨天在醫院通過靜脈滴注接受了抗生素。

exampleEn: Let me introduce you to my colleague who just joined our team.
exampleZh: 讓我向你介紹我剛加入我們團隊的同事。

exampleEn: The introduction of new technology has improved efficiency in the workplace significantly.
exampleZh: 新技術的引入顯著提高了工作場所的效率。

exampleEn: I don't mean to intrude, but I couldn't help overhearing your conversation.
exampleZh: 我無意打擾，但我忍不住偷聽了你們的談話。

exampleEn: The alarm went off when an intruder tried to break into the house.
exampleZh: 當入侵者試圖闖入房子時，警報響了。

exampleEn: She felt that the constant questions were an intrusion into her private life.
exampleZh: 她覺得不斷的提問是對她私生活的侵犯。

exampleEn: The army invaded the neighboring country without warning last night suddenly.
exampleZh: 軍隊昨晚突然毫無預警地入侵了鄰國。

exampleEn: It is an invariable rule that all employees must arrive on time daily.
exampleZh: 所有員工每天必須準時到達是一個不變的規則。

exampleEn: He is invariably polite and helpful, no matter how busy he is.
exampleZh: 無論他多忙，他總是有禮貌並且樂於助人。

exampleEn: The invasion caused widespread destruction and displaced thousands of innocent civilians.
exampleZh: 入侵造成了廣泛的破壞並使數千名無辜平民流離失所。

exampleEn: Thomas Edison invented the light bulb which revolutionized modern life completely.
exampleZh: 湯瑪斯·愛迪生發明了電燈泡，徹底改變了現代生活。

exampleEn: The invention of the printing press changed history by making books accessible.
exampleZh: 印刷機的發明通過使書籍易於獲得而改變了歷史。

exampleEn: The inventor spent years developing the revolutionary device that changed the industry.
exampleZh: 這位發明家花了多年時間開發改變產業的革命性設備。

exampleEn: Use inverted commas to indicate direct speech or a quotation in writing.
exampleZh: 在寫作中使用引號表示直接引語或引用。

exampleEn: It's wise to invest money in education which provides long-term benefits.
exampleZh: 將錢投資於提供長期利益的教育是明智的。

exampleEn: The police are investigating the mysterious disappearance of the valuable painting.
exampleZh: 警方正在調查貴重畫作的神秘失蹤。

exampleEn: The investigation revealed evidence of fraud and corruption within the organization.
exampleZh: 調查揭示了組織內部欺詐和腐敗的證據。

exampleEn: The private investigator was hired to find the missing person and solve mystery.
exampleZh: 私人偵探被聘請來尋找失蹤人員並解開謎團。

exampleEn: Real estate can be a good investment if you choose the location wisely.
exampleZh: 如果你明智地選擇地點，房地產可以是一項好投資。

exampleEn: Investors are concerned about the company's declining profits and uncertain future.
exampleZh: 投資者擔心公司利潤下降和不確定的未來。

exampleEn: Air is invisible but essential for all living things to survive.
exampleZh: 空氣是看不見的，但對所有生物的生存至關重要。

exampleEn: We received an invitation to attend the wedding ceremony next month.
exampleZh: 我們收到了參加下個月婚禮的邀請。

exampleEn: I'd like to invite you to dinner at my house this Saturday.
exampleZh: 我想邀請你這週六到我家吃晚餐。

exampleEn: The cool water of the swimming pool looked invitingly refreshing on the hot day.
exampleZh: 在炎熱的日子裡，游泳池的涼水看起來令人耳目一新。

exampleEn: The lawyer tried to invoke an old law to defend his client in court.
exampleZh: 律師試圖援引一條舊法在法庭上為他的當事人辯護。

exampleEn: He shivered involuntarily as a cold wind blew through the open window.
exampleZh: 當冷風吹過敞開的窗戶時，他不由自主地發抖。

exampleEn: The project will involve collaboration between multiple departments and teams working together.
exampleZh: 這個專案將涉及多個部門和團隊之間的合作。

exampleEn: She's deeply involved in community service and volunteers regularly at local charities.
exampleZh: 她深入參與社區服務，並定期在當地慈善機構做志工。

exampleEn: Her involvement in the charity organization has helped many people in the community.
exampleZh: 她參與慈善組織幫助了社區中的許多人。

exampleEn: Iron is an essential mineral that helps transport oxygen throughout the body.
exampleZh: 鐵是一種必需的礦物質，有助於在全身運輸氧氣。

exampleEn: Ironically, the fire station burned down while the firefighters were out on call.
exampleZh: 諷刺的是，消防站在消防員出動時被燒毀了。

exampleEn: I have a pile of ironing to do before I can go out.
exampleZh: 在我能出去之前，我有一堆衣服要燙。

exampleEn: He has an irrational fear of spiders, even though most are harmless.
exampleZh: 他對蜘蛛有一種不合理的恐懼，儘管大多數都是無害的。

exampleEn: The patient's heartbeat was irregular, so the doctor ordered additional tests immediately.
exampleZh: 病人的心跳不規則，所以醫生立即下令進行額外的檢查。

exampleEn: The smell of freshly baked bread was irresistible, so we bought a loaf.
exampleZh: 剛出爐的麵包的味道令人無法抗拒，所以我們買了一條。

exampleEn: She found the puppy irresistibly cute and decided to adopt it immediately.
exampleZh: 她覺得這隻小狗可愛得無法抗拒，決定立即收養它。

exampleEn: It was irresponsible of him to leave the children alone in the house.
exampleZh: 他把孩子們獨自留在家裡是不負責任的。

exampleEn: Loud noises really irritate me when I'm trying to concentrate on my work.
exampleZh: 當我試圖專注於工作時，巨大的噪音真的讓我很惱火。

exampleEn: She became visibly irritated when the train was delayed for the third time.
exampleZh: 當火車第三次延誤時，她明顯變得惱火。

exampleEn: He has an irritating habit of interrupting people when they are speaking.
exampleZh: 他有一個令人討厭的習慣，就是在別人說話時打斷他們。

exampleEn: He tried to hide his irritation at the rude customer's constant complaints.
exampleZh: 他試圖掩飾他對粗魯顧客不斷抱怨的惱怒。

exampleEn: The sky is blue today, and the sun is shining brightly outside.
exampleZh: 今天天空是藍色的，外面陽光燦爛。

exampleEn: The tropical island has beautiful beaches and crystal-clear water that attracts tourists.
exampleZh: 這個熱帶島嶼有美麗的海灘和清澈的水，吸引遊客。

exampleEn: The islanders rely on fishing and tourism for their livelihood and economy.
exampleZh: 島民依靠漁業和旅遊業謀生和發展經濟。

exampleEn: They took a boat trip to a small isle off the coast.
exampleZh: 他們乘船去了海岸外的一個小島。

exampleEn: The prisoner was kept in isolation for breaking the prison rules repeatedly.
exampleZh: 囚犯因屢次違反監獄規則而被單獨監禁。

exampleEn: Climate change is a critical issue that requires immediate action from everyone.
exampleZh: 氣候變遷是一個需要每個人立即採取行動的關鍵問題。

exampleEn: He works in the IT department, fixing computer problems for the company staff.
exampleZh: 他在 IT 部門工作，為公司員工解決電腦問題。

exampleEn: It is important to arrive on time for the meeting tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 明天早上準時到達會議很重要。

exampleEn: You should italicize the titles of books and movies in your essay.
exampleZh: 你應該在文章中將書籍和電影的標題用斜體顯示。

exampleEn: The mosquito bite started to itch, so I applied some soothing cream.
exampleZh: 蚊子叮咬處開始發癢，所以我塗了一些舒緩霜。

exampleEn: Each item on the shopping list must be checked carefully before purchase.
exampleZh: 購物清單上的每件物品在購買前都必須仔細檢查。

exampleEn: The dog wagged its tail happily when it saw its owner coming.
exampleZh: 當狗看到主人來時，它高興地搖著尾巴。

exampleEn: The problem will not solve itself; we must take action immediately.
exampleZh: 問題不會自己解決；我們必須立即採取行動。

exampleEn: The trade in elephant ivory has been banned to protect the species from extinction.
exampleZh: 象牙貿易已被禁止，以保護該物種免於滅絕。

exampleEn: Don't forget to bring a warm jacket because it's cold outside tonight.
exampleZh: 別忘了帶一件暖和的外套，因為今晚外面很冷。

exampleEn: She wore a beautiful necklace made of green jade that belonged to her grandmother.
exampleZh: 她戴著一條漂亮的綠色玉項鍊，那是她祖母的。

exampleEn: The thief was sent to jail for six months for stealing a car.
exampleZh: 小偷因偷車被送進監獄六個月。

exampleEn: Traffic jam during rush hour makes commuting extremely frustrating and time-consuming daily.
exampleZh: 高峰時段的交通堵塞使每天通勤極其令人沮喪和耗時。

exampleEn: January is the first month of the year and often the coldest.
exampleZh: 一月是一年的第一個月，通常也是最冷的。

exampleEn: Store the cookies in an airtight jar to keep them fresh longer.
exampleZh: 將餅乾存放在密封罐中以保持更長時間的新鮮。

exampleEn: He broke his jaw in a boxing match and couldn't eat solid food.
exampleZh: 他在一場拳擊比賽中打斷了下巴，不能吃固體食物。

exampleEn: Jazz music originated in New Orleans and has influenced many musical genres.
exampleZh: 爵士音樂起源於新奧爾良，影響了許多音樂類型。

exampleEn: She felt jealous when her friend received more attention and praise.
exampleZh: 當她的朋友得到更多關注和讚美時，她感到嫉妒。

exampleEn: He looked jealously at his colleague's new car, wishing he could afford one.
exampleZh: 他嫉妒地看著同事的新車，希望自己也能買得起。

exampleEn: Blue jeans are comfortable and versatile clothing worn by people worldwide.
exampleZh: 藍色牛仔褲是全球人們穿著的舒適且多用途的服裝。

exampleEn: Children love eating peanut butter and jelly sandwiches for lunch at school.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在學校午餐時吃花生醬和果凍三明治。

exampleEn: Don't do anything that could jeopardize your chances of getting the job.
exampleZh: 不要做任何可能危及你獲得這份工作機會的事情。

exampleEn: The jet flew across the ocean in just six hours at high speed.
exampleZh: 噴射機以高速在短短六小時內飛越了海洋。

exampleEn: The crown was decorated with precious jewels including diamonds and rubies.
exampleZh: 王冠裝飾著包括鑽石和紅寶石在內的珍貴寶石。

exampleEn: The jeweler examined the diamond ring carefully to determine its true value.
exampleZh: 珠寶商仔細檢查了鑽石戒指以確定其真正價值。

exampleEn: She keeps her valuable jewelry in a safe to protect it from theft.
exampleZh: 她把貴重的珠寶放在保險箱裡以防盜竊。

exampleEn: Finding a good job after graduation can be challenging in today's competitive market.
exampleZh: 在當今競爭激烈的市場中，畢業後找到好工作可能很有挑戰性。

exampleEn: I jog in the park every morning to stay healthy and fit.
exampleZh: 我每天早上在公園慢跑以保持健康和體能。

exampleEn: I go jogging in the park every morning to stay fit and healthy.
exampleZh: 我每天早上在公園慢跑以保持健康。

exampleEn: Would you like to join us for dinner at the restaurant tonight?
exampleZh: 你今晚想和我們一起去餐廳吃晚餐嗎？

exampleEn: The doctor examined my knee joint to determine the cause of pain.
exampleZh: 醫生檢查了我的膝關節以確定疼痛的原因。

exampleEn: He told a funny joke that made everyone laugh during the party.
exampleZh: 他在派對上講了一個有趣的笑話，讓每個人都笑了。

exampleEn: She keeps a daily journal to record her thoughts and experiences regularly.
exampleZh: 她每天寫日記以定期記錄她的想法和經歷。

exampleEn: She decided to study journalism because she wanted to report on important news.
exampleZh: 她決定學習新聞學，因為她想報導重要新聞。

exampleEn: The journalist interviewed witnesses to gather information for the news story.
exampleZh: 記者採訪目擊者以收集新聞報導的資訊。

exampleEn: The long journey across the country took three days by train.
exampleZh: 穿越全國的漫長旅程乘火車花了三天。

exampleEn: The birth of their first child brought immense joy to the family.
exampleZh: 他們第一個孩子的出生給家庭帶來了巨大的喜悅。

exampleEn: The judge sentenced the criminal to ten years in prison for crimes.
exampleZh: 法官因罪行判處罪犯十年監禁。

exampleEn: Good judgment comes from experience and learning from past mistakes carefully.
exampleZh: 良好的判斷力來自經驗和仔細從過去的錯誤中學習。

exampleEn: Judo is a Japanese martial art that emphasizes throwing and grappling techniques.
exampleZh: 柔道是一種強調投擲和格鬥技術的日本武術。

exampleEn: She poured fresh water from a glass jug into the waiting cups.
exampleZh: 她將新鮮的水從玻璃壺倒進等待的杯子裡。

exampleEn: Fresh orange juice is delicious and packed with vitamin C for health.
exampleZh: 新鮮橙汁美味且富含維生素C，有益健康。

exampleEn: The peach was so juicy that the juice ran down my chin.
exampleZh: 這桃子太多汁了，汁液流過我的下巴。

exampleEn: July is usually the hottest month of summer in many countries.
exampleZh: 七月通常是許多國家夏季最熱的月份。

exampleEn: The athlete can jump over two meters high in competitions regularly.
exampleZh: 這位運動員在比賽中經常能跳過兩公尺高。

exampleEn: It's cold outside, so put on a warm woolen jumper before leaving.
exampleZh: 外面很冷，所以出門前穿上一件溫暖的羊毛套頭衫。

exampleEn: School usually ends in June and summer vacation begins for students.
exampleZh: 學校通常在六月結束，學生的暑假開始。

exampleEn: The dense jungle is home to countless species of plants and animals.
exampleZh: 茂密的叢林是無數植物和動物物種的家園。

exampleEn: He's a junior employee who just started working here last month.
exampleZh: 他是一名初級員工，上個月剛開始在這裡工作。

exampleEn: Clean out the garage and throw away all the junk we don't need.
exampleZh: 清理車庫並扔掉所有我們不需要的垃圾。

exampleEn: Eating too much junk food can lead to obesity and other health problems.
exampleZh: 吃太多垃圾食品會導致肥胖和其他健康問題。

exampleEn: Each juror must listen carefully to the evidence before reaching a verdict.
exampleZh: 每位陪審員在做出裁決之前必須仔細聽取證據。

exampleEn: The jury found the defendant guilty of all charges after long deliberation.
exampleZh: 經過長時間的商議，陪審團裁定被告所有指控成立。

exampleEn: I just finished reading an interesting book about world history and culture.
exampleZh: 我剛讀完一本關於世界歷史和文化的有趣書籍。

exampleEn: The legal system exists to ensure justice and fairness for all citizens.
exampleZh: 法律制度的存在是為了確保所有公民的正義和公平。

exampleEn: You need to justify your decision with solid evidence and logical reasoning clearly.
exampleZh: 你需要用確鑿的證據和清晰的邏輯推理來證明你的決定。

exampleEn: The kangaroo carries its baby in a pouch on its stomach safely.
exampleZh: 袋鼠將寶寶安全地放在肚子上的育兒袋裡。

exampleEn: They went to a karaoke bar and sang their favorite songs all night long.
exampleZh: 他們去了一家卡拉 OK 酒吧，整晚唱著他們最喜歡的歌。

exampleEn: She has a keen interest in astronomy and spends hours observing stars.
exampleZh: 她對天文學有濃厚的興趣，花幾個小時觀察星星。

exampleEn: Please keep the door closed to prevent cold air from entering the room.
exampleZh: 請保持門關閉以防止冷空氣進入房間。

exampleEn: The goalkeeper is the last line of defense in a soccer team.
exampleZh: 守門員是足球隊的最後一道防線。

exampleEn: The old lamp burned kerosene to provide light in the dark cabin.
exampleZh: 舊燈燃燒煤油以在黑暗的小屋中提供光線。

exampleEn: Put the kettle on to boil water for tea this afternoon please.
exampleZh: 請把水壺放上去燒水泡茶。

exampleEn: Education is the key to success and opening doors to opportunities.
exampleZh: 教育是成功和打開機會之門的關鍵。

exampleEn: The computer keyboard needs cleaning because the keys are sticky and dirty.
exampleZh: 電腦鍵盤需要清潔，因為按鍵又黏又髒。

exampleEn: The software records every keystroke you make on the computer for security.
exampleZh: 該軟體記錄您在電腦上所做的每一次按鍵操作以確保安全。

exampleEn: The soccer player kicked the ball into the goal scoring the winning point.
exampleZh: 足球運動員將球踢進球門，得到了致勝分。

exampleEn: The kids are playing happily in the backyard under parental supervision carefully.
exampleZh: 孩子們在父母的仔細監督下在後院快樂地玩耍。

exampleEn: Smoking can kill you slowly by damaging your lungs and heart over time.
exampleZh: 吸菸會隨著時間損害你的肺和心臟，慢慢殺死你。

exampleEn: The police are still hunting for the serial killer responsible for the murders.
exampleZh: 警方仍在追捕對謀殺案負責的連環殺手。

exampleEn: The senseless killing of innocent people must be stopped immediately and permanently.
exampleZh: 必須立即並永久停止對無辜人民的無謂殺戮。

exampleEn: I bought a kilo of apples and two kilos of oranges at market.
exampleZh: 我在市場買了一公斤蘋果和兩公斤柳橙。

exampleEn: A kilogram is equal to one thousand grams in the metric system.
exampleZh: 在公制中，一公斤等於一千克。

exampleEn: The marathon race is exactly 42 kilometers long and very challenging for runners.
exampleZh: 馬拉松比賽正好四十二公里長，對跑者來說非常有挑戰性。

exampleEn: She's a very kind person who always helps others without expecting rewards.
exampleZh: 她是一個非常善良的人，總是幫助他人而不期望回報。

exampleEn: Would you kindly pass me the salt from the other end of table?
exampleZh: 你能好心地把桌子另一端的鹽遞給我嗎？

exampleEn: Small acts of kindness can make a big difference in someone's day.
exampleZh: 小小的善舉可以對某人的一天產生巨大的影響。

exampleEn: The king ruled the kingdom wisely for over fifty years with fairness.
exampleZh: 國王明智地統治王國超過五十年，公平公正。

exampleEn: The ancient kingdom was known for its advanced culture and powerful military.
exampleZh: 這個古老王國以其先進的文化和強大的軍事而聞名。

exampleEn: The mother gave her child a goodnight kiss before turning off lights.
exampleZh: 母親在關燈前給孩子一個晚安吻。

exampleEn: He bought a model airplane kit and spent weekend assembling it carefully.
exampleZh: 他買了一個模型飛機套件，並花週末仔細組裝。

exampleEn: The kitchen is the heart of the home where families gather together.
exampleZh: 廚房是家庭的心臟，家人聚集在一起的地方。

exampleEn: Children love flying kites in the park on windy spring days happily.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在有風的春天在公園裡快樂地放風箏。

exampleEn: The tiny kitten was so cute that everyone wanted to pet it.
exampleZh: 這隻小貓太可愛了，每個人都想撫摸它。

exampleEn: I hurt my knee playing basketball and need to rest for weeks.
exampleZh: 我打籃球時傷了膝蓋，需要休息幾週。

exampleEn: Please kneel down to tie your shoelaces properly before we leave home.
exampleZh: 在我們離開家之前，請跪下好好繫鞋帶。

exampleEn: Use a sharp knife to cut the vegetables carefully to avoid injuries.
exampleZh: 用鋒利的刀小心切蔬菜以避免受傷。

exampleEn: My grandmother likes to knit sweaters and scarves for the whole family.
exampleZh: 我祖母喜歡為全家人編織毛衣和圍巾。

exampleEn: Someone is knocking at the door; please go see who it is.
exampleZh: 有人在敲門；請去看看是誰。

exampleEn: Tie a tight knot in the rope to secure the boat properly.
exampleZh: 在繩子上打一個緊結以適當地固定船。

exampleEn: I know the answer to this question because I studied it yesterday.
exampleZh: 我知道這個問題的答案，因為我昨天學習過。

exampleEn: He knowingly broke the rules and accepted the consequences of his actions.
exampleZh: 他明知故犯地違反了規則，並接受了他行為的後果。

exampleEn: Knowledge is power that opens doors to countless opportunities in life always.
exampleZh: 知識是力量，總是為生活中無數機會打開大門。

exampleEn: She is a well-known author who has written many best-selling novels worldwide.
exampleZh: 她是一位著名的作家，寫了許多世界暢銷小說。

exampleEn: The science lab is equipped with modern equipment for conducting experiments safely.
exampleZh: 科學實驗室配備了現代設備，可以安全地進行實驗。

exampleEn: Please label all the boxes clearly before moving them to storage area.
exampleZh: 在將所有箱子移到儲藏區之前，請清楚地貼上標籤。

exampleEn: Manual labor can be physically demanding but provides honest work and income.
exampleZh: 體力勞動可能對身體要求很高，但提供誠實的工作和收入。

exampleEn: The research laboratory is conducting important experiments on new medicines and treatments.
exampleZh: 研究實驗室正在對新藥物和治療方法進行重要實驗。

exampleEn: The laborer worked hard on the construction site carrying heavy bricks all day.
exampleZh: 工人在建築工地上整天辛苦地搬運沉重的磚塊。

exampleEn: The project failed due to lack of proper planning and sufficient resources.
exampleZh: 由於缺乏適當的計畫和足夠的資源，專案失敗了。

exampleEn: Use a sturdy ladder when climbing to reach high places safely always.
exampleZh: 爬到高處時始終使用堅固的梯子以安全到達。

exampleEn: The elderly lady needs help carrying her heavy shopping bags to car.
exampleZh: 這位老婦人需要幫助把沉重的購物袋搬到車上。

exampleEn: The beautiful lake is surrounded by mountains and forests creating stunning scenery.
exampleZh: 美麗的湖泊被山脈和森林環繞，創造出令人驚嘆的景色。

exampleEn: Roast lamb is a traditional dish served during special family celebrations.
exampleZh: 烤羊肉是在特殊家庭慶祝活動中供應的傳統菜餚。

exampleEn: The horse became lame after injuring its leg during the race yesterday.
exampleZh: 這匹馬在昨天的比賽中傷了腿後變得跛腳。

exampleEn: Turn on the lamp because it's getting dark in the room now.
exampleZh: 打開燈，因為房間裡現在變暗了。

exampleEn: The medieval knight carried a long lance while riding his horse into battle.
exampleZh: 中世紀騎士騎馬進入戰鬥時帶著長矛。

exampleEn: The airplane will land at the airport in approximately thirty minutes time.
exampleZh: 飛機將在大約三十分鐘後降落在機場。

exampleEn: The plane made a smooth landing at the airport despite the strong winds.
exampleZh: 儘管強風，飛機在機場平穩著陸。

exampleEn: The landlady collects the rent from the tenants on the first of month.
exampleZh: 女房東在每個月的第一天向房客收取租金。

exampleEn: The landlord is responsible for maintaining the property and making necessary repairs promptly.
exampleZh: 房東負責維護房產並及時進行必要的維修。

exampleEn: The beautiful landscape painting captures the essence of the countryside perfectly and vividly.
exampleZh: 這幅美麗的風景畫完美生動地捕捉了鄉村的精髓。

exampleEn: Heavy rains caused a landslide that blocked the main road for several days.
exampleZh: 大雨引發了山體滑坡，堵塞了主要道路好幾天。

exampleEn: Stay in your lane while driving and don't change lanes suddenly without signaling.
exampleZh: 開車時保持在你的車道上，不要在沒有打信號的情況下突然變道。

exampleEn: Learning a foreign language opens doors to new cultures and career opportunities.
exampleZh: 學習外語為新文化和職業機會打開大門。

exampleEn: The child sat on her grandmother's lap listening to stories attentively and quietly.
exampleZh: 孩子坐在祖母的膝上專心安靜地聽故事。

exampleEn: I use my laptop to work remotely from coffee shops and libraries.
exampleZh: 我使用筆記本電腦在咖啡店和圖書館遠程工作。

exampleEn: The large crowd gathered in the square to celebrate the national holiday.
exampleZh: 大批人群聚集在廣場上慶祝國定假日。

exampleEn: The success of the project was largely due to excellent teamwork and planning.
exampleZh: 專案的成功主要歸功於出色的團隊合作和計畫。

exampleEn: The lark sang beautifully high up in the sky as the sun rose.
exampleZh: 太陽升起時，雲雀在天空中美妙地歌唱。

exampleEn: Laser technology is used in many medical procedures for precision and safety.
exampleZh: 雷射技術用於許多醫療程序以確保精確和安全。

exampleEn: This is the last chance to register for the course before deadline.
exampleZh: 這是在截止日期前註冊課程的最後機會。

exampleEn: He always leaves his homework until the last minute and gets stressed out.
exampleZh: 他總是把作業留到最後一分鐘，然後感到很有壓力。

exampleEn: Please write your first name and last name on the top line.
exampleZh: 請在第一行寫下你的名字和姓氏。

exampleEn: The peace treaty brought a lasting end to the conflict between the nations.
exampleZh: 和平條約結束了國家之間的衝突，帶來了持久的和平。

exampleEn: Lastly, I would like to thank my family for their unwavering support.
exampleZh: 最後，我要感謝我的家人給予我堅定不移的支持。

exampleEn: We made a last-minute decision to go to the beach for the weekend.
exampleZh: 我們在最後一分鐘決定週末去海灘。

exampleEn: I'm sorry I'm late; the traffic was terrible this morning everywhere.
exampleZh: 對不起我遲到了；今天早上到處交通都很糟糕。

exampleEn: Latecomers will not be admitted to the theater until the intermission break.
exampleZh: 遲到者直到中場休息才能進入劇院。

exampleEn: Have you seen him lately? I haven't talked to him for months.
exampleZh: 你最近見過他嗎？我好幾個月沒和他說話了。

exampleEn: I'll call you later this evening after I finish work at office.
exampleZh: 我今晚在辦公室完成工作後會打電話給你。

exampleEn: Have you heard the latest news about the upcoming election results and polls?
exampleZh: 你聽說過關於即將到來的選舉結果和民調的最新消息嗎？

exampleEn: Of the two options, I prefer the latter because it's more practical.
exampleZh: 在兩個選項中，我更喜歡後者，因為它更實用。

exampleEn: The comedian's jokes made everyone laugh until their sides hurt badly.
exampleZh: 喜劇演員的笑話讓每個人都笑到肚子疼。

exampleEn: The sound of children's laughter filled the playground during recess time happily.
exampleZh: 課間休息時，孩子們快樂的笑聲充滿了操場。

exampleEn: The company will launch its new product next month with big marketing campaign.
exampleZh: 公司將在下個月通過大型營銷活動推出新產品。

exampleEn: I need to do the laundry this weekend because I'm running out.
exampleZh: 我這週末需要洗衣服，因為我快沒衣服穿了。

exampleEn: Hot lava flowed down the side of the volcano, destroying everything in path.
exampleZh: 熱熔岩沿著火山的一側流下，摧毀了路徑上的一切。

exampleEn: Everyone must obey the law regardless of their position or wealth in society.
exampleZh: 無論在社會中的地位或財富如何，每個人都必須遵守法律。

exampleEn: Citizens have a right to engage in lawful protest against government policies.
exampleZh: 公民有權對政府政策進行合法抗議。

exampleEn: The lawmakers debated the new bill for hours before voting on it.
exampleZh: 立法者在投票前對新法案進行了數小時的辯論。

exampleEn: The lawn needs mowing because the grass has grown too tall recently.
exampleZh: 草坪需要修剪，因為草最近長得太高了。

exampleEn: They filed a lawsuit against the company for damages caused by the product.
exampleZh: 他們對公司提起訴訟，要求賠償產品造成的損失。

exampleEn: The lawyer defended his client skillfully in court and won the case.
exampleZh: 律師在法庭上巧妙地為他的委託人辯護並贏得了案件。

exampleEn: Please lay the books on the table carefully to avoid damaging them.
exampleZh: 請小心地把書放在桌子上以避免損壞它們。

exampleEn: He's nothing but a lazy layabout who refuses to find a job.
exampleZh: 他只不過是一個懶惰的遊手好閒的人，拒絕找工作。

exampleEn: Wear several layers of clothing to stay warm in cold winter weather.
exampleZh: 穿幾層衣服以在寒冷的冬天保持溫暖。

exampleEn: His laziness prevented him from achieving his full potential in his career.
exampleZh: 他的懶惰阻礙了他在職業生涯中發揮全部潛力。

exampleEn: Don't be lazy; get up and help with the household chores.
exampleZh: 別懶惰；起來幫忙做家務。

exampleEn: A good leader should lead by example and inspire others to excel.
exampleZh: 一個好的領導者應該以身作則並激勵他人追求卓越。

exampleEn: The team leader is responsible for coordinating everyone's efforts and ensuring success.
exampleZh: 團隊領導者負責協調每個人的努力並確保成功。

exampleEn: Strong leadership is essential for guiding organizations through difficult times and challenges.
exampleZh: 強有力的領導對於引導組織度過困難時期和挑戰至關重要。

exampleEn: She's a leading expert in her field with numerous publications and awards.
exampleZh: 她是她領域的頂尖專家，有許多出版物和獎項。

exampleEn: The autumn leaves turn beautiful shades of red and gold before falling.
exampleZh: 秋葉在落下之前變成美麗的紅色和金色。

exampleEn: Someone handed me a leaflet advertising a new restaurant opening in town.
exampleZh: 有人遞給我一張傳單，宣傳城裡新開的餐廳。

exampleEn: The football league consists of twenty teams competing for the championship title.
exampleZh: 足球聯賽由二十支球隊組成，爭奪冠軍頭銜。

exampleEn: The roof has a leak that needs fixing before the rainy season.
exampleZh: 屋頂有一個漏洞，需要在雨季前修理。

exampleEn: Don't lean against the wet paint on the wall or you'll ruin clothes.
exampleZh: 不要靠在牆上的濕油漆上，否則你會毀了衣服。

exampleEn: The athlete took a giant leap and cleared the high bar easily.
exampleZh: 這位運動員跳了一大步，輕鬆越過了高桿。

exampleEn: Children learn best through hands-on experience and active participation in activities.
exampleZh: 孩子們通過實踐經驗和積極參與活動學習得最好。

exampleEn: Every learner progresses at their own pace and should not be compared.
exampleZh: 每個學習者都以自己的速度進步，不應該被比較。

exampleEn: Lifelong learning is important for personal growth and staying relevant in careers.
exampleZh: 終身學習對於個人成長和在職業生涯中保持相關性很重要。

exampleEn: We signed a one-year lease for the apartment with an option to renew.
exampleZh: 我們為公寓簽署了一年的租約，可以選擇續簽。
