exampleEn: I made a cheese and mushroom omelet for breakfast this morning.
exampleZh: 我今天早上做了起司蘑菇煎蛋捲當早餐。

exampleEn: The book is on the table next to the lamp right now.
exampleZh: 書現在在桌子上燈旁邊。

exampleEn: I've only been to London once but would love to return.
exampleZh: 我只去過倫敦一次，但很想再去。

exampleEn: One of my friends is getting married next month in Hawaii.
exampleZh: 我的一個朋友下個月要在夏威夷結婚。

exampleEn: It is important to believe in oneself and have confidence in one's abilities.
exampleZh: 相信自己並對自己的能力有信心很重要。

exampleEn: Chop the onion finely before adding it to the soup for flavor.
exampleZh: 在加入湯中之前將洋蔥切碎以增加風味。

exampleEn: Shopping online is convenient but you can't try things on first.
exampleZh: 網上購物很方便，但你不能先試穿東西。

exampleEn: This is the only chance we have to make things right.
exampleZh: 這是我們糾正事情的唯一機會。

exampleEn: The actor felt nervous before going onstage to perform in front of the audience.
exampleZh: 演員在台上在觀眾面前表演之前感到緊張。

exampleEn: The cat jumped onto the table to try and reach the fish bowl.
exampleZh: 貓跳上桌子試圖夠到魚缸。

exampleEn: Please open the window to let some fresh air into the room.
exampleZh: 請打開窗戶讓一些新鮮空氣進入房間。

exampleEn: The grand opening of the new store attracted hundreds of customers yesterday.
exampleZh: 新店的盛大開幕昨天吸引了數百名顧客。

exampleEn: She spoke openly about her struggles with mental health to help others.
exampleZh: 她公開談論她與心理健康的鬥爭以幫助他人。

exampleEn: The opera performance was spectacular with beautiful music and costumes throughout.
exampleZh: 歌劇表演非常壯觀，整場都有美妙的音樂和服裝。

exampleEn: The surgeon will operate on the patient early tomorrow morning at hospital.
exampleZh: 外科醫生明天一早將在醫院為病人動手術。

exampleEn: The rescue operation saved dozens of people trapped in the collapsed building.
exampleZh: 救援行動拯救了被困在倒塌建築物中的數十人。

exampleEn: The machine operator must follow safety procedures carefully at all times.
exampleZh: 機器操作員必須始終仔細遵守安全程序。

exampleEn: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion even if others disagree.
exampleZh: 每個人都有權發表自己的意見，即使其他人不同意。

exampleEn: The chess player studied his opponent's moves carefully before making decisions.
exampleZh: 棋手在做決定前仔細研究對手的走法。

exampleEn: This job offers a great opportunity for career growth and development.
exampleZh: 這份工作為職業成長和發展提供了很好的機會。

exampleEn: Many citizens oppose the new policy because of its negative impact.
exampleZh: 許多公民反對新政策，因為它的負面影響。

exampleEn: The library is located on the opposite side of the street from school.
exampleZh: 圖書館位於街道對面，與學校相對。

exampleEn: The proposal faced strong opposition from environmental groups and activists nationwide.
exampleZh: 該提案遭到全國環保團體和活動人士的強烈反對。

exampleEn: The dictator oppressed the people by denying them basic rights and freedoms.
exampleZh: 獨裁者通過剝奪人民基本權利和自由來壓迫他們。

exampleEn: The people fought against the oppression of the ruthless dictator for freedom.
exampleZh: 人民為了自由反抗無情獨裁者的壓迫。

exampleEn: Despite the difficulties, she maintained a sense of optimism about the future.
exampleZh: 儘管困難重重，她仍對未來保持樂觀。

exampleEn: As an optimist, he always looks for the silver lining in every situation.
exampleZh: 作為一個樂觀主義者，他總是在每種情況下尋找一線希望。

exampleEn: Despite challenges, she remains optimistic about the future and her goals.
exampleZh: 儘管面臨挑戰，她對未來和目標仍然保持樂觀。

exampleEn: You have two options: accept the offer or continue searching for jobs.
exampleZh: 你有兩個選擇：接受這個提議或繼續找工作。

exampleEn: Attendance at the meeting is optional but highly recommended for everyone.
exampleZh: 參加會議是可選的，但強烈建議每個人參加。

exampleEn: Would you like tea or coffee with your breakfast this morning?
exampleZh: 你今天早上早餐想喝茶還是咖啡？

exampleEn: The oral examination tests students' speaking skills and pronunciation in English.
exampleZh: 口試測試學生的英語口語技能和發音。

exampleEn: Fresh orange juice is delicious and packed with vitamin C for health.
exampleZh: 新鮮橙汁美味且富含維生素C，有益健康。

exampleEn: He was a gifted orator who could inspire crowds with his powerful speeches.
exampleZh: 他是一位有天賦的演說家，可以用他強有力的演講激勵人群。

exampleEn: The Earth orbits the sun once every 365 days completing one year.
exampleZh: 地球每三百六十五天繞太陽一周，完成一年。

exampleEn: The symphony orchestra performed Beethoven's music beautifully at the concert hall.
exampleZh: 交響樂團在音樂廳美妙地演奏了貝多芬的音樂。

exampleEn: The movie soundtrack features beautiful orchestral music that enhances the emotional scenes.
exampleZh: 這部電影的原聲帶以美麗的管弦樂為特色，增強了情感場景。

exampleEn: The orchid is a delicate flower that requires special care to bloom properly.
exampleZh: 蘭花是一種嬌嫩的花，需要特別照料才能適當開花。

exampleEn: Please place your order at the counter and wait for your number.
exampleZh: 請在櫃檯下訂單並等待你的號碼。

exampleEn: The students lined up in an orderly fashion before entering the classroom quietly.
exampleZh: 學生們在安靜地進入教室之前井然有序地排好隊。

exampleEn: It was just an ordinary day until something extraordinary happened unexpectedly.
exampleZh: 這只是一個普通的日子，直到意外發生了不尋常的事情。

exampleEn: The heart is a vital organ that pumps blood throughout the body.
exampleZh: 心臟是一個重要的器官，將血液泵送到全身。

exampleEn: Organic vegetables are grown without chemical pesticides or synthetic fertilizers for health.
exampleZh: 有機蔬菜在沒有化學農藥或合成肥料的情況下種植，有益健康。

exampleEn: A single-celled organism is the simplest form of life on our planet.
exampleZh: 單細胞生物是我們星球上最簡單的生命形式。

exampleEn: The charity organization provides food and shelter for homeless people in need.
exampleZh: 這個慈善組織為有需要的無家可歸者提供食物和住所。

exampleEn: We need to organize the files properly to find information quickly.
exampleZh: 我們需要適當地整理文件以快速找到資訊。

exampleEn: She is a very organized person who keeps her schedule and files in perfect order.
exampleZh: 她是一個非常有條理的人，把她的日程安排和文件整理得井井有條。

exampleEn: The event organizer did a great job planning the conference and managing details.
exampleZh: 活動組織者在策劃會議和管理細節方面做得很好。

exampleEn: The origin of this tradition dates back hundreds of years to ancient times.
exampleZh: 這個傳統的起源可以追溯到幾百年前的古代。

exampleEn: The original painting is worth millions but copies are much cheaper.
exampleZh: 原畫價值數百萬，但複製品便宜得多。

exampleEn: The artist was praised for the originality and creativity of his unique work.
exampleZh: 這位藝術家因其獨特作品的原創性和創造力而受到稱讚。

exampleEn: The building was originally constructed as a hospital in the 1800s.
exampleZh: 這座建築最初在一八零零年代建造時是一家醫院。

exampleEn: The tradition is thought to originate from ancient festivals celebrating the harvest.
exampleZh: 這個傳統被認為起源於慶祝豐收的古代節日。

exampleEn: She hung a shiny Christmas ornament on the tree to add some sparkle.
exampleZh: 她在樹上掛了一個閃亮的聖誕裝飾品，增添了一些光彩。

exampleEn: The war left many children as orphans with no parents to care for them.
exampleZh: 戰爭使許多孩子成為孤兒，沒有父母照顧他們。

exampleEn: Some people prefer coffee while others like tea better for breakfast.
exampleZh: 有些人喜歡咖啡，而其他人更喜歡早餐喝茶。

exampleEn: Leave now; otherwise, you'll be late for the important meeting downtown.
exampleZh: 現在離開；否則，你會遲到市中心的重要會議。

exampleEn: You ought to apologize to your friend for saying those hurtful things.
exampleZh: 你應該為說了那些傷人的話向你的朋友道歉。

exampleEn: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure, as the saying goes.
exampleZh: 俗話說，一盎司的預防勝過一磅的治療。

exampleEn: Our team worked hard together to win the championship this year.
exampleZh: 我們的團隊今年努力合作贏得了冠軍。

exampleEn: That house on the corner with the red door is ours.
exampleZh: 拐角處那棟有紅門的房子是我們的。

exampleEn: We should be proud of ourselves for completing this difficult project successfully.
exampleZh: 我們應該為成功完成這個困難的專案而感到自豪。

exampleEn: Let's go out for dinner tonight instead of cooking at home.
exampleZh: 今晚我們出去吃晚餐，而不是在家做飯。

exampleEn: We are out of milk, so I need to go to the store to buy some.
exampleZh: 我們的牛奶用完了，所以我需要去商店買一些。

exampleEn: They went on an adventure tour through the rugged Australian outback.
exampleZh: 他們在崎嶇的澳洲內陸進行了一次冒險之旅。

exampleEn: The outbreak of the flu virus caused many schools to close temporarily.
exampleZh: 流感病毒的爆發導致許多學校暫時關閉。

exampleEn: The outcome of the election will determine the country's future direction.
exampleZh: 選舉結果將決定國家的未來方向。

exampleEn: The fast runner managed to outdistance all his competitors in the final lap.
exampleZh: 這位快跑者設法在最後一圈超越了所有競爭對手。

exampleEn: She always tries to outdo her brother in everything they do together.
exampleZh: 她總是試圖在他們一起做的每件事上勝過她的兄弟。

exampleEn: Outdoor activities like hiking and camping are popular during summer months.
exampleZh: 像健行和露營這樣的戶外活動在夏季很受歡迎。

exampleEn: Children should spend more time playing outdoors for physical and mental health.
exampleZh: 孩子們應該花更多時間在戶外玩耍以促進身心健康。

exampleEn: The outer layer of the Earth's atmosphere protects us from harmful radiation.
exampleZh: 地球大氣層的外層保護我們免受有害輻射。

exampleEn: She bought a new outfit specifically for the wedding ceremony next week.
exampleZh: 她專門為下週的婚禮買了一套新衣服。

exampleEn: Children outgrow their clothes very quickly, so parents buy new ones often.
exampleZh: 孩子們很快就穿不下衣服，所以父母經常買新的。

exampleEn: The company organized a staff outing to the beach for a day of fun.
exampleZh: 公司組織了一次去海灘的員工郊遊，享受一天的樂趣。

exampleEn: In the old west, the outlaw was wanted by the sheriff for bank robbery.
exampleZh: 在舊西部，這名不法之徒因搶劫銀行而被治安官通緝。

exampleEn: Writing poetry is a creative outlet for her to express her emotions freely.
exampleZh: 寫詩是她自由表達情感的一種創造性發洩方式。

exampleEn: Please provide an outline of your presentation before the meeting tomorrow.
exampleZh: 請在明天會議前提供你簡報的大綱。

exampleEn: Women statistically tend to outlive men by several years on average worldwide.
exampleZh: 據統計，全世界女性的平均壽命往往比男性長幾年。

exampleEn: Despite the challenges, he maintains a positive outlook on life and future.
exampleZh: 儘管面臨挑戰，他對生活和未來仍保持積極的看法。

exampleEn: The information in this textbook is out-of-date and needs to be updated.
exampleZh: 這本教科書中的資訊已過時，需要更新。

exampleEn: She was treated as an outpatient and allowed to go home the same day.
exampleZh: 她作為門診病人接受治療，並被允許當天回家。

exampleEn: The factory's output has increased significantly since installing new machinery recently.
exampleZh: 自從最近安裝新機器以來，工廠的產量顯著增加。

exampleEn: The public expressed their outrage at the government's decision to cut funding.
exampleZh: 公眾對政府削減資金的決定表示憤怒。

exampleEn: The prices at that luxury store are absolutely outrageous and unaffordable for most.
exampleZh: 那家奢侈品店的價格絕對令人髮指，大多數人都負擔不起。

exampleEn: Her talent and charisma allowed her to outshine everyone else on the stage.
exampleZh: 她的才華和魅力讓她在舞台上超越了其他人。

exampleEn: It's raining outside, so bring an umbrella when you leave today.
exampleZh: 外面在下雨，所以今天離開時帶把傘。

exampleEn: As an outsider to the group, he didn't understand their inside jokes.
exampleZh: 作為這個群體的局外人，他不明白他們的內部笑話。

exampleEn: They live in a quiet neighborhood on the outskirts of the busy city.
exampleZh: 他們住在繁忙城市郊區的一個安靜社區裡。

exampleEn: She received an award for her outstanding contributions to medical research worldwide.
exampleZh: 她因對全球醫學研究的傑出貢獻而獲獎。

exampleEn: The door opens outward, so pull it towards you to enter.
exampleZh: 門向外開，所以拉向你以進入。

exampleEn: Outwardly she seemed calm, but inside she was panicking about the news.
exampleZh: 表面上她看起來很平靜，但內心卻對這個消息感到恐慌。

exampleEn: The benefits of the new plan far outweigh the risks involved in it.
exampleZh: 新計畫的好處遠遠超過了其中涉及的風險。

exampleEn: The dining table has an oval shape that seats eight people comfortably.
exampleZh: 餐桌呈橢圓形，可舒適地容納八個人。

exampleEn: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees before baking the cake for best results.
exampleZh: 在烤蛋糕之前將烤箱預熱到一百八十度以獲得最佳效果。

exampleEn: The plane flew over the mountains during our scenic flight yesterday.
exampleZh: 飛機昨天在我們的風景飛行中飛越了山脈。

exampleEn: Overall, the project was successful despite some minor setbacks along the way.
exampleZh: 總的來說，儘管過程中有一些小挫折，專案還是成功的。

exampleEn: He fell overboard during the storm, but was rescued by the coast guard.
exampleZh: 他在暴風雨中落水，但被海岸警衛隊救起。

exampleEn: Airlines sometimes overbook flights assuming some passengers will not show up.
exampleZh: 航空公司有時會超售航班，假設有些乘客不會出現。

exampleEn: He wore a heavy wool overcoat to protect himself from the winter cold.
exampleZh: 他穿著厚重的羊毛大衣來抵禦冬天的寒冷。

exampleEn: She overcame many obstacles to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
exampleZh: 她克服了許多障礙，實現了成為醫生的夢想。

exampleEn: We cannot overemphasize the importance of safety in the workplace environment.
exampleZh: 我們怎麼強調工作場所環境中安全的重要性都不為過。

exampleEn: Do not overestimate your ability to finish the project in such a short time.
exampleZh: 不要高估你在如此短的時間內完成專案的能力。

exampleEn: I accidentally overheard their conversation while standing in line at the coffee shop.
exampleZh: 我在咖啡店排隊時無意中聽到了他們的談話。

exampleEn: She was overjoyed when she received the acceptance letter from her dream university.
exampleZh: 當她收到夢想大學的錄取通知書時，她喜出望外。

exampleEn: The two meetings overlap, so I can only attend part of each one.
exampleZh: 這兩次會議重疊，所以我只能參加每次會議的一部分。

exampleEn: The hotel room overlooks the beautiful ocean with stunning views all around.
exampleZh: 飯店房間俯瞰美麗的海洋，周圍景色迷人。

exampleEn: Don't be overly critical of yourself; everyone makes mistakes sometimes in life.
exampleZh: 不要對自己過分挑剔；每個人在生活中這時都會犯錯。

exampleEn: The package will be delivered overnight and arrive by tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 包裹將在夜間送達，明天早上到達。

exampleEn: Many students choose to study overseas to experience different cultures and education.
exampleZh: 許多學生選擇出國留學以體驗不同的文化和教育。

exampleEn: His achievements were overshadowed by the scandal that broke out shortly after.
exampleZh: 他的成就被不久後爆發的醜聞蒙上了陰影。

exampleEn: Please check your oversize baggage at the special counter before your flight.
exampleZh: 請在飛行前在特殊櫃檯托運您的超大行李。

exampleEn: He felt that his boss had overstepped the boundaries by calling him at home.
exampleZh: 他覺得他的老闆打電話到他家是越界了。

exampleEn: It is dangerous to overtake another car on a curve or a hill.
exampleZh: 在彎道或山坡上超車是危險的。

exampleEn: The rebels planned to overthrow the government and establish a new democracy.
exampleZh: 叛軍計畫推翻政府並建立新的民主制度。

exampleEn: He worked overtime all week to meet the deadline for the important project.
exampleZh: 他這週整週都在加班，以趕上重要專案的截止日期。

exampleEn: The huge waves threatened to overturn the small boat in the stormy sea.
exampleZh: 巨浪威脅要傾覆暴風雨海中的小船。

exampleEn: Being overweight increases the risk of heart disease and diabetes significantly.
exampleZh: 超重顯著增加患心臟病和糖尿病的風險。

exampleEn: The sheer number of emails in my inbox started to overwhelm me completely.
exampleZh: 收件箱中大量的電子郵件開始讓我完全不知所措。

exampleEn: The response to the charity appeal was overwhelming, with thousands of donations.
exampleZh: 對慈善呼籲的反應是壓倒性的，有數千筆捐款。

exampleEn: Stress from overwork can lead to burnout and serious health problems.
exampleZh: 過度工作的壓力會導致倦怠和嚴重的健康問題。

exampleEn: Ow! That really hurt when you stepped on my toe with your heavy boot.
exampleZh: 哎喲！你用沉重的靴子踩到我的腳趾時真的很痛。

exampleEn: I owe you an apology for my rude behavior at dinner.
exampleZh: 我因為我在晚餐時的粗魯行為欠你一個道歉。

exampleEn: Owing to bad weather, the flight was delayed for several hours today.
exampleZh: 由於天氣惡劣，今天航班延誤了幾個小時。

exampleEn: The game was cancelled owing to the heavy rain and thunderstorm.
exampleZh: 由於大雨和雷暴，比賽被取消。

exampleEn: The owl is a nocturnal bird that hunts for prey at night.
exampleZh: 貓頭鷹是一種夜行性鳥類，在夜間捕獵獵物。

exampleEn: I want to own my own business someday and be independent.
exampleZh: 我想有一天擁有自己的生意並獨立。

exampleEn: The shop owner greets every customer warmly when they enter the store.
exampleZh: 店主在每位顧客進入商店時都熱情地問候他們。

exampleEn: The farmer used an ox to plow the fields before modern tractors.
exampleZh: 在現代拖拉機之前，農民用牛來犁田。

exampleEn: Oxygen is essential for human survival and we breathe it constantly.
exampleZh: 氧氣對人類生存至關重要，我們不斷呼吸它。

exampleEn: The ozone layer protects the Earth from harmful ultraviolet radiation from sun.
exampleZh: 臭氧層保護地球免受來自太陽的有害紫外線輻射。

exampleEn: The meeting is scheduled to start at 2:00 p.m. this afternoon.
exampleZh: 會議定於今天下午 2:00 開始。

exampleEn: My pa taught me how to fish when I was a little boy.
exampleZh: 我小時候爸爸教我如何釣魚。

exampleEn: Walk at a steady pace to maintain energy during the long hike.
exampleZh: 以穩定的步伐行走以在長途健行中保持精力。

exampleEn: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest ocean on Earth.
exampleZh: 太平洋是地球上最大和最深的海洋。

exampleEn: Don't forget to pack warm clothes for the trip to mountains.
exampleZh: 別忘了為去山區的旅行打包保暖衣物。

exampleEn: The package arrived damaged, so I requested a replacement from the company.
exampleZh: 包裹到達時損壞了，所以我向公司要求更換。

exampleEn: The stadium was packed with fans cheering for their favorite team loudly.
exampleZh: 體育場擠滿了粉絲，大聲為他們最喜歡的球隊歡呼。

exampleEn: Add one packet of sugar to your coffee if you like it sweet.
exampleZh: 如果你喜歡甜的，在咖啡中加一包糖。

exampleEn: We spend all day packing our boxes for the move to the new house.
exampleZh: 我們花了一整天打包箱子準備搬到新家。

exampleEn: She used a notepad to write down ideas during the brainstorming meeting.
exampleZh: 她在集思廣益會議期間用筆記本記下想法。

exampleEn: We used a wooden paddle to steer the canoe down the river.
exampleZh: 我們用木槳駕駛獨木舟順流而下。

exampleEn: Turn to page fifty in your textbook to begin today's lesson.
exampleZh: 翻到課本第五十頁開始今天的課程。

exampleEn: She has a well-paid job that allows her to travel frequently.
exampleZh: 她有一份薪水很高的工作，讓她可以經常旅行。

exampleEn: The medicine will help relieve the pain in your back quickly.
exampleZh: 這種藥會幫助快速緩解你背部的疼痛。

exampleEn: The injury was very painful and required immediate medical attention from doctors.
exampleZh: 這個傷很痛，需要醫生立即醫療照顧。

exampleEn: We need to paint the walls before moving into the new house.
exampleZh: 我們需要在搬進新房子之前粉刷牆壁。

exampleEn: The artist dipped her paintbrush into the blue paint and began to paint.
exampleZh: 藝術家將畫筆浸入藍色顏料並開始繪畫。

exampleEn: The famous painter created masterpieces that are displayed in museums worldwide.
exampleZh: 這位著名畫家創作的傑作在全球博物館展出。

exampleEn: The beautiful painting hanging on the wall is worth thousands of dollars.
exampleZh: 掛在牆上的美麗畫作價值數千美元。

exampleEn: I bought a new pair of shoes for the wedding next month.
exampleZh: 我為下個月的婚禮買了一雙新鞋。

exampleEn: I put on my comfortable pajamas and got ready for a good sleep.
exampleZh: 我穿上舒適的睡衣，準備睡個好覺。

exampleEn: He's been my best pal since we were in kindergarten together.
exampleZh: 自從我們一起上幼兒園以來，他一直是我最好的朋友。

exampleEn: The royal palace is open to tourists during summer months every year.
exampleZh: 皇宮每年夏季向遊客開放。

exampleEn: She looked pale and tired after working long hours without rest.
exampleZh: 在長時間工作沒有休息後，她看起來蒼白疲憊。

exampleEn: The goods were stacked on a wooden pallet for transport by forklift.
exampleZh: 貨物堆放在木托盤上，以便用叉車運輸。

exampleEn: The fortune teller examined the lines on my palm carefully and thoroughly.
exampleZh: 算命師仔細徹底地檢查了我手掌上的紋路。

exampleEn: Heat the frying pan before adding oil and cooking the vegetables.
exampleZh: 在加油和炒蔬菜之前先加熱煎鍋。

exampleEn: We had delicious pancakes with maple syrup for breakfast this morning.
exampleZh: 我們今天早上早餐吃了美味的煎餅配楓糖漿。

exampleEn: The global pandemic forced lock downs and changed how we live daily.
exampleZh: 全球大流行迫使封鎖並改變了我們的日常生活方式。

exampleEn: A panel of experts discussed the future of renewable energy technologies.
exampleZh: 專家小組討論了可再生能源技術的未來。

exampleEn: Don't panic during emergencies; stay calm and think clearly about solutions.
exampleZh: 在緊急情況下不要驚慌；保持冷靜並清楚地思考解決方案。

exampleEn: He wore a pair of black dress pants to the formal dinner event.
exampleZh: 他穿著一條黑色西褲參加正式晚宴活動。

exampleEn: Papaya is a tropical fruit with sweet orange flesh and black seeds.
exampleZh: 木瓜是一種熱帶水果，有甜橙色的果肉和黑色的種子。

exampleEn: Please write your answers on the paper provided for the examination.
exampleZh: 請在提供的紙上寫下你的考試答案。

exampleEn: The office is going paperless to save trees and reduce waste significantly.
exampleZh: 辦公室正在無紙化以節省樹木並顯著減少浪費。

exampleEn: There is a lot of paperwork involved in applying for a visa.
exampleZh: 申請簽證涉及很多文書工作。

exampleEn: The skydiver's parachute opened safely as he jumped from the airplane high above.
exampleZh: 跳傘者從高空飛機上跳下時，降落傘安全打開。

exampleEn: The colorful parade attracted thousands of spectators lining the streets downtown.
exampleZh: 五彩繽紛的遊行吸引了數千名觀眾在市中心街道兩旁觀看。

exampleEn: The tropical island with its white beaches looked like a paradise on Earth.
exampleZh: 擁有白色沙灘的熱帶島嶼看起來像地球上的天堂。

exampleEn: It is a paradox that computers save time but we seem busier than ever.
exampleZh: 這是一個悖論，電腦節省時間，但我們似乎比以往任何時候都忙。

exampleEn: Write a short paragraph explaining your opinion on this important topic clearly.
exampleZh: 寫一個簡短的段落清楚地解釋你對這個重要話題的看法。

exampleEn: The accident caused paralysis in his legs, and he couldn't walk anymore.
exampleZh: 事故導致他雙腿癱瘓，再也無法走路了。

exampleEn: Fear can sometimes paralyze you, making it impossible to move or react.
exampleZh: 恐懼有時會讓你癱瘓，讓你無法移動或反應。

exampleEn: The paramedic provided emergency medical care to the injured driver at scene.
exampleZh: 護理人員在現場為受傷司機提供緊急醫療護理。

exampleEn: The paratrooper jumped out of the plane and parachuted into enemy territory.
exampleZh: 傘兵跳出飛機，跳傘進入敵方領土。

exampleEn: The parcel should arrive within three to five business days by mail.
exampleZh: 包裹應該在三到五個工作日內通過郵件到達。

exampleEn: I beg your pardon; I didn't hear what you said clearly.
exampleZh: 請原諒；我沒有清楚聽到你說的話。

exampleEn: Parents play a crucial role in their children's education and development.
exampleZh: 父母在孩子的教育和發展中起著至關重要的作用。

exampleEn: Parental guidance is recommended for children watching this movie due to violence.
exampleZh: 由於暴力，建議兒童在觀看此電影時有父母指導。

exampleEn: The children love playing in the park on sunny weekend afternoons.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在陽光明媚的週末下午在公園玩耍。

exampleEn: Finding parking in the city center is difficult during busy hours.
exampleZh: 在繁忙時段在市中心找停車位很困難。

exampleEn: Parliament passed new legislation to address environmental concerns and climate change.
exampleZh: 議會通過了新立法以解決環境問題和氣候變遷。

exampleEn: The colorful parrot mimicked the sound of the telephone ringing perfectly.
exampleZh: 這隻色彩繽紛的鸚鵡完美地模仿了電話鈴聲。

exampleEn: Reading is an important part of learning any new language effectively.
exampleZh: 閱讀是有效學習任何新語言的重要部分。

exampleEn: The fingerprint was only a partial match, so it wasn't conclusive evidence.
exampleZh: 指紋只是部分匹配，所以這不是確鑿的證據。

exampleEn: Every participant in the race received a medal for completing the course.
exampleZh: 比賽的每位參與者都獲得了完成課程的獎牌。

exampleEn: Students are encouraged to participate actively in class discussions and activities.
exampleZh: 鼓勵學生積極參與課堂討論和活動。

exampleEn: Active participation in class discussions is encouraged to enhance learning experience.
exampleZh: 鼓勵積極參與課堂討論以增強學習體驗。

exampleEn: In the phrase 'broken window', 'broken' is a past participle used as adjective.
exampleZh: 在短語 'broken window' 中，'broken' 是一個用作形容詞的過去分詞。

exampleEn: Dust particles floating in the air can cause allergies and breathing problems.
exampleZh: 漂浮在空氣中的灰塵顆粒會引起過敏與呼吸問題。

exampleEn: This particular restaurant is famous for its authentic Italian cuisine and atmosphere.
exampleZh: 這家特別的餐廳以其正宗的義大利美食和氛圍而聞名。

exampleEn: I particularly enjoy reading mystery novels during my free time at home.
exampleZh: 我特別喜歡在家空閒時間讀推理小說。

exampleEn: The debate became highly partisan, with neither side willing to compromise.
exampleZh: 辯論變得非常黨派化，雙方都不願妥協。

exampleEn: The delay was partly due to technical problems with the equipment.
exampleZh: 延誤部分是由於設備的技術問題。

exampleEn: My business partner and I have worked together successfully for ten years.
exampleZh: 我的商業夥伴和我已經成功合作了十年。

exampleEn: The partnership between the two companies has been mutually beneficial for both.
exampleZh: 兩家公司之間的合作關係對雙方都互惠互利。

exampleEn: She works a part-time job at the library while she attends university.
exampleZh: 她在上大學時在圖書館兼職。

exampleEn: We're having a birthday party for my daughter next Saturday afternoon.
exampleZh: 我們下週六下午為我女兒舉辦生日派對。

exampleEn: You need to study hard to pass the final examination successfully.
exampleZh: 你需要努力學習才能成功通過期末考試。

exampleEn: Read the passage carefully before answering the comprehension questions below it.
exampleZh: 在回答下面的理解問題之前仔細閱讀這段文章。

exampleEn: All passengers must fasten their seatbelts during takeoff and landing for safety.
exampleZh: 為了安全，所有乘客在起飛和降落期間必須繫好安全帶。

exampleEn: She has a passion for music and practices piano every day.
exampleZh: 她對音樂充滿熱情，每天練習鋼琴。

exampleEn: He is passionate about cooking and dreams of opening his own restaurant.
exampleZh: 他對烹飪充滿熱情，夢想開自己的餐廳。

exampleEn: She argued passionately for the rights of animals to be treated humanely.
exampleZh: 她充滿激情地爭辯說動物有權受到人道對待。

exampleEn: Don't be passive; take action to solve problems instead of waiting.
exampleZh: 不要被動；採取行動解決問題而不是等待。

exampleEn: Make sure your passport is valid before traveling to foreign countries.
exampleZh: 在出國旅行前確保你的護照有效。

exampleEn: Please enter your username and password to log in to your account.
exampleZh: 請輸入您的用戶名和密碼以登錄您的帳戶。

exampleEn: We can learn valuable lessons from mistakes made in the past.
exampleZh: 我們可以從過去犯的錯誤中學到寶貴的教訓。

exampleEn: We had Italian pasta with a rich tomato sauce for dinner last night.
exampleZh: 我們昨晚晚餐吃了配濃郁番茄醬的義大利麵。

exampleEn: The pastor delivered an inspiring sermon to the congregation on Sunday morning.
exampleZh: 牧師在週日上午向會眾發表了鼓舞人心的佈道。

exampleEn: The painting depicts a peaceful pastoral scene with sheep grazing in fields.
exampleZh: 這幅畫描繪了一個寧靜的田園場景，綿羊在田野裡吃草。

exampleEn: The gardener planted a vegetable patch in the backyard for fresh produce.
exampleZh: 園丁在後院種了一塊菜地以獲得新鮮農產品。

exampleEn: Follow the narrow path through the forest to reach the lake.
exampleZh: 沿著穿過森林的狹窄小路到達湖邊。

exampleEn: Teaching young children requires patience and understanding from adults always.
exampleZh: 教導幼兒總是需要成人的耐心和理解。

exampleEn: The doctor examined the patient carefully before making a diagnosis and treatment.
exampleZh: 醫生在做出診斷和治療之前仔細檢查了病人。

exampleEn: She waited patiently in line for over an hour without complaining.
exampleZh: 她耐心地排隊等了一個多小時而沒有抱怨。

exampleEn: He considered himself a true patriot who loved his country deeply.
exampleZh: 他認為自己是一個深愛自己國家的真正愛國者。

exampleEn: The crowd waved flags and sang patriotic songs on Independence Day.
exampleZh: 人群在獨立日揮舞旗幟並唱愛國歌曲。

exampleEn: Patriotism inspires people to serve their country and work for its betterment.
exampleZh: 愛國主義激勵人們為國家服務並為其改善而努力。

exampleEn: Security guards patrol the building at night to ensure safety and security.
exampleZh: 保全在夜間巡邏大樓以確保安全。

exampleEn: He is a regular patron of the arts and supports local museums.
exampleZh: 他是藝術的常客，支持當地博物館。

exampleEn: The fabric has a beautiful floral pattern with bright colors throughout.
exampleZh: 這塊織物有美麗的花卉圖案，整體色彩鮮豔。

exampleEn: Let's pause for a moment to review what we've learned today.
exampleZh: 讓我們暫停一下，回顧我們今天學到的東西。

exampleEn: This new agreement will pave the way for increased trade between countries.
exampleZh: 這項新協議將為增加國家之間的貿易鋪平道路。

exampleEn: Be careful not to trip on the uneven pavement when walking.
exampleZh: 走路時小心不要被不平的人行道絆倒。

exampleEn: The cat's soft paw gently touched my hand seeking attention and affection.
exampleZh: 貓柔軟的爪子輕輕觸摸我的手，尋求關注和喜愛。

exampleEn: He went to the pawnbroker to sell his watch for some quick cash.
exampleZh: 他去當舖賣手錶以換取一些快錢。

exampleEn: You can find interesting secondhand items at the local pawnshop sometimes.
exampleZh: 你有時可以在當地的當舖找到有趣的二手物品。

exampleEn: Don't forget to pay the electricity bill before the deadline this month.
exampleZh: 別忘了在本月截止日期前支付電費。

exampleEn: The payment is due on the first of each month regularly.
exampleZh: 付款定期在每月一日到期。

exampleEn: I use my PC for work, gaming, and staying in touch with friends.
exampleZh: 我使用個人電腦工作、玩遊戲以及與朋友保持聯繫。

exampleEn: Fresh green peas are nutritious and delicious when cooked properly with care.
exampleZh: 新鮮的青豆營養豐富，用心適當烹飪時很美味。

exampleEn: World peace is a goal that requires cooperation from all nations.
exampleZh: 世界和平是一個需要所有國家合作的目標。

exampleEn: The countryside is peaceful and quiet, perfect for relaxation and rest.
exampleZh: 鄉村寧靜安靜，非常適合放鬆和休息。

exampleEn: The two countries have lived peacefully side by side for many decades.
exampleZh: 這兩個國家幾十年來一直和平共處。

exampleEn: The ripe peach was sweet and juicy, perfect for summer desserts.
exampleZh: 成熟的桃子又甜又多汁，非常適合夏季甜點。

exampleEn: The mountain peak is covered with snow all year round constantly.
exampleZh: 山峰常年被雪覆蓋。

exampleEn: Peanut butter is a popular spread for sandwiches and toast everywhere.
exampleZh: 花生醬是到處都受歡迎的三明治和吐司塗抹醬。

exampleEn: Fresh pears are delicious when eaten ripe and at perfect ripeness.
exampleZh: 新鮮梨在成熟和完美成熟度時食用很美味。

exampleEn: The necklace was made of beautiful pearls from the ocean depths.
exampleZh: 這條項鍊由來自海洋深處的美麗珍珠製成。

exampleEn: Children love collecting smooth pebbles from the beach during summer vacations.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在暑假期間從海灘收集光滑的鵝卵石。

exampleEn: The house has a peculiar smell that I can't quite identify.
exampleZh: 這房子有一種我無法確定的奇特氣味。

exampleEn: You need to pedal harder to get the bicycle up the steep hill.
exampleZh: 你需要更用力地踩踏板才能讓自行車上陡峭的山坡。

exampleEn: He can be a bit pedantic, always correcting people's grammar mistakes.
exampleZh: 他可能有點迂腐，總是糾正別人的語法錯誤。

exampleEn: Drivers must yield to pedestrians crossing the street at the crosswalk.
exampleZh: 司機必須在人行橫道讓行人過馬路。

exampleEn: The puppy needs to go outside to pee before we go to bed.
exampleZh: 在我們睡覺之前，小狗需要去外面撒尿。

exampleEn: Please peel the potatoes before boiling them for the mashed potato dish.
exampleZh: 在煮馬鈴薯做馬鈴薯泥之前，請先削皮。

exampleEn: The children tried to peep through the hole in the fence to see.
exampleZh: 孩子們試圖通過柵欄上的洞偷看。

exampleEn: She peered through the fog, trying to see the road ahead clearly.
exampleZh: 她透過霧氣凝視，試圖看清前方的道路。

exampleEn: Hang your coat on the peg by the door when you enter house.
exampleZh: 進屋時把外套掛在門邊的掛鉤上。

exampleEn: Please use a blue or black pen to fill out the form.
exampleZh: 請使用藍色或黑色筆填寫表格。

exampleEn: The referee decided to penalize the team for breaking the rules of game.
exampleZh: 裁判決定因違反比賽規則而懲罰該隊。

exampleEn: The player scored a goal from the penalty spot to win the match.
exampleZh: 球員從罰球點進球贏得了比賽。

exampleEn: I found a fifty pence coin on the sidewalk and picked it up.
exampleZh: 我在人行道上發現了一枚五十便士的硬幣並撿了起來。

exampleEn: Students should bring pencils and erasers to the examination tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 學生應該明天早上帶鉛筆和橡皮擦參加考試。

exampleEn: The sunlight could not penetrate the thick canopy of trees in the forest.
exampleZh: 陽光無法穿透森林中茂密的樹冠。

exampleEn: I have a penfriend in Japan, and we write letters to each other.
exampleZh: 我在日本有一個筆友，我們互相寫信。

exampleEn: The penguin waddled across the ice before diving into the cold water.
exampleZh: 企鵝在冰上搖搖晃晃地走著，然後潛入冷水中。

exampleEn: Penicillin is an antibiotic that has saved millions of lives from infection.
exampleZh: 青黴素是一種抗生素，挽救了數百萬人的生命免於感染。

exampleEn: The gambler lost all his money and was left penniless and homeless.
exampleZh: 賭徒輸光了所有的錢，身無分文，無家可歸。

exampleEn: Every penny counts when you're trying to save money for goals.
exampleZh: 當你試圖為目標存錢時，每一分錢都很重要。

exampleEn: He receives a monthly pension after retiring from his job last year.
exampleZh: 他去年退休後每月領取養老金。

exampleEn: A pentagon is a geometric shape with five sides and five angles.
exampleZh: 五邊形是一種有五個邊和五個角的幾何形狀。

exampleEn: Many people gathered in the square to celebrate the national holiday.
exampleZh: 許多人聚集在廣場上慶祝國定假日。

exampleEn: Add some black pepper to the soup for extra flavor and spice.
exampleZh: 在湯中加一些黑胡椒以增加風味和辛辣。

exampleEn: The speed limit is sixty kilometers per hour on this road.
exampleZh: 這條路上的速度限制是每小時六十公里。

exampleEn: How you perceive a situation depends largely on your own past experiences.
exampleZh: 你如何看待一種情況很大程度上取決於你過去的經歷。

exampleEn: About fifty percent of students passed the difficult examination successfully this time.
exampleZh: 這次大約百分之五十的學生成功通過了困難的考試。

exampleEn: A large percentage of the population lives in urban areas nowadays.
exampleZh: 如今很大比例的人口生活在城市地區。

exampleEn: Public perception of the company improved after they released the eco-friendly product.
exampleZh: 發布環保產品後，公眾對公司的看法有所改善。

exampleEn: Practice makes perfect, so keep working hard to improve your skills.
exampleZh: 熟能生巧，所以繼續努力提高你的技能。

exampleEn: The plan worked perfectly and everything went according to schedule smoothly.
exampleZh: 計畫完美地運作，一切都按計畫順利進行。

exampleEn: The orchestra will perform Beethoven's symphony at the concert hall tonight.
exampleZh: 管弦樂團今晚將在音樂廳演奏貝多芬的交響曲。

exampleEn: Her outstanding performance earned her a promotion at work last month.
exampleZh: 她出色的表現讓她上個月在工作中獲得了晉升。

exampleEn: The talented performer received a standing ovation from the enthusiastic audience.
exampleZh: 這位才華橫溢的表演者得到了熱情觀眾的起立鼓掌。

exampleEn: She wore expensive perfume that smelled like roses and jasmine flowers.
exampleZh: 她噴了昂貴的香水，聞起來像玫瑰和茉莉花。

exampleEn: Perhaps we should postpone the meeting until everyone is available to attend.
exampleZh: 也許我們應該推遲會議，直到每個人都有空參加。

exampleEn: The Renaissance was a period of great artistic and cultural achievement.
exampleZh: 文藝復興是一個偉大的藝術和文化成就時期。

exampleEn: The permanence of the tattoo made him hesitate before getting it inked.
exampleZh: 紋身的永久性讓他在紋身前猶豫不決。

exampleEn: The tattoo is permanent and cannot be easily removed from your skin.
exampleZh: 紋身是永久的，無法輕易從你的皮膚上去除。

exampleEn: The accident damaged his hearing permanently, and he now wears a hearing aid.
exampleZh: 事故永久性地損害了他的聽力，他現在戴著助聽器。

exampleEn: The smell of baking bread permeated the whole house, making us hungry.
exampleZh: 烤麵包的味道瀰漫了整個房子，讓我們感到飢餓。

exampleEn: You need to ask permission before using someone else's belongings or property.
exampleZh: 在使用他人的物品或財產之前，你需要徵求許可。

exampleEn: The city doesn't permit parking on this street during rush hours.
exampleZh: 這座城市不允許在高峰時段在這條街上停車。

exampleEn: Through hard work and perseverance, she achieved her goal of becoming a doctor.
exampleZh: 通過努力工作和毅力，她實現了成為醫生的目標。

exampleEn: If the symptoms persist, you should consult a doctor immediately for advice.
exampleZh: 如果症狀持續存在，你應該立即諮詢醫生以獲取建議。

exampleEn: His persistence finally paid off when he landed his dream job.
exampleZh: 當他得到夢想的工作時，他的堅持終於得到了回報。

exampleEn: The persistent rain caused flooding in many low-lying areas of the city.
exampleZh: 持續的降雨導致城市許多低窪地區發生洪水。

exampleEn: Every person has unique talents and abilities that should be valued.
exampleZh: 每個人都有應該被重視的獨特才能和能力。

exampleEn: Please don't ask personal questions that make people feel uncomfortable or awkward.
exampleZh: 請不要問讓人感到不舒服或尷尬的個人問題。

exampleEn: She has a warm personality that makes everyone feel welcome and comfortable.
exampleZh: 她性格溫暖，讓每個人都感到受歡迎和舒適。

exampleEn: I personally believe that education is the key to success in life.
exampleZh: 我個人認為教育是人生成功的關鍵。

exampleEn: In the poem, the wind is given human qualities through personification.
exampleZh: 在這首詩中，風通過擬人化被賦予了人類的特質。

exampleEn: She seems to personify kindness and generosity in everything she does daily.
exampleZh: 她在日常所做的每件事中似乎都體現了善良和慷慨。

exampleEn: All military personnel are required to wear uniforms while on duty.
exampleZh: 所有軍人在值班時都必須穿制服。

exampleEn: Traveling gives you a new perspective on life and different cultures.
exampleZh: 旅行給你對生活和不同文化的新視角。

exampleEn: Perspiration dripped down his forehead as he ran the marathon in heat.
exampleZh: 當他在炎熱的天氣裡跑馬拉松時，汗水順著他的額頭流下來。

exampleEn: She tried to persuade her parents to let her study abroad.
exampleZh: 她試圖說服父母讓她出國留學。

exampleEn: It took a lot of persuasion to convince him to join the team.
exampleZh: 花了很多口舌才說服他加入團隊。

exampleEn: His arguments were so persuasive that everyone agreed with his proposal immediately.
exampleZh: 他的論點非常有說服力，以至於每個人都立即同意了他的提議。

exampleEn: Don't be such a pessimist; try to look on the bright side of things.
exampleZh: 別這麼悲觀；試著看事情光明的一面。

exampleEn: She is pessimistic about the economy and thinks it will get worse soon.
exampleZh: 她對經濟感到悲觀，認為情況很快就會惡化。

exampleEn: Having a pet teaches children responsibility and compassion for animals effectively.
exampleZh: 養寵物有效地教導孩子對動物的責任感和同情心。

exampleEn: The child stood petrified with fear when he saw the large barking dog.
exampleZh: 當孩子看到這隻狂吠的大狗時，嚇得呆若木雞。

exampleEn: The car needs petrol; let's stop at the next gas station.
exampleZh: 汽車需要汽油；讓我們在下一個加油站停車。

exampleEn: We need to stop at the petrol station to fill up the car tank.
exampleZh: 我們需要去加油站給油箱加油。

exampleEn: They argued over petty details that didn't really matter in the end.
exampleZh: 他們為最後並不重要的瑣碎細節爭論不休。

exampleEn: The pH level of the soil determines which plants can grow there best.
exampleZh: 土壤的 pH 值決定了哪些植物在那裡生長得最好。

exampleEn: He felt a phantom pain in his leg even though it had been amputated.
exampleZh: 即使他的腿已經截肢，他也感覺到腿上有幻痛。

exampleEn: Ask the pharmacist for advice on which medicine is best for your cough.
exampleZh: 向藥劑師諮詢哪種藥最適合治療你的咳嗽。

exampleEn: I need to go to the pharmacy to pick up my prescription medication today.
exampleZh: 我今天需要去藥房領取我的處方藥。

exampleEn: The project is currently in its final phase and will be completed soon.
exampleZh: 該專案目前處於最後階段，即將完成。

exampleEn: Climate change is a global phenomenon affecting all countries and regions worldwide.
exampleZh: 氣候變遷是一個影響全球所有國家和地區的全球現象。

exampleEn: The ancient Greek philosopher Socrates is known for his method of questioning.
exampleZh: 古希臘哲學家蘇格拉底以其提問方法而聞名。

exampleEn: They had a deep philosophical discussion about the meaning of life and death.
exampleZh: 他們對生與死的意義進行了深刻的哲學討論。

exampleEn: Her philosophy of life is to treat others with kindness and respect always.
exampleZh: 她的人生哲學是始終以仁慈和尊重對待他人。

exampleEn: Like a phoenix rising from the ashes, the city was rebuilt after fire.
exampleZh: 就像鳳凰涅槃一樣，這座城市在大火後重建。

exampleEn: Please answer the phone when it rings; it might be important.
exampleZh: 電話響時請接聽；可能很重要。

exampleEn: Take a photo of this beautiful sunset to remember the moment.
exampleZh: 拍下這美麗的日落照片以記住這一刻。

exampleEn: Please make a photocopy of this document for your own records to keep.
exampleZh: 請複印這份文件以供您自己存檔。

exampleEn: The old photograph shows my grandparents on their wedding day long ago.
exampleZh: 這張舊照片顯示了我祖父母很久以前的婚禮當天。

exampleEn: The professional photographer captured stunning images at the wedding ceremony yesterday.
exampleZh: 專業攝影師昨天在婚禮上拍攝了令人驚嘆的照片。

exampleEn: She acts as a freelance photographer, selling her photos to magazines and websites.
exampleZh: 她是一名自由攝影師，將照片賣給雜誌和網站。

exampleEn: Running out of is a common phrasal verb meaning to have none left.
exampleZh: Running out of 是一個常見的片語動詞，意思是沒有剩餘。

exampleEn: Learn useful phrases to help you communicate better in English conversations.
exampleZh: 學習有用的短語以幫助你在英語對話中更好地溝通。

exampleEn: Regular physical exercise is important for maintaining good health and fitness.
exampleZh: 定期體育鍛煉對於保持健康和體能很重要。

exampleEn: The job is physically demanding and requires strength and stamina from workers.
exampleZh: 這份工作對身體要求很高，需要工人的力量和耐力。

exampleEn: The physician examined the patient and prescribed medication for the illness.
exampleZh: 醫生檢查了病人並為疾病開了藥。

exampleEn: Physics explains how the natural world works through scientific laws and principles.
exampleZh: 物理學通過科學定律和原理解釋自然世界如何運作。

exampleEn: Pi is a mathematical constant that is approximately equal to three point one four.
exampleZh: 圓周率是一個數學常數，大約等於 3.14。

exampleEn: She practices piano for two hours every day to improve her skills.
exampleZh: 她每天練習鋼琴兩小時以提高技能。

exampleEn: Pick up your toys and put them away before dinner tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚晚餐前把你的玩具撿起來並收好。

exampleEn: I like to eat a crunchy dill pickle with my sandwich at lunch.
exampleZh: 午餐時我喜歡吃脆脆的蒔蘿泡菜配三明治。

exampleEn: He is a very picky eater and only likes certain types of food.
exampleZh: 他是一個非常挑剔的食客，只喜歡某些類型的食物。

exampleEn: We're planning a picnic in the park this Sunday if weather permits.
exampleZh: 如果天氣允許，我們計畫這週日在公園野餐。

exampleEn: The picture hanging on the wall reminds me of happy childhood memories.
exampleZh: 掛在牆上的照片讓我想起快樂的童年回憶。

exampleEn: The village is picturesque with its colorful houses and cobblestone, narrow streets.
exampleZh: 這個村莊風景如畫，有色彩繽紛的房子和鵝卵石鋪成的狹窄街道。

exampleEn: My grandmother makes delicious apple pie with fresh fruit from her garden.
exampleZh: 我祖母用她花園裡的新鮮水果做美味的蘋果派。

exampleEn: Would you like a piece of cake with your coffee this afternoon?
exampleZh: 你今天下午想要一塊蛋糕配咖啡嗎？

exampleEn: Her piety and devotion to her religion were admired by everyone in community.
exampleZh: 她的虔誠和對宗教的奉獻受到社區中每個人的欽佩。

exampleEn: The farmer raises pigs for meat on his farm in the countryside.
exampleZh: 農民在鄉下的農場養豬作為肉食。

exampleEn: There's a huge pile of laundry that needs washing this weekend.
exampleZh: 這週末有一大堆衣服需要洗。

exampleEn: The pilgrims traveled thousands of miles to visit the holy shrine in mountains.
exampleZh: 朝聖者行進數千英里去參拜山中的聖地。

exampleEn: Take one pill three times a day after meals as directed.
exampleZh: 按照指示每天飯後服用一粒藥三次。

exampleEn: A comfortable pillow is essential for getting good sleep at night.
exampleZh: 一個舒適的枕頭對於晚上睡個好覺至關重要。

exampleEn: She changed the pillowcase to a fresh one before going to sleep tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚睡覺前，她換了一個乾淨的枕套。

exampleEn: The experienced pilot safely landed the plane despite difficult weather conditions.
exampleZh: 儘管天氣條件困難，經驗豐富的飛行員安全降落了飛機。

exampleEn: Use a pin to attach the notice to the bulletin board.
exampleZh: 用大頭針把通知釘在公告欄上。

exampleEn: Pine trees stay green throughout winter unlike deciduous trees that lose leaves.
exampleZh: 松樹整個冬天都保持綠色，不像落葉樹會掉葉子。

exampleEn: Fresh pineapple is sweet and delicious, perfect for tropical fruit salads.
exampleZh: 新鮮鳳梨又甜又美味，非常適合熱帶水果沙拉。

exampleEn: She wore a beautiful pink dress to the party last night.
exampleZh: 她昨晚穿了一件美麗的粉紅色連衣裙參加派對。

exampleEn: Order a pint of beer at the pub if you're thirsty.
exampleZh: 如果你渴了，在酒吧點一品脫啤酒。

exampleEn: The water pipe burst during winter causing flooding in the basement.
exampleZh: 水管在冬天爆裂，導致地下室淹水。

exampleEn: Software piracy is illegal and hurts the companies that create the programs significantly.
exampleZh: 軟體盜版是非法的，並且嚴重損害了創建程式的公司。

exampleEn: The pirate ship sailed the high seas in search of treasure and gold.
exampleZh: 海盜船在公海上航行，尋找寶藏和黃金。

exampleEn: The peach has a large hard pit in the center of the fruit.
exampleZh: 桃子果實中心有一個又大又硬的果核。

exampleEn: The cricket pitch was wet and muddy after the heavy rain all night.
exampleZh: 整夜大雨後，板球場又濕又泥濘。

exampleEn: It's a pity that you can't come to the party tonight.
exampleZh: 你今晚不能來參加派對真是可惜。

exampleEn: We ordered a large pepperoni pizza for delivery to our house for dinner.
exampleZh: 我們晚餐點了一個大義大利辣香腸比薩送到我們家。

exampleEn: This is a beautiful place to visit during summer vacation with family.
exampleZh: 這是一個與家人在暑假期間參觀的美麗地方。

exampleEn: A plague of locusts destroyed the crops, causing famine in the region.
exampleZh: 蝗災摧毀了農作物，導致該地區發生饑荒。

exampleEn: She prefers plain food without too much seasoning or spices added.
exampleZh: 她更喜歡沒有添加太多調味料或香料的清淡食物。

exampleEn: We need to make a detailed plan before starting the project.
exampleZh: 在開始專案之前，我們需要制定詳細的計畫。

exampleEn: The plane took off on time despite the bad weather conditions.
exampleZh: 儘管天氣條件惡劣，飛機還是準時起飛了。

exampleEn: Earth is the only planet known to support life in our solar system.
exampleZh: 地球是我們太陽系中已知唯一支持生命的行星。

exampleEn: Good planning is essential for the success of any complex project or event.
exampleZh: 良好的計畫對於任何複雜專案或活動的成功至關重要。

exampleEn: Water the plants regularly to keep them healthy and growing well.
exampleZh: 定期給植物澆水以保持它們健康並良好生長。

exampleEn: Reducing plastic waste is important for protecting the environment and oceans.
exampleZh: 減少塑膠垃圾對於保護環境和海洋很重要。

exampleEn: Please put the dirty plates in the sink after finishing dinner.
exampleZh: 晚餐後請把髒盤子放進水槽。

exampleEn: Wait on platform three for the train to London arriving soon.
exampleZh: 在三號月台等待即將到達倫敦的火車。

exampleEn: Children need time to play and have fun outside of school.
exampleZh: 孩子們需要時間在學校外玩耍和享受樂趣。

exampleEn: The basketball player scored thirty points in last night's game impressively.
exampleZh: 這位籃球運動員在昨晚的比賽中令人印象深刻地得了三十分。

exampleEn: The playful puppy chased its tail and jumped around the living room happily.
exampleZh: 頑皮的小狗追著尾巴在客廳裡高興地跳來跳去。

exampleEn: The children's playground has swings, slides, and climbing equipment for fun.
exampleZh: 兒童遊樂場有鞦韆、滑梯和攀爬設備供娛樂。

exampleEn: He went to the park to find a playmate to play tag with.
exampleZh: 他去公園找玩伴玩捉迷藏。

exampleEn: Shakespeare is the most famous playwright in the history of English literature.
exampleZh: 莎士比亞是英國文學史上最著名的劇作家。

exampleEn: The lawyer advised his client to plead not guilty to the charges.
exampleZh: 律師建議他的當事人對指控不認罪。

exampleEn: We had a pleasant conversation over coffee this morning at cafe.
exampleZh: 今天早上我們在咖啡館喝咖啡時進行了愉快的交談。

exampleEn: I was pleasantly surprised by how good the food tasted at the new restaurant.
exampleZh: 我對這家新餐廳的食物味道之好感到驚喜。

exampleEn: Please close the door quietly when you leave the room tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚離開房間時請安靜地關門。

exampleEn: I'm very pleased with the results of the examination this semester.
exampleZh: 我對本學期考試的結果非常滿意。

exampleEn: The arrangement of flowers in the vase was very pleasing to the eye.
exampleZh: 花瓶裡的花朵佈置非常賞心悅目。

exampleEn: It's a pleasure to meet you; I've heard wonderful things about you.
exampleZh: 很高興見到你；我聽說過關於你的美好事情。

exampleEn: There's plenty of food for everyone, so don't worry about portions.
exampleZh: 有足夠的食物給每個人，所以不用擔心份量。

exampleEn: The novel has an interesting plot with unexpected twists and turns throughout.
exampleZh: 這部小說有一個有趣的情節，整個過程中有意想不到的曲折。

exampleEn: He gathered his courage to pluck up the nerve to ask her out.
exampleZh: 他鼓起勇氣約她出去。

exampleEn: Don't forget to plug in your phone to charge it overnight.
exampleZh: 別忘了插上手機充電過夜。

exampleEn: The ripe plums from the tree are sweet and perfect for eating.
exampleZh: 樹上成熟的李子又甜又適合食用。

exampleEn: We called a plumber to fix the leaking pipe in the bathroom sink.
exampleZh: 我們叫了一個水管工來修理浴室水槽的漏水管。

exampleEn: The plural of 'child' is 'children', not 'childs' in English grammar.
exampleZh: 在英語語法中，'child' 的複數是 'children'，而不是 'childs'。

exampleEn: Two plus two equals four in basic mathematics and arithmetic.
exampleZh: 在基本數學和算術中，二加二等於四。

exampleEn: He was hospitalized with severe pneumonia and had difficulty breathing on his own.
exampleZh: 他因嚴重肺炎住院，無法自行呼吸。

exampleEn: Keep your wallet in your front pocket to prevent theft.
exampleZh: 把錢包放在前口袋以防盜竊。

exampleEn: My parents give me a little pocket money each week for doing chores.
exampleZh: 父母每週給我一點零用錢做家務。

exampleEn: She wrote a beautiful poem about nature and the changing seasons.
exampleZh: 她寫了一首關於大自然和季節變化的美麗詩歌。

exampleEn: The famous poet's works are studied in schools around the world.
exampleZh: 這位著名詩人的作品在世界各地的學校中被研究。

exampleEn: Reading poetry helps develop appreciation for language and artistic expression beautifully.
exampleZh: 閱讀詩歌有助於培養對語言和藝術表達的美麗欣賞。

exampleEn: What's the point of arguing when we both want the same thing?
exampleZh: 當我們都想要同樣的東西時，爭論有什麼意義？

exampleEn: From my point of view, we should invest in renewable energy sources now.
exampleZh: 在我看來，我們現在應該投資可再生能源。

exampleEn: It is pointless to argue with him because he never listens to reason.
exampleZh: 和他爭論是毫無意義的，因為他從不聽道理。

exampleEn: Some mushrooms contain deadly poison and should never be eaten carelessly.
exampleZh: 有些蘑菇含有致命的毒藥，絕不應該粗心地食用。

exampleEn: Many poisonous snakes live in tropical regions and can be very dangerous.
exampleZh: 許多有毒的蛇生活在熱帶地區，可能非常危險。

exampleEn: The polar bear is well adapted to survive in the freezing Arctic environment.
exampleZh: 北極熊非常適應在寒冷的北極環境中生存。

exampleEn: The flag flies proudly at the top of the tall pole.
exampleZh: 旗幟自豪地在高桿頂端飄揚。

exampleEn: Call the police immediately if you witness a crime or emergency.
exampleZh: 如果你目擊犯罪或緊急情況，請立即報警。

exampleEn: The police officer directed traffic away from the scene of the accident safely.
exampleZh: 警察安全地將交通從事故現場引導開。

exampleEn: He went to the police station to report his stolen bicycle and wallet.
exampleZh: 他去警察局報告了他被盜的自行車和錢包。

exampleEn: The policeman directed traffic during the busy morning rush hour today.
exampleZh: 警察今天在繁忙的早晨高峰時段指揮交通。

exampleEn: The policewoman arrested the thief who was trying to break into the shop.
exampleZh: 女警逮捕了試圖闖入商店的小偷。

exampleEn: The company's new policy aims to improve employee satisfaction and productivity.
exampleZh: 公司的新政策旨在提高員工滿意度和生產力。

exampleEn: Vaccines have effectively eliminated polio from most parts of the world today.
exampleZh: 如今，疫苗已從世界大部分地區有效消除了小兒麻痺症。

exampleEn: Polish your shoes before the important job interview tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 明天早上重要的工作面試前擦亮你的鞋子。

exampleEn: It's important to be polite and respectful when speaking to others.
exampleZh: 與他人交談時保持禮貌和尊重很重要。

exampleEn: She politely declined the invitation because she had other plans already.
exampleZh: 她禮貌地拒絕了邀請，因為她已經有其他計畫了。

exampleEn: Treating everyone with politeness is a sign of good manners and respect.
exampleZh: 以禮貌對待每個人是良好禮貌和尊重的標誌。

exampleEn: Political debates often become heated when people have strong opposing views.
exampleZh: 當人們有強烈的對立觀點時，政治辯論往往會變得激烈。

exampleEn: The decision was politically motivated to gain support from voters before the election.
exampleZh: 這一決定是出於政治動機，目的是在選舉前獲得選民的支持。

exampleEn: The politician promised to improve education and healthcare if elected to office.
exampleZh: 這位政治家承諾如果當選將改善教育和醫療保健。

exampleEn: Many people avoid discussing politics at family gatherings to prevent arguments.
exampleZh: 許多人避免在家庭聚會上討論政治以防止爭論。

exampleEn: The country is a democratic polity where citizens elect their leaders freely.
exampleZh: 該國是一個民主政體，公民自由選舉他們的領導人。

exampleEn: Carbon dioxide is a major pollutant that contributes to global warming and climate change.
exampleZh: 二氧化碳是導致全球變暖和氣候變化的主要污染物。

exampleEn: Factories pollute the air and water causing serious environmental problems worldwide.
exampleZh: 工廠污染空氣和水，在全球造成嚴重的環境問題。

exampleEn: Air pollution in cities is a major health concern for residents.
exampleZh: 城市的空氣污染是居民的主要健康問題。

exampleEn: Polo is a sport played on horseback with mallets and a ball.
exampleZh: 馬球是一種在馬背上用木槌和球進行的運動。

exampleEn: The ducks swim peacefully in the pond at the park every day.
exampleZh: 鴨子每天在公園的池塘裡平靜地游泳。

exampleEn: He sat by the lake to ponder the meaning of his strange dream.
exampleZh: 他坐在湖邊思考他奇怪夢境的含義。

exampleEn: The hotel has a beautiful swimming pool with crystal-clear water for guests.
exampleZh: 飯店有一個美麗的游泳池，為客人提供清澈的水。

exampleEn: The charity helps poor families by providing food and shelter for them.
exampleZh: 慈善機構通過為貧困家庭提供食物和住所來幫助他們。

exampleEn: The balloon will pop if you squeeze it too hard accidentally.
exampleZh: 如果你不小心擠得太用力，氣球會爆炸。

exampleEn: We bought popcorn and drinks before watching the movie at cinema.
exampleZh: 我們在電影院看電影前買了爆米花和飲料。

exampleEn: This restaurant is very popular and always crowded during dinner hours.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳非常受歡迎，晚餐時間總是很擁擠。

exampleEn: The singer's popularity has grown significantly since releasing the new album.
exampleZh: 自從發行新專輯以來，這位歌手的受歡迎程度顯著增長。

exampleEn: The internet has helped to popularize many new trends and ideas globally.
exampleZh: 網路有助於在全球普及許多新趨勢和想法。

exampleEn: The city's population has increased dramatically over the past decade rapidly.
exampleZh: 過去十年中，這座城市的人口迅速大幅增加。

exampleEn: We sat on the front porch watching the sunset and drinking iced tea.
exampleZh: 我們坐在前廊看日落，喝冰茶。

exampleEn: Some religions forbid eating pork for cultural and religious reasons clearly.
exampleZh: 出於明確的文化和宗教原因，一些宗教禁止吃豬肉。

exampleEn: The ship arrived at the port after a long journey across ocean.
exampleZh: 船在穿越海洋的漫長旅程後到達了港口。

exampleEn: The restaurant serves generous portions that satisfy even hungry customers completely.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳提供豐盛的份量，完全滿足即使是飢餓的顧客。

exampleEn: The artist painted a beautiful portrait of the queen for display.
exampleZh: 藝術家為展示畫了一幅美麗的女王肖像。

exampleEn: The pollution from the factory poses a serious threat to the local environment.
exampleZh: 工廠的污染對當地環境構成嚴重威脅。

exampleEn: They went to a posh restaurant for their anniversary dinner and dressed up.
exampleZh: 他們去一家豪華餐廳吃週年紀念晚餐並盛裝打扮。

exampleEn: The company is offering a senior management position with excellent benefits.
exampleZh: 公司正在提供一個有優厚福利的高級管理職位。

exampleEn: Try to maintain a positive attitude even when facing difficult challenges.
exampleZh: 即使面臨困難的挑戰，也要努力保持積極的態度。

exampleEn: He responded positively to the suggestion and agreed to help with the project.
exampleZh: 他對這個建議反應積極，並同意幫忙做這個專案。

exampleEn: She possesses remarkable talent and skills that make her stand out.
exampleZh: 她擁有非凡的才能和技能，使她脫穎而出。

exampleEn: He fought like a man possessed, determined to win the match at all costs.
exampleZh: 他像著了魔一樣戰鬥，決心不惜一切代價贏得比賽。

exampleEn: All personal possessions must be kept in the locker during class.
exampleZh: 所有個人物品在上課期間必須放在儲物櫃裡。

exampleEn: My brother is very possessive about his toys and won't let anyone touch them.
exampleZh: 我弟弟對他的玩具佔有慾很強，不讓任何人碰。

exampleEn: There's a strong possibility that it will rain tomorrow according to forecast.
exampleZh: 根據預報，明天很有可能會下雨。

exampleEn: It's possible to learn a new language if you practice consistently.
exampleZh: 如果你持續練習，學習一門新語言是可能的。

exampleEn: I'll possibly visit you next week if my schedule allows time.
exampleZh: 如果我的日程允許時間，我可能下週會去看你。

exampleEn: Please post this letter at the post office on your way.
exampleZh: 請在路上把這封信寄到郵局。

exampleEn: I need to go to the post office to mail this package to my friend.
exampleZh: 我需要去郵局把這個包裹寄給我的朋友。

exampleEn: The postal service delivers mail to millions of homes every day reliably.
exampleZh: 郵政服務每天可靠地將郵件投遞到數百萬個家庭。

exampleEn: I sent a postcard to my family from Paris during vacation.
exampleZh: 我度假期間從巴黎寄了一張明信片給我的家人。

exampleEn: The colorful poster advertises the upcoming concert at the stadium next month.
exampleZh: 這張五顏六色的海報宣傳下個月在體育場舉行的音樂會。

exampleEn: The postman delivers mail to our house every morning at ten.
exampleZh: 郵差每天早上十點把郵件送到我們家。

exampleEn: We had to postpone the meeting until next week due to conflicts.
exampleZh: 由於衝突，我們不得不把會議推遲到下週。

exampleEn: Put the pot on the stove to boil water for tea.
exampleZh: 把鍋放在爐子上燒水泡茶。

exampleEn: Baked potatoes are delicious and healthy when served with vegetables.
exampleZh: 烤馬鈴薯配蔬菜時美味又健康。

exampleEn: The medicine is very potent, so take only the prescribed dose carefully.
exampleZh: 這種藥效力很強，所以要小心只服用處方劑量。

exampleEn: The young athlete shows great potential and could become a champion.
exampleZh: 這位年輕運動員展現出巨大的潛力，可能成為冠軍。

exampleEn: This new technology is potentially dangerous if it falls into the wrong hands.
exampleZh: 如果這項新技術落入壞人手中，具有潛在危險。

exampleEn: She makes beautiful bowls and vases in her pottery class on weekends.
exampleZh: 她在週末的陶藝課上製作漂亮的碗和花瓶。

exampleEn: The package weighs exactly five pounds according to the scale measurement.
exampleZh: 根據秤的測量，包裹正好重五磅。

exampleEn: Pour the milk slowly into the bowl to avoid spilling it.
exampleZh: 慢慢地把牛奶倒進碗裡以避免灑出來。

exampleEn: Many organizations work to reduce poverty and improve living conditions worldwide.
exampleZh: 許多組織致力於減少貧困並改善全球生活條件。

exampleEn: Add a spoonful of milk powder to the coffee for creaminess.
exampleZh: 在咖啡中加一勺奶粉以增加奶油味。

exampleEn: Knowledge is power that opens doors to countless opportunities in life.
exampleZh: 知識是力量，為生活中無數機會打開大門。

exampleEn: The powerful engine allows the car to accelerate quickly and smoothly.
exampleZh: 強大的引擎使汽車能夠快速平穩地加速。

exampleEn: The speaker argued powerfully for the need to protect human rights globally.
exampleZh: 演講者強有力地論證了在全球保護人權的必要性。

exampleEn: This course provides practical skills that students can use in real life.
exampleZh: 這門課程提供學生可以在現實生活中使用的實用技能。

exampleEn: We need to consider the practicality of the plan before we implement it.
exampleZh: 在實施計畫之前，我們需要考慮計畫的實用性。

exampleEn: It is practically impossible to finish all this work in one day alone.
exampleZh: 要在一天之內完成所有這些工作實際上是不可能的。

exampleEn: Regular practice is essential for improving any skill or ability effectively.
exampleZh: 定期練習對於有效提高任何技能或能力至關重要。

exampleEn: You need to practice playing the piano every day to improve your skills.
exampleZh: 你需要每天練習彈鋼琴以提高你的技能。

exampleEn: The teacher praised the student for excellent work on the project.
exampleZh: 老師稱讚學生在專案上的出色工作。

exampleEn: The horse began to prance around the field, full of energy and excitement.
exampleZh: 馬開始在田野裡歡騰，充滿活力和興奮。

exampleEn: We ordered a delicious prawn cocktail as an appetizer for our dinner.
exampleZh: 我們點了一份美味的對蝦雞尾酒作為晚餐的開胃菜。

exampleEn: Many people pray for peace and health for their families daily.
exampleZh: 許多人每天為家人的和平和健康祈禱。

exampleEn: The prayer service is held every Sunday morning at the church.
exampleZh: 祈禱儀式每週日早上在教堂舉行。

exampleEn: A brief introduction will precede the main presentation to give some context.
exampleZh: 簡短的介紹將在主講之前進行，以提供一些背景資訊。

exampleEn: Time is precious, so use it wisely and don't waste it.
exampleZh: 時間是寶貴的，所以要明智地使用它，不要浪費它。

exampleEn: Please give me precise directions to your house so I don't lost.
exampleZh: 請給我去你家的精確方向，這樣我就不會迷路。

exampleEn: The train arrives precisely at noon every day without fail.
exampleZh: 火車每天正好中午準時到達，從不失誤。

exampleEn: He found himself in a difficult predicament when he lost his passport abroad.
exampleZh: 當他在國外丟失護照時，他發現自己處於艱難的境地。

exampleEn: In the sentence 'She runs fast', 'runs fast' is the predicate.
exampleZh: 在句子 'She runs fast' 中，'runs fast' 是謂語。

exampleEn: Adjectives can be used in a predicative position after a linking verb.
exampleZh: 形容詞可以用在連繫動詞之後的表語位置。

exampleEn: It's difficult to predict the future with complete accuracy always.
exampleZh: 總是完全準確地預測未來是很困難的。

exampleEn: The ending of the movie was predictable, so I wasn't surprised at all.
exampleZh: 電影的結局是可以預測的，所以我一點也不驚訝。

exampleEn: The weather prediction says it will be sunny all week long.
exampleZh: 天氣預報說整週都會是晴天。

exampleEn: Predictive text on smartphones helps you type messages faster and more accurately.
exampleZh: 智慧型手機上的預測文本可幫助您更快、更準確地鍵入訊息。

exampleEn: High blood pressure is a strong predictor of heart disease and stroke risk.
exampleZh: 高血壓是心臟病和中風風險的強預測指標。

exampleEn: The school prefect is responsible for maintaining discipline among the younger students.
exampleZh: 學校領袖生負責維持低年級學生的紀律。

exampleEn: I prefer tea to coffee in the morning for breakfast.
exampleZh: 我早上早餐更喜歡茶而不是咖啡。

exampleEn: It is preferable to book your tickets in advance to avoid disappointment later.
exampleZh: 最好提前預訂門票，以免日後失望。

exampleEn: We should meet early in the morning, preferably before the traffic gets heavy.
exampleZh: 我們應該在清晨見面，最好是在交通變得擁堵之前。

exampleEn: Everyone has different preferences when it comes to food and music.
exampleZh: 在食物和音樂方面，每個人都有不同的偏好。

exampleEn: In the word 'unhappy', 'un-' is a prefix meaning not.
exampleZh: 在單詞 'unhappy' 中，'un-' 是一個前綴，意思是“不”。

exampleEn: She's seven months pregnant and expecting a baby girl soon.
exampleZh: 她懷孕七個月了，很快就要生一個女嬰。

exampleEn: Cave paintings provide evidence of prehistoric human life and their artistic expression.
exampleZh: 洞穴壁畫提供了史前人類生活及其藝術表現的證據。

exampleEn: Scientists study fossils to learn about prehuman ancestors and their evolution history.
exampleZh: 科學家研究化石以了解前人類祖先及其進化史。

exampleEn: In preindustrial societies, most people lived in rural areas and worked in agriculture.
exampleZh: 在工業化前的社會，大多數人住在農村地區並從事農業。

exampleEn: Don't prejudge someone based on their appearance; get to know them first.
exampleZh: 不要以貌取人；先了解他們。

exampleEn: We must fight against prejudice and discrimination in all its forms.
exampleZh: 我們必須以各種形式對抗偏見和歧視。

exampleEn: The preliminary results of the experiment look promising, but more testing is needed.
exampleZh: 實驗的初步結果看起來很有希望，但需要更多的測試。

exampleEn: Worries about his job began to preoccupy his mind, making it hard to sleep.
exampleZh: 對工作的擔憂開始佔據他的頭腦，使他難以入睡。

exampleEn: Careful preparation is the key to success in any important examination.
exampleZh: 仔細的準備是任何重要考試成功的關鍵。

exampleEn: I need to prepare dinner for the family before they arrive.
exampleZh: 我需要在家人到達之前為他們準備晚餐。

exampleEn: She was well prepared for the exam and answered all the questions confidently.
exampleZh: 她為考試做了充分準備，自信地回答了所有問題。

exampleEn: In, on, and at are common prepositions used to indicate time and place.
exampleZh: In, on 和 at 是用於表示時間和地點的常用介詞。

exampleEn: My daughter goes to preschool three days a week to play and learn.
exampleZh: 我女兒每週去幼兒園三天，玩耍和學習。

exampleEn: The doctor will prescribe medication to treat your illness effectively and safely.
exampleZh: 醫生將開藥有效安全地治療你的疾病。

exampleEn: Take this prescription to the pharmacy to get your medicine today.
exampleZh: 今天把這張處方拿到藥房去拿藥。

exampleEn: Your presence at the meeting is required for important decisions tomorrow.
exampleZh: 明天的重要決定需要你出席會議。

exampleEn: All students must be present for the final examination tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 所有學生明天早上必須出席期末考試。

exampleEn: The sales presentation impressed the clients and secured the important contract.
exampleZh: 銷售簡報給客戶留下了深刻印象並獲得了重要合約。

exampleEn: The TV presenter introduced the next guest on the talk show enthusiastically.
exampleZh: 電視節目主持人在脫口秀節目中熱情地介紹了下一位嘉賓。

exampleEn: The preservation of historical buildings is important for maintaining our cultural heritage.
exampleZh: 保護歷史建築對於維護我們的文化遺產很重要。

exampleEn: We must preserve natural habitats to protect endangered species from extinction.
exampleZh: 我們必須保護自然棲息地以保護瀕危物種免於滅絕。

exampleEn: During his presidency, he implemented many important social and economic reforms.
exampleZh: 在他擔任總統期間，他實施了許多重要的社會和經濟改革。

exampleEn: The president addressed the nation about the economic crisis last night.
exampleZh: 總統昨晚向全國發表了關於經濟危機的講話。

exampleEn: The candidates are campaigning hard for the upcoming presidential election in November.
exampleZh: 候選人正在為即將在 11 月舉行的總統選舉努力競選。

exampleEn: Press the button to start the machine and begin the process.
exampleZh: 按下按鈕啟動機器並開始過程。

exampleEn: Students face a lot of pressure during examination periods at school.
exampleZh: 學生在學校考試期間面臨很大的壓力。

exampleEn: Winning the Nobel Prize brings great prestige and recognition to a scientist.
exampleZh: 獲得諾貝爾獎給科學家帶來了巨大的聲望和認可。

exampleEn: Harvard is one of the most prestigious universities in the world today.
exampleZh: 哈佛是當今世界上最負盛名的大學之一。

exampleEn: Presumably, he missed the bus, which is why he is late again.
exampleZh: 據推測，他錯過了公車，這就是他再次遲到的原因。

exampleEn: Children love to pretend they're superheroes saving the world from danger.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡假裝他們是從危險中拯救世界的超級英雄。

exampleEn: The garden looks pretty with all the colorful flowers blooming now.
exampleZh: 花園現在看起來很漂亮，所有五顏六色的花都在盛開。

exampleEn: We hope that common sense will prevail and a peaceful solution will be found.
exampleZh: 我們希望常識能佔上風，並找到和平解決方案。

exampleEn: Regular exercise helps prevent many diseases and maintains good health always.
exampleZh: 定期運動有助於預防許多疾病並始終保持健康。

exampleEn: Prevention is better than cure when it comes to health matters.
exampleZh: 在健康問題上，預防勝於治療。

exampleEn: Regular exercise and a healthy diet are preventive measures against heart disease.
exampleZh: 定期運動和健康飲食是預防心臟病的措施。

exampleEn: I learned from previous mistakes and won't repeat them again.
exampleZh: 我從以前的錯誤中學到了教訓，不會再重複了。

exampleEn: She previously worked as a teacher before becoming a lawyer successfully.
exampleZh: 她在成功成為律師之前曾擔任教師。

exampleEn: The price of housing has increased significantly in recent years everywhere.
exampleZh: 近年來，到處的住房價格都大幅上漲。

exampleEn: The antique vase is priceless and cannot be replaced if it is broken.
exampleZh: 這古董花瓶是無價的，如果打破了就無法更換。

exampleEn: Be careful not to prick your finger on the thorns of the rose.
exampleZh: 小心不要被玫瑰的刺刺傷手指。

exampleEn: She takes great pride in her children's achievements and success.
exampleZh: 她為孩子們的成就和成功感到非常自豪。

exampleEn: The priest conducted the wedding ceremony at the church yesterday afternoon.
exampleZh: 牧師昨天下午在教堂主持了婚禮。

exampleEn: The course is designed primarily for beginners who have no previous experience.
exampleZh: 本課程主要是為沒有經驗的初學者設計的。

exampleEn: The primary goal of education is to develop critical thinking skills.
exampleZh: 教育的主要目標是發展批判性思維技能。

exampleEn: Children usually start primary school at the age of five or six.
exampleZh: 兒童通常在五六歲開始上小學。

exampleEn: The prime minister announced new policies to address economic challenges today.
exampleZh: 總理今天宣布了新政策以應對經濟挑戰。

exampleEn: The prime minister met with other world leaders to discuss global security issues.
exampleZh: 總理與其他世界領導人會面，討論全球安全問題。

exampleEn: The museum displays primitive tools used by ancient civilizations long ago.
exampleZh: 博物館展示古代文明很久以前使用的原始工具。

exampleEn: The young prince will inherit the throne when his father retires.
exampleZh: 年輕的王子將在他父親退位時繼承王位。

exampleEn: The princess wore a beautiful gown to the royal ball last night.
exampleZh: 公主昨晚穿了一件美麗的禮服參加皇家舞會。

exampleEn: The school principal addressed students about new rules during assembly today.
exampleZh: 校長今天在集會上向學生講述了新規定。

exampleEn: Honesty is an important principle that should guide all our actions.
exampleZh: 誠實是一個重要的原則，應該指導我們所有的行動。

exampleEn: Please print two copies of the document for the meeting tomorrow.
exampleZh: 請為明天的會議列印兩份文件。

exampleEn: The office printer is broken and needs repair or replacement soon.
exampleZh: 辦公室印表機壞了，需要盡快維修或更換。

exampleEn: Prior experience in sales is required for this position at company.
exampleZh: 這個公司職位需要有銷售經驗。

exampleEn: Your health should be your top priority above everything else.
exampleZh: 你的健康應該是你最優先考慮的事情，高於一切。

exampleEn: The criminal was sentenced to ten years in prison for crimes.
exampleZh: 罪犯因犯罪被判處十年監禁。

exampleEn: The prisoners are allowed visitors once a week on Sundays only.
exampleZh: 囚犯只允許在週日每週接待一次訪客。

exampleEn: We should respect everyone's right to privacy and not intrude on their lives.
exampleZh: 我們應該尊重每個人的隱私權，不要侵犯他們的生活。

exampleEn: This is a private matter that I don't want to discuss.
exampleZh: 這是一個我不想討論的私人問題。

exampleEn: Can I speak to you privately for a moment about a personal matter?
exampleZh: 我可以私下和你談談私事嗎？

exampleEn: Education is a privilege that not everyone has access to worldwide.
exampleZh: 教育是一種特權，並非全球每個人都能獲得。

exampleEn: She won first prize in the art competition for her painting.
exampleZh: 她因她的畫作在藝術比賽中獲得一等獎。

exampleEn: We weighed the pros and cons of the decision before making a final choice.
exampleZh: 在做出最終選擇之前，我們權衡了決定的利弊。

exampleEn: There is a high probability of rain tomorrow, so bring an umbrella.
exampleZh: 明天很有可能下雨，所以帶把傘。

exampleEn: It's probable that we'll finish the project ahead of schedule.
exampleZh: 我們很可能會提前完成專案。

exampleEn: I'll probably be late for dinner because of heavy traffic today.
exampleZh: 由於今天交通擁堵，我可能會遲到吃晚餐。

exampleEn: Scientists sent a space probe to explore the surface of Mars remotely.
exampleZh: 科學家發送了一個太空探測器來遠程探索火星表面。

exampleEn: We need to find a solution to this problem as soon possible.
exampleZh: 我們需要盡快找到這個問題的解決方案。

exampleEn: Follow the safety procedure carefully when operating the machinery at work.
exampleZh: 在工作中操作機器時仔細遵循安全程序。

exampleEn: Please proceed to the next question after finishing this one completely.
exampleZh: 完全完成這個問題後請繼續下一個問題。

exampleEn: Learning a language is a gradual process that requires patience and practice.
exampleZh: 學習語言是一個需要耐心和練習的漸進過程。

exampleEn: The king gathered his people to proclaim a new law for the kingdom.
exampleZh: 國王召集他的人民宣布王國的新法律。

exampleEn: Procrastination is the thief of time; do your work now, not later.
exampleZh: 拖延是時間的竊賊；現在就做你的工作，而不是以後。

exampleEn: The factory produces thousands of cars every month for global markets.
exampleZh: 這家工廠每月為全球市場生產數千輛汽車。

exampleEn: The film producer invested millions in making this blockbuster movie successfully.
exampleZh: 電影製片人投資數百萬成功製作了這部大片。

exampleEn: This product is made from high-quality materials and built to last.
exampleZh: 這個產品由高品質材料製成，經久耐用。

exampleEn: The company increased production to meet growing demand from customers worldwide.
exampleZh: 公司增加了生產以滿足全球客戶不斷增長的需求。

exampleEn: I had a very productive day and finished all the tasks on my list.
exampleZh: 我過了非常富有成效的一天，完成了清單上的所有任務。

exampleEn: Teaching is a noble profession that shapes future generations of society.
exampleZh: 教學是一個塑造社會未來世代的崇高職業。

exampleEn: She's a professional photographer with years of experience in the field.
exampleZh: 她是一位在該領域有多年經驗的專業攝影師。

exampleEn: The professor teaches advanced mathematics at the university every semester regularly.
exampleZh: 教授每學期定期在大學教授高等數學。

exampleEn: She updated her social media profile with a new photo and biography.
exampleZh: 她用新照片和簡歷更新了她的社群媒體資料。

exampleEn: The company made a huge profit this year exceeding expectations greatly.
exampleZh: 公司今年獲得了巨大的利潤，大大超出了預期。

exampleEn: The business became very profitable after they expanded into new international markets.
exampleZh: 在擴展到新的國際市場後，該業務變得非常有可利潤。

exampleEn: The television program starts at eight o'clock tonight on channel five.
exampleZh: 電視節目今晚八點在第五頻道開始。

exampleEn: The computer programmer wrote code to create a new mobile application.
exampleZh: 電腦程式員編寫代碼來創建一個新的行動應用程式。

exampleEn: Learning computer programming is a valuable skill in today's digital job market.
exampleZh: 學習電腦程式設計是當今數位就業市場的一項寶貴技能。

exampleEn: The student has made excellent progress in learning English this year.
exampleZh: 這位學生今年在學習英語方面取得了很好的進步。

exampleEn: The school uses progressive teaching methods to encourage student creativity and independence.
exampleZh: 學校使用循序漸進的教學方法來鼓勵學生的創造力和獨立性。

exampleEn: The law prohibits smoking in public places to protect people's health.
exampleZh: 法律禁止在公共場所吸菸以保護人們的健康。

exampleEn: The prohibition of alcohol in the 1920s led to the rise of illegal bars.
exampleZh: 1920 年代的禁酒令導致了非法酒吧的興起。

exampleEn: The construction project will take two years to complete from start.
exampleZh: 建設專案從開始到完成需要兩年時間。

exampleEn: The company's sales projection for the next quarter looks very promising indeed.
exampleZh: 該公司下一季度的銷售預測看起來確實很有希望。

exampleEn: She bought a beautiful dress to wear to her high school prom request.
exampleZh: 她買了一件漂亮的連衣裙去參加她的高中舞會。

exampleEn: He rose to prominence in the political world due to his charismatic leadership.
exampleZh: 由於他具有魅力的領導力，他在政界聲名鵲起。

exampleEn: She is a prominent lawyer who has handled many high-profile cases successfully.
exampleZh: 她是一位傑出的律師，成功處理了許多備受矚目的案件。

exampleEn: I promise to help you with your homework after dinner tonight.
exampleZh: 我承諾今晚晚餐後幫你做作業。

exampleEn: The company will promote employees who demonstrate excellent performance and dedication.
exampleZh: 公司將晉升表現出色和奉獻精神的員工。

exampleEn: She received a promotion to manager after five years of hard work.
exampleZh: 經過五年的努力工作，她被晉升為經理。

exampleEn: Please give a prompt response to the email as soon possible.
exampleZh: 請盡快對電子郵件給予及時回覆。

exampleEn: Please arrive promptly at nine o'clock for the start of the meeting.
exampleZh: 請在九點鐘準時到達會議開始。

exampleEn: He, she, and it are examples of pronouns used to replace nouns.
exampleZh: He, she 和 it 是用於代替名詞的代詞示例。

exampleEn: It's difficult to pronounce some words correctly in foreign languages initially.
exampleZh: 最初在外語中正確發音某些單詞很困難。

exampleEn: Good pronunciation is important for effective communication in any language clearly.
exampleZh: 良好的發音對於在任何語言中清楚有效地溝通很重要。

exampleEn: The lawyer presented solid proof of his client's innocence to court.
exampleZh: 律師向法庭提供了他委託人無罪的確鑿證據。

exampleEn: Use proper grammar when writing formal letters and business documents always.
exampleZh: 在寫正式信件和商業文件時始終使用正確的文法。

exampleEn: Make sure to wash your hands properly before eating any food.
exampleZh: 在吃任何食物之前確保適當地洗手。

exampleEn: The property includes a large house with a beautiful garden and pool.
exampleZh: 這處房產包括一棟帶有美麗花園和游泳池的大房子。

exampleEn: He is a strong proponent of renewable energy and advocates for solar power.
exampleZh: 他是可再生能源的堅強支持者，並提倡太陽能。

exampleEn: A large proportion of the population lives in urban areas nowadays.
exampleZh: 如今很大比例的人口生活在城市地區。

exampleEn: The committee will review the proposal at next week's meeting carefully.
exampleZh: 委員會將在下週的會議上仔細審查這項提案。

exampleEn: I propose that we postpone the decision until we have more information.
exampleZh: 我建議我們推遲決定，直到我們有更多資訊。

exampleEn: The proposed changes to the law have caused a lot of debate recently.
exampleZh: 擬議的法律修改最近引起了很多爭論。

exampleEn: She writes beautiful prose that captures the emotions of her characters perfectly.
exampleZh: 她寫出優美的散文，完美地捕捉了角色的情感。

exampleEn: The police decided to prosecute the shoplifter for stealing the expensive items.
exampleZh: 警方決定起訴在商店行竊的昂貴物品的小偷。

exampleEn: The job offers excellent prospects for career advancement and growth opportunities.
exampleZh: 這份工作為職業晉升和成長機會提供了極好的前景。

exampleEn: With hard work and dedication, your business will surely prosper in time.
exampleZh: 通過努力工作和奉獻，你的生意肯定會及時繁榮。

exampleEn: Peace and stability are essential for the economic prosperity of any nation.
exampleZh: 和平與穩定對於任何國家的經濟繁榮至關重要。

exampleEn: The prosperous city is known for its high standard of living and wealth.
exampleZh: 這座繁榮的城市以其高生活水平和財富而聞名。

exampleEn: Parents naturally want to protect their children from harm and danger.
exampleZh: 父母自然想保護孩子免受傷害和危險。

exampleEn: The law provides protection for workers' rights and fair treatment at work.
exampleZh: 法律為工人的權利和工作中的公平待遇提供保護。

exampleEn: The mother bear is very protective of her cubs and will attack threats.
exampleZh: 母熊非常保護牠的幼崽，並會攻擊威脅。

exampleEn: Thousands of people gathered to protest against the government's new policy.
exampleZh: 數千人聚集抗議政府的新政策。

exampleEn: I'm very proud of my daughter's achievements in school this year.
exampleZh: 我為我女兒今年在學校的成就感到非常自豪。

exampleEn: He proudly displayed his trophy on the shelf for everyone to see.
exampleZh: 他自豪地在架子上展示他的獎杯給每個人看。

exampleEn: The evidence will prove his innocence beyond any reasonable doubt clearly.
exampleZh: 證據將清楚地證明他的無罪，毫無合理懷疑。

exampleEn: This method has been proven to be effective in many clinical trials.
exampleZh: 這種方法已被許多臨床試驗證明是有效的。

exampleEn: The old proverb says that actions speak louder than words always.
exampleZh: 古老的諺語說行動總是勝於言語。

exampleEn: The school provides free lunch for students from low-income families daily.
exampleZh: 學校每天為來自低收入家庭的學生提供免費午餐。

exampleEn: I will go to the party provided that I finish my work early.
exampleZh: 只要我早點完成工作，我就會去參加聚會。

exampleEn: Each province has its own local government and administrative system.
exampleZh: 每個省都有自己的地方政府和行政系統。

exampleEn: The contract includes provisions for early termination under certain conditions specified.
exampleZh: 合約包括在指定的某些條件下提前終止的條款。

exampleEn: The hotel's close proximity to the beach makes it a popular choice.
exampleZh: 這家飯店靠近海灘，使其成為受歡迎的選擇。

exampleEn: The psychological impact of trauma can last for many years afterward.
exampleZh: 創傷的心理影響可能會在之後持續多年。

exampleEn: The abuse scarred him psychologically, and he needed therapy to recover fully.
exampleZh: 虐待他在心理上留下了創傷，他需要治療才能完全康復。

exampleEn: She visited a psychologist to help her deal with her anxiety and stress.
exampleZh: 她去看心理學家，幫助她應對焦慮和壓力。

exampleEn: Psychology is the scientific study of the human mind and behavior patterns.
exampleZh: 心理學是對人類思維和行為模式的科學研究。

exampleEn: Let's meet at the pub for a drink after work tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚下班後讓我們在酒吧見面喝一杯。

exampleEn: The public library is open to everyone free of charge daily.
exampleZh: 公共圖書館每天免費向所有人開放。

exampleEn: Using public transport like buses and trains helps reduce traffic congestion largely.
exampleZh: 使用公車和火車等公共交通工具有助於大大減少交通擁堵。

exampleEn: The research findings will appear in a scientific publication next month.
exampleZh: 研究結果將在下個月的科學出版物中發表。

exampleEn: The movie received a lot of publicity before its release date.
exampleZh: 這部電影在上映日期前獲得了很多宣傳。

exampleEn: The company launched a campaign to publicize its new environmentally friendly initiative.
exampleZh: 該公司發起了一項運動，宣傳其新的環保倡議。

exampleEn: The company publicly apologized for the mistake made by management recently.
exampleZh: 公司公開為管理層最近犯的錯誤道歉。

exampleEn: The author plans to publish her new novel early next year.
exampleZh: 作者計畫明年初出版她的新小說。

exampleEn: The publisher agreed to print and sell her first novel next year.
exampleZh: 出版商同意明年印刷並出售她的第一部小說。

exampleEn: For dessert, we had delicious chocolate pudding with whipped cream on top.
exampleZh: 甜點我們吃了美味的巧克力布丁，上面有鮮奶油。

exampleEn: Pull the door handle to open it instead of pushing it.
exampleZh: 拉門把手打開它而不是推它。

exampleEn: He wore a warm woolen pullover over his shirt on the cold day.
exampleZh: 在寒冷的日子裡，他在襯衫外面穿了一件溫暖的羊毛套頭衫。

exampleEn: The nurse checked the patient's pulse to monitor heart rate carefully.
exampleZh: 護士檢查了病人的脈搏以仔細監測心率。

exampleEn: The water pump broke down and needs repair before we can use.
exampleZh: 水泵壞了，在我們使用之前需要維修。

exampleEn: Pumpkin pie is a traditional dessert served during Thanksgiving celebrations in America.
exampleZh: 南瓜派是美國感恩節慶祝活動中供應的傳統甜點。

exampleEn: The boxer threw a powerful punch that knocked his opponent to ground.
exampleZh: 拳擊手打出有力的一拳，將對手擊倒在地。

exampleEn: Being punctual shows respect for other people's time and schedules always.
exampleZh: 準時總是表現出對他人時間和日程的尊重。

exampleEn: Punctuality is important in the business world, so never be late for meetings.
exampleZh: 守時在商業世界中很重要，所以開會千萬不要遲到。

exampleEn: Correct punctuation makes your writing easier to read and understand for others.
exampleZh: 正確的標點符號使您的寫作更容易被他人閱讀和理解。

exampleEn: Parents should punish bad behavior but also explain why it's wrong.
exampleZh: 父母應該懲罰不良行為，但也要解釋為什麼這是錯的。

exampleEn: The punishment should fit the crime and be fair to everyone.
exampleZh: 懲罰應該與罪行相稱，對每個人都公平。

exampleEn: The teacher praised the pupil for excellent work on the assignment.
exampleZh: 老師稱讚學生在作業上的出色工作。

exampleEn: The cute puppy wagged its tail happily when it saw me.
exampleZh: 可愛的小狗看到我時高興地搖著尾巴。

exampleEn: Please keep the receipt as proof of purchase for warranty purposes.
exampleZh: 請保留收據作為購買證明以供保修之用。

exampleEn: The water from the mountain spring is pure and safe to drink.
exampleZh: 來自山泉的水是純淨的，可以安全飲用。

exampleEn: The water treatment plant helps to purify the water before it is distributed.
exampleZh: 水處理廠有助於在分配水之前淨化水。

exampleEn: She wore a beautiful purple dress to the wedding ceremony yesterday.
exampleZh: 她昨天穿了一件美麗的紫色連衣裙參加婚禮。

exampleEn: The main purpose of education is to develop critical thinking skills.
exampleZh: 教育的主要目的是發展批判性思維技能。

exampleEn: She walked with a purposeful stride, looking like she had a clear goal.
exampleZh: 她邁著有目的的步伐走著，看起來目標明確。

exampleEn: She keeps her money and credit cards in her purse safely.
exampleZh: 她把錢和信用卡安全地放在錢包裡。

exampleEn: Don't give up on your dreams; continue to pursue them passionately.
exampleZh: 不要放棄你的夢想；繼續熱情地追求它們。

exampleEn: The police were in hot pursuit of the bank robbers speeding away.
exampleZh: 警方正在緊追飛馳而去的銀行搶劫犯。

exampleEn: Push the door gently to open it without making noise.
exampleZh: 輕輕推門打開它而不發出噪音。

exampleEn: Please put the books back on the shelf after reading them.
exampleZh: 閱讀後請把書放回書架上。

exampleEn: The children enjoyed solving the jigsaw puzzle together on rainy days.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在雨天一起解決拼圖。

exampleEn: He looked puzzled by the complex instructions and asked for clarification again.
exampleZh: 他對複雜的指示感到困惑，並再次要求澄清。

exampleEn: The ground began to quake during the earthquake, frightening everyone in the building.
exampleZh: 地震期間地面開始震動，嚇壞了大樓裡的每個人。

exampleEn: The job requires specific qualifications including a university degree and experience.
exampleZh: 這份工作需要特定的資格，包括大學學位和經驗。

exampleEn: Only qualified candidates will be invited for interviews next week.
exampleZh: 只有合格的候選人將被邀請參加下週的面試。

exampleEn: You need to pass the exam to qualify for the certification.
exampleZh: 你需要通過考試才能獲得認證資格。

exampleEn: The company is known for producing high-quality products that last long.
exampleZh: 這家公司以生產持久的高品質產品而聞名。

exampleEn: It is difficult to quantify the emotional impact of such a tragic event.
exampleZh: 很難量化這種悲慘事件的情感影響。

exampleEn: Quality is more important than quantity when it comes to work.
exampleZh: 在工作方面，品質比數量更重要。

exampleEn: Travelers entering the country must undergo a two-week quarantine to prevent disease.
exampleZh: 進入該國的旅客必須接受兩週的隔離以預防疾病。

exampleEn: The couple had a quarrel about money but made up quickly.
exampleZh: 這對夫婦因為錢吵架，但很快就和好了。

exampleEn: He becomes quarrelsome when he is tired and starts arguments over nothing.
exampleZh: 當他累的時候，他變得好爭吵，並因小事開始爭論。

exampleEn: The meeting will start at a quarter past three this afternoon.
exampleZh: 會議將在今天下午三點一刻開始。

exampleEn: The queen addressed the nation during the important ceremony yesterday evening.
exampleZh: 女王昨晚在重要儀式上向全國發表講話。

exampleEn: She felt a queer sensation in her stomach before the big presentation.
exampleZh: 在大型演講之前，她感到胃裡有一種奇怪的感覺。

exampleEn: If you have any query about the bill, please contact customer service.
exampleZh: 如果您對帳單有任何疑問，請聯繫客戶服務。

exampleEn: Please raise your hand if you have a question about the lesson.
exampleZh: 如果你對課程有問題，請舉手。

exampleEn: Don't forget to put a question mark at the end of a question.
exampleZh: 別忘了在問題的末尾加上問號。

exampleEn: Please fill out this questionnaire to give us feedback on our services.
exampleZh: 請填寫此問卷以向我們提供有關我們服務的反饋。

exampleEn: Please wait in the queue patiently until it's your turn.
exampleZh: 請耐心在隊列中等待，直到輪到你。

exampleEn: We need a quick solution to this problem before it gets worse.
exampleZh: 在問題變得更糟之前，我們需要一個快速的解決方案。

exampleEn: Please respond to the email quickly as it's quite urgent.
exampleZh: 請快速回覆電子郵件，因為它相當緊急。
