exampleEn: The library is a quiet place for studying and reading books.
exampleZh: 圖書館是一個安靜的學習和讀書的地方。

exampleEn: The children played quietly in the corner while adults talked.
exampleZh: 孩子們在角落裡安靜地玩耍，而大人們在談話。

exampleEn: He decided to quit his job and start his own business.
exampleZh: 他決定辭職並開始自己的生意。

exampleEn: The movie was quite interesting and kept me engaged throughout.
exampleZh: 這部電影相當有趣，讓我整個過程都很投入。

exampleEn: The teacher gave a surprise quiz to test students' understanding today.
exampleZh: 老師今天進行了突擊測驗以測試學生的理解。

exampleEn: The movie is full of quotable lines that fans love to repeat.
exampleZh: 這部電影充滿了粉絲們喜歡重複的引用台詞。

exampleEn: He started his speech with a famous quotation from Martin Luther King Jr.
exampleZh: 他以馬丁·路德·金的一句名言開始了他的演講。

exampleEn: The famous quote says that knowledge is power for everyone.
exampleZh: 著名的名言說知識對每個人來說都是力量。

exampleEn: The white rabbit hopped across the garden eating fresh vegetables happily.
exampleZh: 白兔在花園裡跳來跳去，快樂地吃著新鮮蔬菜。

exampleEn: The marathon race attracted thousands of runners from around the world.
exampleZh: 馬拉松比賽吸引了來自世界各地的數千名跑者。

exampleEn: Racial discrimination is illegal and morally wrong in modern society today.
exampleZh: 在當今現代社會，種族歧視是非法的且道德上是錯誤的。

exampleEn: We must work together to fight against racism and promote equality for all.
exampleZh: 我們必須共同努力打擊種族主義，促進所有人的平等。

exampleEn: Making racist comments is unacceptable and hurtful to people of different backgrounds.
exampleZh: 發表種族主義言論是不可接受的，並且會傷害不同背景的人。

exampleEn: She placed the baking tray on the cooling rack after taking it out.
exampleZh: 取出烤盤後，她將其放在冷卻架上。

exampleEn: The tennis player smashed his racket on the ground in frustration after losing.
exampleZh: 網球運動員輸球後沮喪地將球拍摔在地上。

exampleEn: The plane was detected on the enemy radar as it entered their airspace.
exampleZh: 飛機進入敵方領空時在雷達上被檢測到。

exampleEn: She seems to radiate happiness and positivity wherever she goes in life.
exampleZh: 無論她走到哪裡，她似乎都散發著幸福和積極性。

exampleEn: Excessive exposure to radiation can cause serious health problems over time.
exampleZh: 過度暴露於輻射可能會隨著時間導致嚴重的健康問題。

exampleEn: The politician proposed radical changes to the tax system to boost economy.
exampleZh: 這位政治家提出了對稅收制度的激進改革以提振經濟。

exampleEn: Her life changed radically after she won the lottery and moved abroad.
exampleZh: 在她中彩票並移居國外後，她的生活發生了根本性的變化。

exampleEn: I listen to the radio every morning while driving to work.
exampleZh: 我每天早上開車上班時聽收音機。

exampleEn: Marie Curie discovered radium and conducted pioneering research on radioactivity in lab.
exampleZh: 瑪麗·居里發現了鐳，並在實驗室對放射性進行了開創性研究。

exampleEn: Birds built their nests in the high rafters of the old barn.
exampleZh: 鳥兒在舊穀倉的高椽子上築巢。

exampleEn: Use an old rag to clean the dirty windows and surfaces.
exampleZh: 用舊抹布清潔髒窗戶和表面。

exampleEn: He was filled with rage when he found out that he was lied to.
exampleZh: 當他發現自己被騙時，他充滿了憤怒。

exampleEn: Hold onto the rail when going up or down the stairs.
exampleZh: 上下樓梯時抓住扶手。

exampleEn: The railroad connects the east and west coasts, transporting goods and people.
exampleZh: 鐵路連接東海岸和西海岸，運輸貨物和人員。

exampleEn: We took a scenic railway journey through the mountains and enjoyed the view.
exampleZh: 我們乘火車穿過山區進行了一次風景優美的旅行，並享受了美景。

exampleEn: It's going to rain tomorrow according to the weather forecast.
exampleZh: 根據天氣預報，明天會下雨。

exampleEn: A beautiful rainbow appeared in the sky after the rain stopped.
exampleZh: 雨停後，天空中出現了一道美麗的彩虹。

exampleEn: Don't forget to wear your raincoat because it's raining outside.
exampleZh: 別忘了穿雨衣，因為外面在下雨。

exampleEn: The region has experienced heavy rainfall causing flooding in low areas.
exampleZh: 該地區經歷了大雨，導致低窪地區淹水。

exampleEn: The Amazon rainforest is home to millions of species of plants and animals.
exampleZh: 亞馬遜熱帶雨林是數百萬種植物和動物的家園。

exampleEn: The heavy rainstorm caused flooding in the streets and power outages everywhere.
exampleZh: 暴雨導致街道洪水和到處停電。

exampleEn: On rainy days, children prefer playing indoors with toys and games.
exampleZh: 在雨天，孩子們更喜歡在室內玩玩具和遊戲。

exampleEn: Please raise your hand if you know the answer to question.
exampleZh: 如果你知道問題的答案，請舉手。

exampleEn: Thousands of people gathered for a political rally to support their candidate.
exampleZh: 成千上萬的人聚集在一起舉行政治集會支持他們的候選人。

exampleEn: The angry ram charged at the fence with its large curved horns.
exampleZh: 憤怒的公羊用巨大的彎角衝向柵欄。

exampleEn: Wheelchair users can access the building using the ramp instead of stairs.
exampleZh: 輪椅使用者可以使用坡道而不是樓梯進入大樓。

exampleEn: The store offers a wide range of products at affordable prices.
exampleZh: 這家商店以實惠的價格提供各種各樣的產品。

exampleEn: The park ranger guided the tour group through the forest safely today.
exampleZh: 公園管理員今天安全地帶領旅遊團穿過森林。

exampleEn: She achieved the rank of captain after years of military service.
exampleZh: 經過多年的軍事服務，她獲得了上尉軍銜。

exampleEn: He likes to listen to rap music because of the rhythmic lyrics.
exampleZh: 他喜歡聽饒舌音樂，因為歌詞有節奏感。

exampleEn: Rape is a serious crime that causes severe physical and emotional trauma.
exampleZh: 強姦是一種嚴重的犯罪，會造成嚴重的身心創傷。

exampleEn: The rapid growth of technology has changed our lives dramatically recently.
exampleZh: 技術的快速發展最近戲劇性地改變了我們的生活。

exampleEn: The population is growing rapidly in urban areas around the world.
exampleZh: 世界各地城市地區的人口正在快速增長。

exampleEn: This stamp is very rare and valuable to collectors worldwide.
exampleZh: 這張郵票非常罕見，對全球收藏家來說很有價值。

exampleEn: I rarely eat fast food because I prefer healthy home-cooked meals.
exampleZh: 我很少吃快餐，因為我更喜歡健康的家常菜。

exampleEn: He developed a red rash on his arm after touching the poison ivy.
exampleZh: 摸了毒藤後，他的手臂上起了紅疹。

exampleEn: She picked a ripe raspberry from the bush and ate it immediately.
exampleZh: 她從灌木叢中摘了一顆成熟的覆盆子，立刻吃了下去。

exampleEn: Rats can spread diseases and should be controlled in urban areas.
exampleZh: 老鼠可以傳播疾病，應該在城市地區進行控制。

exampleEn: The unemployment rate has decreased significantly over the past year.
exampleZh: 過去一年失業率顯著下降。

exampleEn: I'd rather stay home tonight than go to the party.
exampleZh: 我今晚寧願待在家裡也不去參加派對。

exampleEn: The movie received a high rating from critics for its excellent acting.
exampleZh: 這部電影因其出色的表演而獲得評論家的高度評價。

exampleEn: During the war, the government had to ration food and fuel supplies.
exampleZh: 戰爭期間，政府不得不定量供應食物和燃料。

exampleEn: Let's sit down and have a rational discussion to solve this problem calmly.
exampleZh: 讓我們坐下來進行理性討論，冷靜地解決這個問題。

exampleEn: The windows began to rattle as the heavy truck drove past house.
exampleZh: 當重型卡車駛過房子時，窗戶開始嘎嘎作響。

exampleEn: The hurricane ravaged the coast, destroying homes and businesses in its path.
exampleZh: 颶風蹂躪了海岸，摧毀了沿途的房屋和企業。

exampleEn: Don't eat raw meat as it may contain harmful bacteria.
exampleZh: 不要吃生肉，因為它可能含有有害細菌。

exampleEn: The sun's rays provide warmth and light essential for life.
exampleZh: 太陽光線提供生命所必需的溫暖和光線。

exampleEn: Use a sharp razor to shave carefully and avoid cutting yourself.
exampleZh: 使用鋒利的剃刀小心刮鬍子並避免割傷自己。

exampleEn: We're going to the cinema tonight to see the new action movie.
exampleZh: 我們今晚要去電影院看新的動作片。

exampleEn: The book is on the top shelf; I can't reach it.
exampleZh: 書在最上面的架子上；我夠不到它。

exampleEn: How did she react when you told her the surprising news?
exampleZh: 當你告訴她這個令人驚訝的消息時，她是如何反應的？

exampleEn: The chemical reaction produced heat and light during the experiment today.
exampleZh: 今天實驗期間化學反應產生了熱和光。

exampleEn: I love to read books in my free time especially novels.
exampleZh: 我喜歡在空閒時間讀書，尤其是小說。

exampleEn: The magazine has millions of readers around the world every month.
exampleZh: 這本雜誌每月在全球有數百萬讀者。

exampleEn: She readily agreed to help with the project without hesitation.
exampleZh: 她毫不猶豫地欣然同意幫助這個專案。

exampleEn: Reading is an excellent way to improve vocabulary and language skills.
exampleZh: 閱讀是提高詞彙和語言技能的絕佳方式。

exampleEn: Are you ready to start the exam now or need more time?
exampleZh: 你現在準備好開始考試了還是需要更多時間？

exampleEn: Is this story real or just made up for entertainment purposes?
exampleZh: 這個故事是真的還是只是為了娛樂而編造的？

exampleEn: Investing in real estate can be profitable if you choose the right location.
exampleZh: 如果你選擇正確的地點，投資房地產可能是有利可圖的。

exampleEn: The movie's special effects were so realistic that they looked completely real.
exampleZh: 這部電影的特效非常逼真，看起來完全真實。

exampleEn: Virtual reality technology is changing how we experience games and entertainment.
exampleZh: 虛擬現實技術正在改變我們體驗遊戲和娛樂的方式。

exampleEn: The realization that he had lost his wallet suddenly hit him hard.
exampleZh: 他突然意識到自己丟了錢包，這對他打擊很大。

exampleEn: I didn't realize how late it was until I checked the clock.
exampleZh: 直到我看了時鐘，我才意識到已經這麼晚了。

exampleEn: I'm really sorry for being late to the important meeting today.
exampleZh: 我真的很抱歉今天重要會議遲到了。

exampleEn: The garden is located at the rear of the house, away from street.
exampleZh: 花園位於房子的後面，遠離街道。

exampleEn: She decided to rearrange the furniture in her living room for a change.
exampleZh: 她決定重新佈置客廳的傢俱以換個樣貌。

exampleEn: There must be a good reason why she didn't come to work.
exampleZh: 她沒來上班一定有充分的理由。

exampleEn: The price seems reasonable for the quality of the product offered.
exampleZh: 對於提供的產品品質來說，價格似乎很合理。

exampleEn: The hotel is reasonably priced and offers good value for money.
exampleZh: 這家飯店價格合理，物有所值。

exampleEn: The teenager started to rebel against his parents' strict rules and authority.
exampleZh: 這位青少年開始反抗父母嚴格的規定和權威。

exampleEn: He went through a rebellious phase in high school, dyeing his hair pink.
exampleZh: 他在高中經歷了一個叛逆階段，把頭髮染成了粉紅色。

exampleEn: After the earthquake, the community came together to rebuild their destroyed homes.
exampleZh: 地震後，社區團結起來重建被毀的家園。

exampleEn: I can't recall where I put my keys this morning anywhere.
exampleZh: 我想不起來今天早上把鑰匙放在哪裡了。

exampleEn: Keep the receipt in case you need to return the item.
exampleZh: 保留收據以防你需要退貨。

exampleEn: I received your email and will respond as soon as possible.
exampleZh: 我收到了你的電子郵件，會盡快回覆。

exampleEn: Have you read the recent news about the upcoming election results?
exampleZh: 你讀過關於即將到來的選舉結果的最新消息嗎？

exampleEn: I recently started learning Spanish and find it quite challenging but fun.
exampleZh: 我最近開始學習西班牙語，發現它很有挑戰性但很有趣。

exampleEn: The wedding reception was held at a beautiful hotel by the beach.
exampleZh: 婚宴在海灘邊的一家美麗飯店舉行。

exampleEn: The receptionist greeted us with a warm smile when we arrived at the hotel.
exampleZh: 當我們到達飯店時，接待員帶著溫暖的微笑迎接我們。

exampleEn: The country is facing a severe economic recession with high unemployment rates.
exampleZh: 該國正面臨嚴重的經濟衰退，失業率居高不下。

exampleEn: Follow the recipe carefully to ensure the cake turns out perfectly.
exampleZh: 仔細遵循食譜以確保蛋糕完美呈現。

exampleEn: The student can recite the entire poem from memory without mistakes.
exampleZh: 這位學生可以毫無錯誤地背誦整首詩。

exampleEn: I reckon it's going to rain later, so you should take an umbrella.
exampleZh: 我估計待會兒會下雨，所以你應該帶把傘。

exampleEn: He managed to reclaim his stolen bicycle from the police station yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天他設法從警察局取回了他被盜的自行車。

exampleEn: She received international recognition for her groundbreaking research in cancer treatment.
exampleZh: 她的癌症治療開創性研究獲得了國際認可。

exampleEn: I didn't recognize you with your new haircut and different style.
exampleZh: 我沒認出你，因為你的新髮型和不同的風格。

exampleEn: I cannot recollect exactly where I met him for the first time.
exampleZh: 我不記得到底是在哪裡第一次見到他的。

exampleEn: My recollection of the event is a bit blurry after so many years.
exampleZh: 這麼多年過去了，我對那件事的記憶有點模糊了。

exampleEn: I highly recommend this restaurant for its delicious food and excellent service.
exampleZh: 我強烈推薦這家餐廳，因為它的美味食物和優質服務。

exampleEn: It is recommendable to book your flights early to get the best prices.
exampleZh: 建議儘早預訂機票以獲得最優惠的價格。

exampleEn: The doctor's recommendation is to get more exercise and eat healthier food.
exampleZh: 醫生的建議是多運動並吃更健康的食物。

exampleEn: Please reconsider your decision to resign; we really need you on the team.
exampleZh: 請重新考慮你辭職的決定；我們團隊真的需要你。

exampleEn: The athlete broke the world record for the 100-meter sprint yesterday.
exampleZh: 這位運動員昨天打破了一百公尺短跑的世界紀錄。

exampleEn: The band spent weeks in the studio recording their new album of songs.
exampleZh: 樂團在錄音室花了幾週時間錄製他們的新歌專輯。

exampleEn: It takes time to recover from a serious illness or injury.
exampleZh: 從嚴重疾病或傷害中恢復需要時間。

exampleEn: The patient made a full recovery after months of treatment and rest.
exampleZh: 病人經過數月的治療和休息後完全康復了。

exampleEn: The park provides recreation facilities for families including playgrounds and sports fields.
exampleZh: 公園為家庭提供娛樂設施，包括遊樂場和運動場。

exampleEn: The company is looking to recruit talented engineers for its new project.
exampleZh: 該公司正在尋求為其新專案招募有才華的工程師。

exampleEn: The table is rectangular in shape and can seat six people comfortably.
exampleZh: 這張桌子是長方形的，可以讓六個人舒適地坐著。

exampleEn: Please recycle plastic bottles and paper to protect the environment effectively.
exampleZh: 請回收塑膠瓶和紙張以有效保護環境。

exampleEn: This notebook is made from 100% recycled paper to help the environment.
exampleZh: 這本筆記本由 100% 再生紙製成，以幫助保護環境。

exampleEn: Recycling is an important way to reduce waste and conserve natural resources.
exampleZh: 回收利用是減少浪費和保護自然資源的重要方式。

exampleEn: She wore a beautiful red dress to the party last night.
exampleZh: 她昨晚穿了一件美麗的紅色連衣裙參加派對。

exampleEn: The teacher asked him to redo his homework because it was messy.
exampleZh: 老師要求他重做作業，因為作業很亂。

exampleEn: We need to reduce waste and pollution to protect our planet.
exampleZh: 我們需要減少廢物和污染以保護我們的星球。

exampleEn: The company announced a significant reduction in prices for all products.
exampleZh: 公司宣布所有產品價格大幅下降。

exampleEn: He was made redundant when the factory closed down due to lack of orders.
exampleZh: 由於缺乏訂單，工廠倒閉，他被裁員了。

exampleEn: Tall reeds grew along the banks of the river, swaying in the wind.
exampleZh: 高高的蘆葦沿著河岸生長，在風中搖曳。

exampleEn: The coral reef is teeming with colorful fish and other marine life.
exampleZh: 珊瑚礁充滿了五顏六色的魚和其他海洋生物。

exampleEn: Please refer to the instruction manual for detailed information about operation.
exampleZh: 請參閱說明手冊以獲取有關操作的詳細資訊。

exampleEn: The referee blew his whistle to signal the end of the football match.
exampleZh: 裁判吹響哨子，示意足球比賽結束。

exampleEn: The book includes references to many scientific studies and research papers.
exampleZh: 這本書包括對許多科學研究和研究論文的參考。

exampleEn: In the sentence 'John is tall, he plays basketball', 'John' is the referent of 'he'.
exampleZh: 在句子 'John is tall, he plays basketball' 中，'John' 是 'he' 的指代對象。

exampleEn: The oil refinery processes crude oil into gasoline and other useful petroleum products.
exampleZh: 煉油廠將原油加工成汽油和其他有用的石油產品。

exampleEn: The calm water reflected the beautiful mountains like a perfect mirror.
exampleZh: 平靜的水像完美的鏡子一樣反射出美麗的山脈。

exampleEn: The reflection in the mirror showed how tired I looked today.
exampleZh: 鏡子裡的倒影顯示我今天看起來多麼疲憊。

exampleEn: He was in a reflective mood, thinking about his past choices and future.
exampleZh: 他心情沉思，思考著他過去的選擇和未來。

exampleEn: The government plans to reform the education system to improve quality.
exampleZh: 政府計畫改革教育系統以提高品質。

exampleEn: Please refrain from smoking in the restaurant as it is a non-smoking area.
exampleZh: 請不要在餐廳吸菸，因為這裡是禁菸區。

exampleEn: A cold drink will refresh you on this hot summer day.
exampleZh: 在這個炎熱的夏天，一杯冷飲會讓你精神煥發。

exampleEn: Light refreshments will be served during the break at the conference today.
exampleZh: 今天的會議休息期間將供應茶點。

exampleEn: Keep the milk in the refrigerator to prevent it from spoiling quickly.
exampleZh: 把牛奶放在冰箱裡以防止它快速變質。

exampleEn: They took refuge in a cave during the sudden and violent storm.
exampleZh: 在這個突然而猛烈的風暴中，他們在一個山洞裡避難。

exampleEn: The refugee camp provided shelter and food for thousands of displaced people.
exampleZh: 難民營為成千上萬流離失所的人提供了住所和食物。

exampleEn: I returned the defective product and asked for a full refund immediately.
exampleZh: 我退回了有缺陷的產品並立即要求全額退款。

exampleEn: His refusal to cooperate made the situation more difficult for everyone.
exampleZh: 他拒絕合作使每個人的情況變得更加困難。

exampleEn: I refuse to accept this unfair treatment and will complain formally.
exampleZh: 我拒絕接受這種不公平的待遇，並將正式投訴。

exampleEn: He used scientific evidence to refute the claims made by the conspiracy theorists.
exampleZh: 他用科學證據反駁了陰謀論者提出的主張。

exampleEn: It took him months to regain his strength after the long illness.
exampleZh: 大病後他花了幾個月的時間才恢復體力。

exampleEn: Please give my regards to your family when you see them.
exampleZh: 當你見到你的家人時，請代我向他們問好。

exampleEn: I'm writing regarding the job application I submitted last week online.
exampleZh: 我寫信是關於我上週在網上提交的工作申請。

exampleEn: We'll continue with the plan regardless of the weather conditions outside.
exampleZh: 無論外面的天氣狀況如何，我們都會繼續執行計畫。

exampleEn: Bob Marley made reggae music famous all around the world with his songs.
exampleZh: 鮑勃·馬利（Bob Marley）用他的歌曲讓雷鬼音樂聞名於世。

exampleEn: The oppressive regime was finally overthrown by a popular uprising of the people.
exampleZh: 壓迫政權終於被人民起義推翻。

exampleEn: This region is famous for producing excellent wine and beautiful scenery.
exampleZh: 這個地區以生產優質葡萄酒和美麗的風景而聞名。

exampleEn: Regional differences in culture and language make the country diverse and interesting.
exampleZh: 文化和語言的地區差異使這個國家多樣化且有趣。

exampleEn: Please register for the course before the deadline next Friday afternoon.
exampleZh: 請在下週五下午截止日期前註冊課程。

exampleEn: Registration for the new semester begins next Monday at the university office.
exampleZh: 大學辦公室的新學期註冊將於下週一開始。

exampleEn: I regret not studying harder when I was younger in school.
exampleZh: 我後悔在學校年輕時沒有更努力學習。

exampleEn: Regrettably, I will not be able to attend your wedding due to work.
exampleZh: 遺憾的是，由於工作原因，我將無法參加你的婚禮。

exampleEn: Regular exercise and healthy eating are essential for maintaining good health.
exampleZh: 定期運動和健康飲食對於保持健康至關重要。

exampleEn: I visit my grandparents regularly every Sunday afternoon without fail.
exampleZh: 我每週日下午定期去看望我的祖父母，從不失誤。

exampleEn: The government regulates food safety to protect consumers from harmful products.
exampleZh: 政府監管食品安全以保護消費者免受有害產品的傷害。

exampleEn: New regulations require all drivers to wear seatbelts for safety reasons.
exampleZh: 出於安全原因，新法規要求所有駕駛員繫安全帶。

exampleEn: The dress rehearsal for the play went smoothly without any major mistakes.
exampleZh: 這齣戲的彩排進展順利，沒有任何重大錯誤。

exampleEn: We need to reinforce the walls to make the building earthquake-resistant.
exampleZh: 我們需要加固牆壁以使建築物抗震。

exampleEn: The general sent for reinforcement when the enemy attacked with overwhelming force.
exampleZh: 當敵人以壓倒性的力量進攻時，將軍派人增援。

exampleEn: The committee decided to reject the proposal due to budget constraints.
exampleZh: 由於預算限制，委員會決定拒絕該提案。

exampleEn: He didn't let the rejection of his manuscript stop him from writing.
exampleZh: 他沒有讓手稿被拒絕阻止他寫作。

exampleEn: After a short break, he decided to rejoin the team and continue playing.
exampleZh: 短暫休息後，他決定重新加入球隊繼續比賽。

exampleEn: I can relate to your feelings because I've experienced something similar.
exampleZh: 我能理解你的感受，因為我經歷過類似的事情。

exampleEn: The two crimes are believed to be related, based on the evidence found.
exampleZh: 根據發現的證據，這兩起犯罪被認為是相關的。

exampleEn: The relation between diet and health has been proven by research.
exampleZh: 飲食與健康之間的關係已被研究證明。

exampleEn: Building strong relationships requires trust, communication, and mutual respect from both sides.
exampleZh: 建立牢固的關係需要雙方的信任、溝通和相互尊重。

exampleEn: My relatives are coming to visit us during the holiday season.
exampleZh: 我的親戚將在假期期間來看望我們。

exampleEn: The test was relatively easy compared to previous examinations we took.
exampleZh: 與我們之前參加的考試相比，這次測試相對容易。

exampleEn: Einstein's theory of relativity revolutionized our understanding of space and time forever.
exampleZh: 愛因斯坦的相對論永遠徹底改變了我們對空間和時間的理解。

exampleEn: Try to relax and take deep breaths before the presentation starts.
exampleZh: 在簡報開始前試著放鬆並深呼吸。

exampleEn: Yoga is excellent for relaxation and reducing stress after a long day.
exampleZh: 瑜伽非常適合在漫長的一天後放鬆和減輕壓力。

exampleEn: She felt relaxed after a long vacation at the beach resort.
exampleZh: 在海灘度假村度過漫長假期後，她感到放鬆。

exampleEn: We spent a relaxing weekend at a spa resort in the mountains.
exampleZh: 我們在山裡的溫泉度假村度過了一個輕鬆的週末。

exampleEn: The team won the relay race by working together perfectly and efficiently.
exampleZh: 團隊通過完美高效地合作贏得了接力賽。

exampleEn: The company will release a new product next month with advanced features.
exampleZh: 公司將在下個月發布一款具有先進功能的新產品。

exampleEn: Please provide only relevant information that relates to the topic discussed.
exampleZh: 請只提供與討論主題相關的相關資訊。

exampleEn: He's a reliable person who always keeps his promises and commitments.
exampleZh: 他是一個可靠的人，總是信守承諾和義務。

exampleEn: Use of the typewriter is a relic of the past in modern offices.
exampleZh: 在現代辦公室使用打字機是過去的遺跡。

exampleEn: The medicine provided immediate relief from the pain I was experiencing.
exampleZh: 這種藥立即緩解了我正在經歷的疼痛。

exampleEn: This medication will help relieve your headache within thirty minutes effectively.
exampleZh: 這種藥物將在三十分鐘內有效緩解你的頭痛。

exampleEn: I was relieved to hear that everyone was safe after the accident.
exampleZh: 聽到事故發生後每個人都平安無事，我就放心了。

exampleEn: People of all religions should be treated with respect and tolerance.
exampleZh: 所有宗教的人都應該受到尊重和寬容對待。

exampleEn: Religious freedom is a fundamental human right protected by law everywhere.
exampleZh: 宗教自由是受法律保護的基本人權，到處都是。

exampleEn: She was reluctant to accept the job offer because of location.
exampleZh: 她因為地點而不願意接受這份工作邀請。

exampleEn: You can rely on me to help you whenever you need assistance.
exampleZh: 無論何時你需要幫助，你都可以依靠我幫助你。

exampleEn: Please remain seated until the plane comes to a complete stop.
exampleZh: 請保持坐著，直到飛機完全停止。

exampleEn: He spent the remainder of the day reading a book in the garden.
exampleZh: 他在花園裡看書度過了那一天的剩餘時間。

exampleEn: The remaining students will take the exam tomorrow morning at school.
exampleZh: 剩餘的學生明天早上將在學校參加考試。

exampleEn: The remains of the ancient city were discovered by archaeologists last year.
exampleZh: 這座古城的遺跡是考古學家去年發現的。

exampleEn: His rude remark offended everyone at the dinner party last night.
exampleZh: 他昨晚在晚宴上的粗魯言論冒犯了每個人。

exampleEn: She made remarkable progress in learning English within just six months.
exampleZh: 她在短短六個月內在學習英語方面取得了顯著進步。

exampleEn: The weather has been remarkably mild for this time of the year.
exampleZh: 對於每年的這個時候來說，天氣非常溫和。

exampleEn: Hot tea with honey is a good home remedy for a sore throat.
exampleZh: 加蜂蜜的熱茶是治療喉嚨痛的良好家庭療法。

exampleEn: I can't remember where I parked the car this morning anywhere.
exampleZh: 我想不起來今天早上把車停在哪裡了。

exampleEn: A service was held in remembrance of soldiers who died in the war.
exampleZh: 舉行了一次儀式以紀念在戰爭中犧牲的士兵。

exampleEn: Please remind me to call the doctor tomorrow morning for appointment.
exampleZh: 請提醒我明天早上打電話給醫生預約。

exampleEn: Set a reminder on your phone so you don't forget the meeting.
exampleZh: 在手機上設置提醒，這樣你就不會忘記會議。

exampleEn: The village is located in a remote area far from any cities.
exampleZh: 這個村莊位於遠離任何城市的偏遠地區。

exampleEn: I can't find the remote control to change the TV channel anywhere.
exampleZh: 我到處都找不到遙控器換電視頻道。

exampleEn: Please remove your shoes before entering the house to keep clean.
exampleZh: 進屋前請脫鞋以保持清潔。

exampleEn: I need to renew my passport before it expires next month soon.
exampleZh: 我需要在下個月護照過期之前儘快更新護照。

exampleEn: The rent for this apartment is quite expensive but includes utilities.
exampleZh: 這間公寓的租金相當昂貴，但包括水電費。

exampleEn: The monthly rental for the apartment includes water and electricity bills.
exampleZh: 公寓的月租金包括水費和電費。

exampleEn: We need to reorganize the filing system to make it more efficient.
exampleZh: 我們需要重組歸檔系統以使其更有效率。

exampleEn: They decided to repaint the kitchen walls a bright yellow color.
exampleZh: 他們決定把廚房的牆壁重新漆成鮮黃色。

exampleEn: The car needs repair before we can drive it safely again.
exampleZh: 汽車需要維修，然後我們才能再次安全駕駛。

exampleEn: I promise to repay the money you lent me as soon as possible.
exampleZh: 我答應盡快償還你借給我的錢。

exampleEn: Could you please repeat that? I didn't hear you clearly enough.
exampleZh: 你能重複一遍嗎？我沒有聽得足夠清楚。

exampleEn: I've told you repeatedly not to leave the door unlocked overnight.
exampleZh: 我反覆告訴你不要整夜不鎖門。

exampleEn: The pianist has a wide repertoire of classical pieces that he performs.
exampleZh: 這位鋼琴家有廣泛的古典樂曲目可供演奏。

exampleEn: Repetition is key to learning a new language or skill effectively.
exampleZh: 重複是有效學習新語言或技能的關鍵。

exampleEn: We need to replace the broken window as soon as possible.
exampleZh: 我們需要盡快更換破損的窗戶。

exampleEn: We need to find a replacement for the broken part of the machine.
exampleZh: 我們需要找到機器損壞部分的替換件。

exampleEn: He bought a replica of the Eiffel Tower as a souvenir from Paris.
exampleZh: 他買了一個艾菲爾鐵塔的複製品作為巴黎的紀念品。

exampleEn: Please reply to my email when you have time this week.
exampleZh: 本週有時間時請回覆我的電子郵件。

exampleEn: The news report said that the economy is improving gradually this year.
exampleZh: 新聞報導說今年經濟正在逐步改善。

exampleEn: The reporter interviewed witnesses to gather information for the news story.
exampleZh: 記者採訪目擊者以收集新聞報導的資訊。

exampleEn: The lawyer will represent you in court during the trial next month.
exampleZh: 律師將在下個月的審判中在法庭上代表你。

exampleEn: Each country sent a representative to attend the international conference this week.
exampleZh: 每個國家都派代表參加本週的國際會議。

exampleEn: She tried to repress her anger, but it showed on her face clearly.
exampleZh: 她試圖壓抑她的憤怒，但這清楚地表現在她的臉上。

exampleEn: The political repression in the country led to widespread protests and unrest.
exampleZh: 該國的政治鎮壓導致了廣泛的抗議和動亂。

exampleEn: Due to high demand, the publisher decided to reprint the popular book.
exampleZh: 由於需求量大，出版商決定重印這本暢銷書。

exampleEn: Bacteria can reproduce very quickly under the right conditions in the lab.
exampleZh: 細菌可以在實驗室的合適條件下快速繁殖。

exampleEn: The teacher had to reprove the student for talking during the exam.
exampleZh: 老師不得不責備在考試期間講話的學生。

exampleEn: The country became a republic after gaining independence from colonial rule.
exampleZh: 這個國家在擺脫殖民統治獲得獨立後成為共和國。

exampleEn: The restaurant has an excellent reputation for quality food and service.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳因優質食物和服務而享有極好的聲譽。

exampleEn: I'd like to request a day off next Friday for personal reasons.
exampleZh: 我想因個人原因請下週五休假一天。

exampleEn: This job requires excellent communication skills and previous experience in sales.
exampleZh: 這份工作需要出色的溝通技巧和以前的銷售經驗。

exampleEn: Meeting all the requirements is essential for admission to the university.
exampleZh: 滿足所有要求對於大學錄取至關重要。

exampleEn: The firefighters rescued people trapped in the burning building bravely yesterday.
exampleZh: 消防員昨天勇敢地救出了被困在燃燒建築物中的人。

exampleEn: Scientific research is essential for developing new medicines and treatments effectively.
exampleZh: 科學研究對於有效開發新藥物和治療方法至關重要。

exampleEn: The researcher spent years studying the effects of climate change globally.
exampleZh: 這位研究人員花了多年時間研究全球氣候變遷的影響。

exampleEn: The daughter resembles her mother in both appearance and personality traits.
exampleZh: 女兒在外表和性格特徵上都像她的母親。

exampleEn: I made a reservation at the restaurant for dinner tomorrow night.
exampleZh: 我在餐廳預訂了明晚的晚餐。

exampleEn: Please reserve a table for four people at seven o'clock tonight.
exampleZh: 請為今晚七點預訂一張四人桌。

exampleEn: The prime minister's official residence is located in the capital city center.
exampleZh: 總理的官邸位於首都中心。

exampleEn: All residents must follow the building rules and regulations strictly always.
exampleZh: 所有居民必須始終嚴格遵守建築規則和法規。

exampleEn: This is a quiet residential area with many families and schools nearby.
exampleZh: 這是一個安靜的住宅區，附近有許多家庭和學校。

exampleEn: She decided to resign from her position to pursue other opportunities.
exampleZh: 她決定辭去職位以追求其他機會。

exampleEn: He handed in his resignation letter and left the company the next day.
exampleZh: 他遞交了辭職信，第二天就離開了公司。

exampleEn: It's hard to resist eating chocolate when you're on a diet.
exampleZh: 當你在節食時，很難抗拒吃巧克力。

exampleEn: The bacteria showed resistance to antibiotics making treatment more difficult for doctors.
exampleZh: 細菌對抗生素表現出抗藥性，使醫生的治療更加困難。

exampleEn: My New Year's resolution is to exercise more and eat healthier.
exampleZh: 我的新年決心是多運動並吃得更健康。

exampleEn: We need to resolve this conflict peacefully through dialogue and compromise.
exampleZh: 我們需要通過對話和妥協和平解決這場衝突。

exampleEn: His deep, resonant voice filled the concert hall without a microphone.
exampleZh: 他深沉、洪亮的聲音在沒有麥克風的情況下充滿了音樂廳。

exampleEn: The beach resort offers luxury accommodation and excellent facilities for guests.
exampleZh: 海灘度假村為客人提供豪華住宿和優良設施。

exampleEn: Natural resources must be used wisely to ensure sustainability for future generations.
exampleZh: 必須明智地使用自然資源以確保未來世代的可持續性。

exampleEn: Children should learn to respect their elders and teachers from young age.
exampleZh: 孩子們應該從小學會尊重長輩和老師。

exampleEn: He comes from a respectable family that is well-known in the community.
exampleZh: 他來自一個在社區中廣為人知的體面家庭。

exampleEn: Even though they didn't win, the team played respectably and fought hard.
exampleZh: 儘管他們沒有獲勝，但球隊表現得令人尊敬，並且努力拚搏。

exampleEn: She is a highly respected doctor who has saved many lives.
exampleZh: 她是一位備受尊敬的醫生，挽救了許多生命。

exampleEn: Artificial respiration was used to help the drowning victim breathe again.
exampleZh: 人工呼吸被用來幫助溺水者再次呼吸。

exampleEn: Smoking can cause serious respiratory problems like asthma and lung cancer.
exampleZh: 吸菸會導致嚴重的呼吸道問題，如哮喘和肺癌。

exampleEn: Please respond to the invitation by Friday so we can finalize plans.
exampleZh: 請在週五前回覆邀請，以便我們最終確定計畫。

exampleEn: I'm still waiting for a response to my job application submitted.
exampleZh: 我仍在等待對我提交的工作申請的回覆。

exampleEn: Parents have the responsibility to provide for their children's basic needs.
exampleZh: 父母有責任滿足孩子的基本需求。

exampleEn: Who is responsible for this mistake that caused so much trouble?
exampleZh: 誰對造成這麼多麻煩的這個錯誤負責？

exampleEn: You need to get plenty of rest to recover from illness.
exampleZh: 你需要充分休息才能從疾病中恢復。

exampleEn: This restaurant serves authentic Italian food with fresh ingredients daily.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳每天供應使用新鮮食材的正宗義大利食物。

exampleEn: The government plans to restore the historic building to its original condition.
exampleZh: 政府計畫將歷史建築恢復到原來的狀態。

exampleEn: The new law will restrict smoking in all public places nationwide.
exampleZh: 新法律將在全國所有公共場所限制吸菸。

exampleEn: There are restrictions on the amount of luggage you can bring.
exampleZh: 你可以攜帶的行李數量有限制。

exampleEn: Hard work and dedication will eventually lead to positive results and success.
exampleZh: 努力工作和奉獻最終會帶來積極的結果和成功。

exampleEn: Please send your resume and cover letter to apply for the job.
exampleZh: 請發送您的簡歷和求職信以申請該工作。

exampleEn: She works in retail, selling clothes at a popular fashion store.
exampleZh: 她從事零售業，在一家受歡迎的時裝店賣衣服。

exampleEn: The retailer offers a wide range of products at competitive prices.
exampleZh: 該零售商以具有競爭力的價格提供各種產品。

exampleEn: The company wants to retain talented employees by offering better benefits.
exampleZh: 公司希望通過提供更好的福利來留住有才華的員工。

exampleEn: Lack of sunlight can retard the growth of plants in the garden.
exampleZh: 缺乏陽光會阻礙花園中植物的生長。

exampleEn: Grandma loves to retell stories from her childhood to her grandchildren.
exampleZh: 奶奶喜歡向孫子們重述她童年的故事。

exampleEn: The retina is the part of the eye that detects light.
exampleZh: 視網膜是眼睛檢測光線的部分。

exampleEn: My father plans to retire next year after working for decades.
exampleZh: 我父親計畫在工作了幾十年後明年退休。

exampleEn: My father is a retired police officer who now enjoys gardening.
exampleZh: 我父親是一名退休警察，現在喜歡園藝。

exampleEn: Many people look forward to retirement when they can relax and travel.
exampleZh: 許多人期待退休，那時他們可以放鬆和旅行。

exampleEn: The army had to retreat when they were outnumbered by the enemy.
exampleZh: 當軍隊人數寡不敵眾時，他們不得不撤退。

exampleEn: The dog ran to retrieve the ball that his owner threw.
exampleZh: 狗跑去取回主人扔的球。

exampleEn: In retrospect, I should have studied harder for the final exam.
exampleZh: 回想起來，我應該為期末考試更努力學習。

exampleEn: I'll return the book to the library before the due date.
exampleZh: 我會在到期日之前把書還給圖書館。

exampleEn: The reunification of East and West Germany happened in 1990 peacefully.
exampleZh: 東德和西德於 1990 年和平統一。

exampleEn: Efforts are being made to reunify the divided country after the war.
exampleZh: 正在努力在戰後統一分裂的國家。

exampleEn: We are having a family reunion next summer to see all our relatives.
exampleZh: 我們明年夏天將舉行家庭聚會，見見所有的親戚。

exampleEn: The investigation will reveal the truth about what really happened that night.
exampleZh: 調查將揭示那天晚上真正發生了什麼的真相。

exampleEn: The revelation of the secret caused a scandal in the small town.
exampleZh: 這個秘密的揭露在小鎮上引起了醜聞。

exampleEn: Seeking revenge only creates more problems and doesn't solve anything.
exampleZh: 尋求報復只會製造更多問題，並不能解決任何事情。

exampleEn: The company's revenue increased significantly after the launch of the new product.
exampleZh: 推出新產品後，公司的收入顯著增加。

exampleEn: People showed great reverence for the old leader during the ceremony.
exampleZh: 人們在儀式上對這位老領導人表示極大的崇敬。

exampleEn: Please reverse the car carefully into the parking space without hitting anything.
exampleZh: 請小心倒車進入停車位，不要撞到任何東西。

exampleEn: Please review the document carefully before signing it tomorrow morning.
exampleZh: 明天早上簽署之前請仔細審查文件。

exampleEn: I need to revise my essay before submitting it to teacher.
exampleZh: 在提交給老師之前，我需要修改我的文章。

exampleEn: The book is now in its third revision with updated information.
exampleZh: 這本書現在是第三次修訂，包含更新的資訊。

exampleEn: There has been a revival of interest in vinyl records recently.
exampleZh: 最近人們對乙烯基唱片的興趣復甦了。

exampleEn: The doctors tried to revive the patient who had stopped breathing.
exampleZh: 醫生試圖使停止呼吸的病人甦醒。

exampleEn: The industrial revolution changed society and transformed how people lived and worked.
exampleZh: 工業革命改變了社會，改變了人們的生活和工作方式。

exampleEn: The invention was revolutionary and changed the entire industry completely forever.
exampleZh: 這項發明是革命性的，永遠徹底改變了整個產業。

exampleEn: Smartphones revolutionized communication and how we access information daily.
exampleZh: 智慧型手機徹底改變了通訊和我們每天獲取資訊的方式。

exampleEn: The Earth and other planets revolve around the sun in the solar system.
exampleZh: 地球和其他行星在太陽系中圍繞太陽旋轉。

exampleEn: Hard work will be rewarded with success and recognition eventually.
exampleZh: 努力工作最終會得到成功和認可的回報。

exampleEn: You need to rewrite this essay to improve the structure and clarity.
exampleZh: 你需要重寫這篇文章以改善結構和清晰度。

exampleEn: The rhinoceros has thick skin and a large horn on its nose.
exampleZh: 犀牛有厚厚的皮膚，鼻子上有一個大角。

exampleEn: Cat and hat act as a rhyme because they end with same sound.
exampleZh: 貓和帽子押韻，因為它們以相同的聲音結尾。

exampleEn: The music has a fast rhythm that makes you want to dance.
exampleZh: 這音樂節奏很快，讓你想跳舞。

exampleEn: The rhythmic beating of the drum echoed through the forest night.
exampleZh: 鼓的有節奏的敲擊聲在森林的夜晚迴蕩。

exampleEn: He broke a rib when he fell off his bicycle yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天他從自行車上摔下來斷了一根肋骨。

exampleEn: She tied a pink ribbon around the gift box to make it pretty.
exampleZh: 她在禮品盒上繫了一條粉紅色的絲帶，讓它看起來很漂亮。

exampleEn: Rice is a staple food for billions of people around world.
exampleZh: 大米是全球數十億人的主食。

exampleEn: The country is rich in natural resources including oil and minerals.
exampleZh: 這個國家自然資源豐富，包括石油和礦物。

exampleEn: We need to get rid of these old clothes and donate them.
exampleZh: 我們需要處理掉這些舊衣服並捐贈它們。

exampleEn: Can you solve this riddle: What has keys but can't open locks?
exampleZh: 你能解開這個謎語嗎：什麼有鑰匙卻打不開鎖？

exampleEn: Would you like to ride your bicycle to school tomorrow morning?
exampleZh: 你明天早上想騎自行車去學校嗎？

exampleEn: The horse rider wore a helmet for safety while galloping fast.
exampleZh: 騎馬者在快速奔跑時戴著頭盔以確保安全。

exampleEn: We walked along the mountain ridge and enjoyed the spectacular views.
exampleZh: 我們沿著山脊行走，欣賞壯麗的景色。

exampleEn: The idea sounds ridiculous but it might actually work in practice.
exampleZh: 這個想法聽起來很荒謬，但實際上可能會奏效。

exampleEn: Turn right at the next intersection to reach the hospital.
exampleZh: 在下一個十字路口右轉到達醫院。

exampleEn: He was a man of great righteousness who always did what was right.
exampleZh: 他是一個非常正義的人，總是做正確的事。

exampleEn: In many countries, people drive on the right-hand side of the road.
exampleZh: 在許多國家，人們在道路的右側開車。

exampleEn: He was rightly praised for his brave actions during the emergency.
exampleZh: 他在緊急情況下的勇敢行為受到正確的稱讚。

exampleEn: He filled the glass to the rim with cold water and ice.
exampleZh: 他將玻璃杯裝滿冷水和冰塊，直到邊緣。

exampleEn: The phone is ringing; please answer it as soon as possible.
exampleZh: 電話在響；請盡快接聽。

exampleEn: Be careful not to rip the paper when you open the package.
exampleZh: 打開包裹時要小心不要撕破紙。

exampleEn: The fruit is ripe and ready to eat now at perfect sweetness.
exampleZh: 水果現在已經成熟，可以吃了，甜度完美。

exampleEn: The sun rises in the east every morning without fail.
exampleZh: 太陽每天早上從東方升起，從不失誤。

exampleEn: Smoking increases the risk of developing serious health problems significantly.
exampleZh: 吸菸顯著增加患嚴重健康問題的風險。

exampleEn: Investing all your money in one stock is very risky and unwise.
exampleZh: 把所有錢投資在一隻股票上是非常冒險和不明智的。

exampleEn: The initiation rite marked the transition from childhood to adulthood for boys.
exampleZh: 入會儀式標誌著男孩從童年過渡到成年。

exampleEn: Drinking coffee in the morning is a daily ritual for many people.
exampleZh: 早上喝咖啡是許多人的日常儀式。

exampleEn: The two companies are rivals in the smartphone market, competing fiercely.
exampleZh: 這兩家公司是智慧型手機市場的競爭對手，競爭激烈。

exampleEn: The river flows through several countries before reaching the ocean finally.
exampleZh: 這條河流經幾個國家，最終到達海洋。

exampleEn: The road to success is long and requires hard work and dedication.
exampleZh: 成功之路漫長，需要努力工作和奉獻。

exampleEn: We stopped at a roadside stall to buy some fresh fruit.
exampleZh: 我們在路邊攤停下來買了一些新鮮水果。

exampleEn: Sheep roam freely over the hills in this part of the country.
exampleZh: 在這個國家的這個地區，綿羊在山上自由漫遊。

exampleEn: We heard the loud roar of a lion in the distance at night.
exampleZh: 晚上我們在遠處聽到了獅子的吼叫聲。

exampleEn: Roast the chicken in the oven for one hour at high temperature.
exampleZh: 在烤箱中以高溫烤雞一小時。

exampleEn: Someone tried to rob the bank but was caught by police.
exampleZh: 有人試圖搶劫銀行，但被警察抓住了。

exampleEn: The police are investigating the robbery that occurred downtown last night.
exampleZh: 警方正在調查昨晚在市中心發生的搶劫案。

exampleEn: A robin with a red breast sat on the fence singing cheerfully.
exampleZh: 一隻紅胸知更鳥坐在柵欄上愉快地唱歌。

exampleEn: Robots are increasingly used in manufacturing to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
exampleZh: 機器人越來越多地用於製造業以提高效率並降低成本。

exampleEn: The children climbed on the large rocks at the beach yesterday.
exampleZh: 孩子們昨天在海灘上爬大岩石。

exampleEn: The rocket launched successfully carrying satellites into space orbit this morning.
exampleZh: 火箭今天早上成功發射，將衛星送入太空軌道。

exampleEn: The path up the mountain was rocky and difficult to climb safely.
exampleZh: 上山的路崎嶇不平，很難安全攀登。

exampleEn: Parents play an important role in their children's education and development.
exampleZh: 父母在孩子的教育和發展中起著重要作用。

exampleEn: Roll the dough flat before cutting it into shapes for cookies.
exampleZh: 在將麵團切成餅乾形狀之前將其擀平。

exampleEn: The countryside is characterized by green rolling hills and small villages.
exampleZh: 鄉村的特點是起伏的綠色山丘和小村莊。

exampleEn: They had a whirlwind romance and got married after only three months.
exampleZh: 他們經歷了一段旋風般的浪漫，僅僅三個月後就結婚了。

exampleEn: He planned a romantic dinner for two with candles and soft music.
exampleZh: 他計畫了一頓帶蠟燭和柔和音樂的兩人浪漫晚餐。

exampleEn: The roof needs repair because it leaks when it rains heavily.
exampleZh: 屋頂需要維修，因為下大雨時會漏水。

exampleEn: There's not enough room in the car for all the luggage.
exampleZh: 車裡沒有足夠的空間放所有行李。

exampleEn: My roommate and I share the chores in our apartment equally.
exampleZh: 我和室友平分公寓裡的家務。

exampleEn: The tree's roots grow deep into the ground seeking water and nutrients.
exampleZh: 樹根深入地下尋找水和養分。

exampleEn: Tie the boat to the dock with a strong rope securely.
exampleZh: 用堅固的繩子牢牢地把船綁在碼頭上。

exampleEn: He gave her a bouquet of red roses for Valentine's Day.
exampleZh: 他在情人節給了她一束紅玫瑰。

exampleEn: The future looks rosy for the company with increasing sales and profits.
exampleZh: 隨著銷售額和利潤的增加，公司的未來透過玫瑰色。

exampleEn: The apple was rotten inside, so I had to throw it away.
exampleZh: 蘋果裡面爛了，所以我不得不把它扔掉。

exampleEn: The sea was rough with high waves during the storm yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天暴風雨期間海面波濤洶湧，浪很高。

exampleEn: The project will take roughly three months to complete from start.
exampleZh: 這個專案從開始到完成大約需要三個月。

exampleEn: The earth is round, not flat as some people once believed.
exampleZh: 地球是圓的，不是像有些人曾經相信的那樣是平的。

exampleEn: Take the second exit at the roundabout to reach the shopping center.
exampleZh: 在環島處走第二個出口到達購物中心。

exampleEn: This route is the fastest way to get to the airport.
exampleZh: 這條路線是到達機場的最快方式。

exampleEn: Following a daily routine helps maintain productivity and reduces stress effectively.
exampleZh: 遵循日常慣例有助於保持生產力並有效減輕壓力。

exampleEn: The students sat in rows during the examination this morning quietly.
exampleZh: 學生們今天早上考試時安靜地坐成一排。

exampleEn: The royal family attended the ceremony at the palace yesterday afternoon.
exampleZh: 皇室家族昨天下午在宮殿參加了儀式。

exampleEn: Members of royalty, such as kings and queens, live in palaces.
exampleZh: 皇室成員，如國王和王后，住在宮殿裡。

exampleEn: Rub your hands together to warm them up in cold weather.
exampleZh: 在寒冷的天氣裡搓手取暖。

exampleEn: The tires are made of rubber which provides good grip on roads.
exampleZh: 輪胎由橡膠製成，在道路上提供良好的抓地力。

exampleEn: Please throw the rubbish in the bin, not on the ground.
exampleZh: 請把垃圾扔進垃圾桶，不要扔在地上。

exampleEn: Rescuers searched through the rubble of the collapsed building for survivors.
exampleZh: 救援人員在倒塌建築物的瓦礫中搜尋倖存者。

exampleEn: It's rude to interrupt someone while they're speaking during meetings.
exampleZh: 在會議期間打斷別人說話是不禮貌的。

exampleEn: He was scolded for speaking rudely to his teacher in class.
exampleZh: 他因在課堂上對老師說話粗魯而受到責罵。

exampleEn: The colorful rug adds warmth and style to the living room.
exampleZh: 五顏六色的地毯為客廳增添了溫暖和風格。

exampleEn: Rugby is a popular contact sport played with an oval ball.
exampleZh: 橄欖球是一種流行的接觸性運動，用橢圓形球進行。

exampleEn: The heavy rain ruined our picnic plans for the weekend unfortunately.
exampleZh: 不幸的是，大雨毀了我們週末的野餐計畫。

exampleEn: The war had a ruinous effect on the country's economy and infrastructure.
exampleZh: 戰爭對該國的經濟和基礎設施產生了毀滅性的影響。

exampleEn: Everyone must follow the rules to ensure safety and order.
exampleZh: 每個人都必須遵守規則以確保安全和秩序。

exampleEn: Use a ruler to draw straight lines on the paper accurately.
exampleZh: 使用尺子在紙上準確地畫直線。

exampleEn: A rumor spread that the celebrity was getting a divorce soon.
exampleZh: 謠言傳開說這位名人很快就要離婚了。

exampleEn: I run five kilometers every morning to stay healthy and fit.
exampleZh: 我每天早上跑五公里以保持健康和體能。

exampleEn: The police are looking for a runaway teenager who left home yesterday.
exampleZh: 警方正在尋找一名昨天離家出走的青少年。

exampleEn: The marathon runner trained for months before the big race yesterday.
exampleZh: 這位馬拉松跑者在昨天的大賽前訓練了幾個月。

exampleEn: Running is a good form of exercise to keep your heart healthy.
exampleZh: 跑步是保持心臟健康的良好鍛鍊方式。

exampleEn: The plane taxied down the runway before taking off into the sky.
exampleZh: 飛機在跑道上滑行，然後起飛升空。

exampleEn: She grew up in a rural area surrounded by farms and fields.
exampleZh: 她在農場和田野環繞的農村地區長大。

exampleEn: Don't rush; take your time to do the job properly and carefully.
exampleZh: 不要匆忙；花時間適當仔細地完成工作。

exampleEn: Traffic is always terrible during rush hour when everyone is going home.
exampleZh: 每個人都回家時，尖峰時段的交通總是很糟糕。

exampleEn: The old bicycle was rusty after being left out in the rain.
exampleZh: 舊自行車被雨淋後生鏽了。

exampleEn: My brother's car isn't starting, so he needs a ride to work.
exampleZh: 我哥哥的車發動不了，所以他需要搭便車去上班。

exampleEn: The farmer carried a heavy sack of potatoes on his shoulder.
exampleZh: 農夫肩上扛著一袋沉重的馬鈴薯。

exampleEn: The temple is considered a sacred place by the local people there.
exampleZh: 這座寺廟被當地的當地人視為聖地。

exampleEn: It was a sad story that made everyone in the audience cry.
exampleZh: 這是一個讓觀眾中每個人都哭泣的悲傷故事。

exampleEn: Sadly, the old dog passed away in his sleep last night.
exampleZh: 令人傷心的是，這隻老狗昨晚在睡夢中去世了。

exampleEn: She felt a deep sadness when her best friend moved away.
exampleZh: 當她最好的朋友搬走時，她感到深深的悲傷。

exampleEn: They went on a safari in Africa to see lions and elephants.
exampleZh: 他們去非洲狩獵旅行，看獅子和大象。

exampleEn: Please keep your passport and money in a safe place while traveling.
exampleZh: 旅行時請將護照和錢放在安全的地方。

exampleEn: We must safeguard our personal information from identity thieves and hackers.
exampleZh: 我們必須保護我們的個人資訊免受身份竊賊和駭客的侵害。

exampleEn: Drive safely and let us know when you arrive at your destination.
exampleZh: 安全駕駛，到達目的地後告訴我們。

exampleEn: Safety comes first, so please wear your seatbelt in the car.
exampleZh: 安全第一，所以請在車內繫好安全帶。

exampleEn: The old bookshelf began to sag under the weight of the books.
exampleZh: 舊書架在書的重量下開始下垂。

exampleEn: The old man was known as a sage for his great wisdom.
exampleZh: 老人因其巨大的智慧而被稱為智者。

exampleEn: They set sail for the island early in the morning at sunrise.
exampleZh: 他們一大早在日出時啟航前往該島。

exampleEn: Sailing is a popular water sport in this coastal town in summer.
exampleZh: 帆船運動是這個沿海城鎮夏季流行的水上運動。

exampleEn: The sailor spent months at sea, away from his family and friends.
exampleZh: 水手在海上度過了幾個月，遠離家人和朋友。

exampleEn: For the sake of your health, you should stop smoking immediately.
exampleZh: 為了你的健康，你應該立即戒菸。

exampleEn: I usually have a fresh green salad for lunch to stay healthy.
exampleZh: 我通常午餐吃新鮮的蔬菜沙拉以保持健康。

exampleEn: He received a raise in his salary after his good performance review.
exampleZh: 在他的績效評估良好後，他獲得了加薪。

exampleEn: The store is having a big sale with discounts on all items.
exampleZh: 這家商店正在大減價，所有商品都有折扣。

exampleEn: The car salesman tried to convince us to buy the more expensive model.
exampleZh: 汽車推銷員試圖說服我們購買更昂貴的型號。

exampleEn: His excellent salesmanship helped him close the deal with the difficult client.
exampleZh: 他出色的推銷技巧幫助他與難纏的客戶達成了交易。

exampleEn: The salesperson was very helpful and found the right size for me.
exampleZh: 售貨員非常有幫助，為我找到了合適的尺碼。

exampleEn: The saleswoman showed me several different dresses before I chose one.
exampleZh: 在我選擇一件之前，女售貨員給我看了幾件不同的衣服。

exampleEn: Grilled salmon is a healthy and delicious meal rich in omega-3.
exampleZh: 烤鮭魚是一頓健康美味的飯菜，富含 omega-3。

exampleEn: She went to the beauty salon to get her hair cut and styled.
exampleZh: 她去美容院剪頭髮和做造型。

exampleEn: Salsa is a spicy sauce made from tomatoes, onions, and chili peppers.
exampleZh: 莎莎醬是一種由番茄、洋蔥和辣椒製成的辣醬。

exampleEn: Please pass the salt and pepper to season the soup properly.
exampleZh: 請把鹽和胡椒粉遞過來，給湯適當調味。

exampleEn: This soup is too salty; I think I added too much salt.
exampleZh: 這湯太鹹了；我想我加了太多的鹽。

exampleEn: We have the same birthday, so we often celebrate it together.
exampleZh: 我們同一天生日，所以我們經一起慶祝。

exampleEn: I tried a free sample of the new cheese at the supermarket.
exampleZh: 我在超市試吃了一份新起司的免費樣品。

exampleEn: The children played in the sand on the beach making castles.
exampleZh: 孩子們在海灘上的沙子裡玩耍，堆城堡。

exampleEn: She wore comfortable sandals for walking on the beach in summer.
exampleZh: 夏天她在海灘上散步時穿著舒適的涼鞋。

exampleEn: The ancient temple was built from red sandstone blocks carved intricately.
exampleZh: 這座古廟是用刻有錯綜複雜圖案的紅砂岩塊建造的。

exampleEn: I packed a ham and cheese sandwich for my lunch today.
exampleZh: 我今天午餐帶了一個火腿起司三明治。

exampleEn: We walked along the sandy beach, feeling the sand between toes.
exampleZh: 我們沿著沙灘散步，感覺沙子在腳趾間。

exampleEn: Hospitals must maintain high sanitary standards to prevent the spread of germs.
exampleZh: 醫院必須保持高衛生標準以防止細菌傳播。

exampleEn: Poor sanitation can lead to the spread of diseases in crowded areas.
exampleZh: 衛生條件差會導致疾病在擁擠地區傳播。

exampleEn: The satellite orbits the Earth and sends back weather information daily.
exampleZh: 衛星繞地球運行，每天發回天氣資訊。

exampleEn: He got a lot of satisfaction from completing the difficult puzzle.
exampleZh: 他從完成這個難題中獲得了很大的滿足感。

exampleEn: Her performance in the exam was satisfactory, but she can do better.
exampleZh: 她在考試中的表現令人滿意，但她可以做得更好。

exampleEn: Are you satisfied with the service you received at the restaurant?
exampleZh: 您對在餐廳受到的服務滿意嗎？

exampleEn: The meal was enough to satisfy his hunger after a long hike.
exampleZh: 在長途徒步旅行後，這頓飯足以滿足他的飢餓感。

exampleEn: We usually go grocery shopping on Saturday morning every week.
exampleZh: 這週我們通常在週六早上購買雜貨。

exampleEn: The pasta came with a delicious tomato and basil sauce on top.
exampleZh: 義大利麵上面有美味的番茄和羅勒醬。

exampleEn: Cover the saucepan with a lid and let the soup simmer gently.
exampleZh: 用蓋子蓋住平底鍋，讓湯用文火煮。

exampleEn: She placed the teacup on the saucer and served it to guest.
exampleZh: 她把茶杯放在茶碟上，端給客人。

exampleEn: I like to eat grilled sausages with mustard and bread for lunch.
exampleZh: 午餐我喜歡吃烤香腸配芥末和麵包。

exampleEn: It is important to save money for emergencies and future needs.
exampleZh: 為緊急情況和未來需求存錢很重要。

exampleEn: She spent all her savings on a round-the-world trip last year.
exampleZh: 去年她把所有的積蓄都花在了一次環球旅行上。

exampleEn: He used a saw to cut the wood into smaller pieces for fire.
exampleZh: 他用鋸子把木頭鋸成小塊生火。

exampleEn: Don't say anything that might hurt her feelings; be kind.
exampleZh: 不要說任何可能傷害她感情的話；要仁慈。

exampleEn: We need a scale to weigh the ingredients for the cake recipe.
exampleZh: 我們需要一個秤來稱量蛋糕食譜的配料。

exampleEn: The doctor ordered a CT scan to check for any internal injuries.
exampleZh: 醫生要求進行 CT 掃描以檢查是否有任何內傷。

exampleEn: The political scandal dominated the news headlines for several weeks.
exampleZh: 政治醜聞佔據了幾週的新聞頭條。

exampleEn: He has a small scar on his chin from a childhood accident.
exampleZh: 他下巴上有一個小時候事故留下的傷疤。

exampleEn: I could scarcely believe my eyes when I saw the surprise gift.
exampleZh: 看到驚喜禮物時，我簡直不敢相信自己的眼睛。

exampleEn: Don't scare the baby with that loud noise or mask.
exampleZh: 不要用那巨大的噪音或面具嚇唬嬰兒。

exampleEn: She is scared of spiders and screams whenever she sees one nearby.
exampleZh: 她害怕蜘蛛，每當看到附近有蜘蛛就會尖叫。

exampleEn: She wore a warm wool scarf around her neck in winter.
exampleZh: 冬天她在脖子上圍了一條溫暖的羊毛圍巾。

exampleEn: She wore a scarlet dress that stood out in the crowd.
exampleZh: 她穿著一件鮮紅色的連衣裙，在人群中脫穎而出。

exampleEn: The horror movie was too scary for me to watch alone at night.
exampleZh: 這部恐怖電影太嚇人了，我晚上不敢一個人看。

exampleEn: The wind caused the leaves to scatter all over the lawn.
exampleZh: 風把樹葉吹得滿草坪都是。

exampleEn: The police arrived at the scene of the crime to investigate.
exampleZh: 警察到達犯罪現場進行調查。

exampleEn: The mountain scenery was breathtakingly beautiful with snow-capped peaks.
exampleZh: 山景美得驚人，有白雪皚皚的山峰。

exampleEn: We took the scenic route home to enjoy the beautiful mountain views.
exampleZh: 我們走風景優美的路線回家，欣賞美麗的山景。

exampleEn: The scent of blooming flowers filled the garden on a warm spring day.
exampleZh: 在溫暖的春日裡，盛開的鮮花香味充滿了花園。

exampleEn: Please check your schedule to see if you are free for a meeting tomorrow.
exampleZh: 請檢查您的日程安排，看看明天是否有空開會。

exampleEn: The flight is scheduled to depart at 10 AM, so don't be late.
exampleZh: 航班定於上午 10 點起飛，所以不要遲到。

exampleEn: The government launched a new scheme to help young people find jobs.
exampleZh: 政府推出了一項新計畫，幫助年輕人找到工作。

exampleEn: He is a distinguished scholar who has written many books on history.
exampleZh: 他是一位傑出的學者，寫了許多關於歷史的書。

exampleEn: She won a full scholarship to attend the prestigious university next year.
exampleZh: 她獲得了全額獎學金，明年將就讀這所著名的與大學。

exampleEn: Scholasticism was a dominant philosophical system in medieval European universities.
exampleZh: 經院哲學是中世紀歐洲大學的主導哲學體系。

exampleEn: Children go to school to learn reading, writing, and mathematics everyday.
exampleZh: 孩子們每天去學校學習閱讀、寫作和數學。

exampleEn: Every schoolchild should have access to books and educational resources.
exampleZh: 每個學童都應該有機會獲得書籍和教育資源。

exampleEn: The schoolgirl carried a heavy backpack filled with textbooks and notebooks.
exampleZh: 女學生背著一個裝滿教科書和筆記本的沉重背包。

exampleEn: I met an old schoolmate at the reunion, and we talked for hours.
exampleZh: 我在同學聚會上遇到了一位老同學，我們聊了幾個小時。

exampleEn: My aunt is a schoolteacher who loves inspiring her students to learn.
exampleZh: 我的阿姨是一位熱愛激勵學生學習的學校老師。

exampleEn: He has a lot of schoolwork to do this weekend, including an essay.
exampleZh: 他這個週末有很多功課要做，包括一篇論文。

exampleEn: Science helps us understand the natural world through observation and experiment.
exampleZh: 科學幫助我們通過觀察和實驗了解自然世界。

exampleEn: I love reading science fiction novels about space travel and aliens.
exampleZh: 我喜歡閱讀關於太空旅行和外星人的科幻小說。

exampleEn: Scientific research has led to many medical breakthroughs that save lives.
exampleZh: 科學研究導致了許拯救生命的醫學突破。

exampleEn: The theory has been scientifically proven through rigorous testing and analysis.
exampleZh: 該理論已通過嚴格的測試和分析得到科學證明。

exampleEn: The scientist conducted experiments in the lab to test his hypothesis.
exampleZh: 科學家在實驗室進行實驗以驗證他的假設。

exampleEn: Please use the scissors carefully to cut the paper along the line.
exampleZh: 請小心使用剪刀沿著線剪紙。

exampleEn: The mother had to scold her son for drawing on the walls.
exampleZh: 母親不得不責罵她的兒子在牆上畫畫。

exampleEn: He rides his electric scooter to work every day to avoid traffic.
exampleZh: 為了避開交通，他每天騎電動滑板車上班。

exampleEn: The scope of the project is larger than we initially anticipated.
exampleZh: 該專案的範圍比我們最初預期的要大。

exampleEn: What was the final score of the football match yesterday evening?
exampleZh: 昨天晚上的足球比賽最終比分是多少？

exampleEn: We had to scramble up the steep hill to reach the top quickly.
exampleZh: 我們不得不爬上陡峭的山坡才能快速到達頂峰。

exampleEn: The cat left a scratch on the sofa with its sharp claws.
exampleZh: 貓用鋒利的爪子在沙發上留下了抓痕。

exampleEn: She let out a loud scream when she saw the scary spider.
exampleZh: 當她看到可怕的蜘蛛時，發出了一聲尖叫。

exampleEn: The computer screen is too bright, so I need to lower the brightness.
exampleZh: 電腦螢幕太亮了，所以我需要降低亮度。

exampleEn: You need a screwdriver to tighten the loose screw on the chair.
exampleZh: 你需要一把螺絲刀來擰緊椅子上鬆動的螺絲。

exampleEn: Please don't scribble on the important documents; use a separate paper.
exampleZh: 請不要在重要文件上亂塗亂畫；使用單獨的紙。

exampleEn: The actors read through the script before starting the rehearsal today.
exampleZh: 演員們在今天開始排練之前通讀了劇本。

exampleEn: Don't be such a scrooge; donate some money to the charity.
exampleZh: 別這麼吝嗇；捐點錢給慈善機構。

exampleEn: We went scuba diving in the ocean to see the coral reefs.
exampleZh: 我們去海洋水肺潛水看珊瑚礁。

exampleEn: The museum has a beautiful collection of marble sculptures from Greece.
exampleZh: 博物館收藏了來自希臘的美麗大理石雕塑。

exampleEn: The farmer used a scythe to cut the tall grass in field.
exampleZh: 農夫用鐮刀割田裡的高草。

exampleEn: The sea was calm and blue on the sunny summer day.
exampleZh: 在陽光明媚的夏日，大海平靜而湛藍。

exampleEn: We ate fresh seafood at a restaurant by the harbor last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚我們在港口邊的一家餐廳吃了新鮮的海鮮。

exampleEn: The seal clapped its flippers and barked for a fish treat.
exampleZh: 海豹拍打著腳蹼，叫著要魚吃。

exampleEn: The police continued their search for the missing child in forest.
exampleZh: 警方繼續在森林中尋找失蹤的孩子。

exampleEn: We rented a cottage at the seaside for our summer vacation.
exampleZh: 我們在海邊租了一間小屋過暑假。

exampleEn: Spring is my favorite season because of the blooming flowers and warmth.
exampleZh: 春天是我最喜歡的季節，因為花朵盛開和溫暖。

exampleEn: Many animals migrate or hibernate in response to seasonal changes in weather.
exampleZh: 許多動物遷徙或冬眠以應對季節性的天氣變化。

exampleEn: Please take a seat and wait for the doctor to call you.
exampleZh: 請坐下，等待醫生叫你。

exampleEn: Seawater is salty and cannot be drunk directly for hydration purposes.
exampleZh: 海水是鹹的，不能直接飲用來補水。

exampleEn: Seaweed is often used in Japanese cuisine, especially in sushi rolls.
exampleZh: 海藻經常用於日本料理，尤其是壽司卷。

exampleEn: Wait a second; I need to find my keys before we leave.
exampleZh: 等一下；我們離開前我需要找到我的鑰匙。

exampleEn: In grammar, 'you' is the second person pronoun used for address.
exampleZh: 在語法中，'you' 是用於稱呼的第二人稱代詞。

exampleEn: His opinion is of secondary importance; the facts matter most here.
exampleZh: 他的意見是次要的；事實才是最重要的。

exampleEn: After primary school, students move on to secondary school for education.
exampleZh: 小學畢業後，學生升入中學接受教育。

exampleEn: I bought a second-hand car because it was much cheaper than new.
exampleZh: 我買了一輛二手車，因為它比新車便宜得多。

exampleEn: First, we need to plan. Secondly, we need to execute effectively.
exampleZh: 首先，我們需要計畫。其次，我們需要有效執行。

exampleEn: Can you keep a secret? I haven't told anyone else about this.
exampleZh: 你能保守秘密嗎？我沒有告訴其他人這件事。

exampleEn: The secretary answered the phone and scheduled appointments for the boss.
exampleZh: 秘書接聽電話並為老闆安排預約。

exampleEn: They met secretly to discuss the surprise party plans for her.
exampleZh: 他們秘密會面討論為她舉辦的驚喜派對計畫。

exampleEn: Please read the first section of the chapter before the next class.
exampleZh: 請在下節課前閱讀本章的第一節。

exampleEn: The technology sector is growing rapidly and providing many new jobs.
exampleZh: 科技行業發展迅速，提供了許多新的就業機會。

exampleEn: Make sure the door is secure before you leave the house tonight.
exampleZh: 今晚離開家之前，請確保門已鎖好。

exampleEn: Airport security checks are necessary to ensure the safety of all passengers.
exampleZh: 為了確保所有乘客的安全，機場安檢是必要的。

exampleEn: I can see the mountains in the distance from my bedroom window.
exampleZh: 我可以從我的臥室窗戶看到遠處的山脈。

exampleEn: Plant the seed in the soil and water it regularly to grow.
exampleZh: 將種子種在土壤中並定期澆水以生長。

exampleEn: They decided to seek legal advice before signing the important contract.
exampleZh: 他們決定在簽署重要合約之前尋求法律建議。

exampleEn: You seem tired; maybe you should go to bed early tonight.
exampleZh: 你看起來很累；也許你今晚應該早點睡覺。

exampleEn: The children played on the seesaw in the park, going up down.
exampleZh: 孩子們在公園的蹺蹺板上玩耍，忽上忽下。

exampleEn: The market is divided into different segments based on consumer age groups.
exampleZh: 市場根據消費者年齡組劃分為不同的部分。

exampleEn: He decided to seize the opportunity to travel the world while young.
exampleZh: 他決定抓住機會趁年輕周遊世界。

exampleEn: She seldom goes out at night because she prefers to stay home.
exampleZh: 她很少在晚上出去，因為她更喜歡待在家裡。

exampleEn: Please select the best option from the list provided on screen.
exampleZh: 請從螢幕上提供的列表中選擇最佳選項。

exampleEn: The store offers a wide selection of shoes in different styles.
exampleZh: 這家商店提供多種不同款式的鞋子。

exampleEn: It is important to have a strong sense of self and identity.
exampleZh: 擁有強烈的自我意識和認同感很重要。

exampleEn: Gaining experience in public speaking will help improve your self-confidence greatly.
exampleZh: 獲得公開演講的經驗將大大有助於提高你的自信心。

exampleEn: She is a self-confident woman who knows what she wants in life.
exampleZh: 她是一個自信的女人，知道自己在生活中想要什麼。

exampleEn: It is selfish to only think about yourself and ignore others' needs.
exampleZh: 只考慮自己而忽視他人的需求是自私的。

exampleEn: Her selfless dedication to helping the poor is truly inspiring to all.
exampleZh: 她無私地致力於幫助窮人，這確實激勵了所有人。

exampleEn: This is a self-service restaurant, so please clear your own table.
exampleZh: 這是一家自助餐廳，所以請自己清理桌子。

exampleEn: They decided to sell their house and move to a smaller apartment.
exampleZh: 他們決定賣掉房子，搬到更小的公寓。

exampleEn: The seller agreed to lower the price after some negotiation with buyer.
exampleZh: 與買家協商後，賣家同意降價。

exampleEn: The fal semester begins in September and ends in December usually.
exampleZh: 秋季學期通常在九月開始，十二月結束。

exampleEn: Use a semicolon to connect two independent clauses that are closely related.
exampleZh: 使用分號連接兩個密切相關的獨立分句。

exampleEn: The team won the semi-final and advanced to the championship game.
exampleZh: 球隊贏得了半決賽並晉級冠軍賽。

exampleEn: I attended a seminar on digital marketing strategies for small businesses.
exampleZh: 我參加了一個關於小企業數位行銷策略的研討會。

exampleEn: The senator voted in favor of the new healthcare bill in Congress.
exampleZh: 參議員在國會投票贊成新的醫療保健法案。

exampleEn: Please send me an email with the details of the meeting.
exampleZh: 請給我發一封電子郵件，其中包含會議的詳細資訊。

exampleEn: She is a senior executive at the company with many years experience.
exampleZh: 她是公司的高級主管，擁有多年的經驗。

exampleEn: I felt a strange sensation in my arm after the injection.
exampleZh: 注射後，我覺得手臂上有種奇怪的感覺。

exampleEn: Dogs have a very keen sense of smell compared to humans.
exampleZh: 與人類相比，狗的嗅覺非常敏銳。

exampleEn: It is sensible to bring a jacket in case it gets cold.
exampleZh: 帶件夾克以防變冷是明智的。

exampleEn: She is very sensitive to criticism and gets upset easily by it.
exampleZh: 她對批評非常敏感，很容易因此而生氣。

exampleEn: Please write a complete sentence with a subject and a verb.
exampleZh: 請寫一個包含主語和動詞的完整句子。

exampleEn: They decided to separate for a while to work on their relationship.
exampleZh: 他們決定分開一段時間來處理他們的關係。

exampleEn: Please wrap the gifts separately so we know which is which.
exampleZh: 請分別包裝禮物，這樣我們就知道哪個是哪個。

exampleEn: The separation of powers is a key principle of democratic government.
exampleZh: 權力分立是民主政府的一個關鍵原則。

exampleEn: School starts in September after the long summer vacation ends finally.
exampleZh: 漫長的暑假終於結束後，學校於九月開學。

exampleEn: The numbers must be arranged in the correct sequence to unlock safe.
exampleZh: 必須按正確的順序排列數字才能解鎖保險箱。

exampleEn: The lake looked serene in the early morning light, perfectly still.
exampleZh: 在清晨的光線下，湖面看起來很寧靜，完全靜止。

exampleEn: The serial number on the device helps identify its manufacturing date.
exampleZh: 設備上的序列號有助於識別其製造日期。

exampleEn: I am watching a new TV series about a detective solving crimes.
exampleZh: 我正在看一部關於偵探破案的新電視劇。

exampleEn: He suffered a serious injury and had to be taken to hospital.
exampleZh: 他受了重傷，不得不被送往醫院。

exampleEn: You should take your health seriously and exercise regularly and eat well.
exampleZh: 你應該認真對待你的健康，定期運動並吃得好。

exampleEn: The loyal servant worked for the royal family for many years faithfully.
exampleZh: 忠誠的僕人為皇室忠實地工作了多年。

exampleEn: This restaurant serves delicious Italian food at reasonable prices for lunch.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳午餐以合理的價格供應美味的義大利食物。

exampleEn: The server brought our food to the table with a smile.
exampleZh: 服務員微笑著把我們的食物端上桌。

exampleEn: The customer service at this store is excellent and very helpful.
exampleZh: 這家商店的客戶服務非常好，很有幫助。

exampleEn: The training session will last for two hours this afternoon.
exampleZh: 培訓課程將在今天下午持續兩個小時。

exampleEn: She bought a new set of dishes for her kitchen yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天她為廚房買了一套新餐具。

exampleEn: The project suffered a minor setback, but we are back on track.
exampleZh: 該專案遭受了輕微的挫折，但我們已重回正軌。

exampleEn: The novel has a beautiful setting in a small French village.
exampleZh: 這部小說背景設定在一個美麗的法國小村莊。

exampleEn: They decided to settle the dispute out of court to save money.
exampleZh: 他們決定在庭外和解以省錢。

exampleEn: The early settlers built a small settlement near the river bank.
exampleZh: 早期的定居者在河岸附近建立了一個小定居點。

exampleEn: The settler cleared the land to build a farm for his family.
exampleZh: 定居者開墾土地為他的家人建造農場。

exampleEn: There are seven days in a week: Monday through Sunday.
exampleZh: 一週有七天：週一到週日。

exampleEn: She passed her driving test when she was seventeen years old.
exampleZh: 她在十七歲時通過了駕照考試。

exampleEn: My grandfather celebrated his seventy birthday with a big family party.
exampleZh: 我祖父舉辦了一個大型家庭派對慶祝他的七十歲生日。

exampleEn: I have visited that museum several times and always find something new.
exampleZh: 我去過那個博物館好幾次，總能發現新東西。

exampleEn: The storm caused severe damage to the roof of the house.
exampleZh: 暴風雨嚴重損壞了房子的屋頂。

exampleEn: He was severely reprimanded for his rude behavior towards the customers.
exampleZh: 他因對顧客的粗魯行為而受到嚴厲斥責。

exampleEn: She learned to sew her own clothes using a sewing machine.
exampleZh: 她學會了用縫紉機縫製自己的衣服。

exampleEn: The form asks for your name, age, and sex.
exampleZh: 表格要求填寫您的姓名、年齡和性別。

exampleEn: We must fight against sexism and ensure equal opportunities for everyone.
exampleZh: 我們必須反對性別歧視，確保每個人都有平等的機會。

exampleEn: Sexual harassment is strictly prohibited in the workplace and by law.
exampleZh: 工作場所和法律嚴禁性騷擾。

exampleEn: She wore a sexy red dress to the party and turned heads.
exampleZh: 她穿著一件性感的紅色連衣裙參加派對，引人注目。

exampleEn: The old house looked shabby and was in need of repair.
exampleZh: 老房子看起來很破舊，需要維修。

exampleEn: We sat in the shade of the tree to escape the sun.
exampleZh: 我們坐在樹蔭下躲避太陽。

exampleEn: The tree cast a long shadow on the grass in afternoon.
exampleZh: 下午樹在草地上投下了長長的影子。

exampleEn: A shadowy figure emerged from the dark alley, frightening us all.
exampleZh: 一個模糊的身影從黑暗的小巷裡出現，嚇壞了我們所有人。

exampleEn: Please shake the bottle well before drinking the juice inside.
exampleZh: 飲用裡面的果汁之前，請充分搖晃瓶子。

exampleEn: She was visibly shaken after witnessing the terrible car accident closely.
exampleZh: 近距離目睹可怕的車禍後，她明顯動搖了。

exampleEn: He specializes in Shakespearean literature and teaches it at the university.
exampleZh: 他專攻莎士比亞文學，並在大學任教。

exampleEn: His handwriting was shaky because he was nervous during the test.
exampleZh: 他的字跡顫抖，因為他在考試時很緊張。

exampleEn: Shall we go for a walk in the park this afternoon?
exampleZh: 我們今天下午去公園散步好嗎？

exampleEn: The water in the kids' pool is shallow and safe for toddlers.
exampleZh: 兒童游泳池的水很淺，對幼兒來說很安全。

exampleEn: It is a shame that you can't come to the party tonight.
exampleZh: 真遺憾你今晚不能來參加排隊。

exampleEn: His shameful behavior brought disgrace to his family and community.
exampleZh: 他可恥的行為給他的家庭和社區帶來了恥辱。

exampleEn: I need to buy some new shampoo for my hair today.
exampleZh: 我今天需要給我的頭髮買些新洗髮精。

exampleEn: Keep yourself in good shape by exercising regularly and eating healthy.
exampleZh: 通過定期運動和健康飲食保持良好的體形。

exampleEn: Please share your toys with your brother and play nicely together.
exampleZh: 請和你弟弟分享你的玩具，一起愉快地玩耍。

exampleEn: Be careful with that knife; it is very sharp and dangerous.
exampleZh: 小心那把刀；它非常鋒利和危險。

exampleEn: The road turns sharply to the left, so drive carefully there.
exampleZh: 道路向左急轉彎，所以在那裡要小心駕駛。

exampleEn: The glass fell to the floor and shattered into a thousand pieces.
exampleZh: 玻璃杯掉在地上，碎成一千塊。

exampleEn: He needs to shave his beard before the job interview tomorrow.
exampleZh: 明天面試前他需要刮鬍子。

exampleEn: She is my best friend and we do everything together always.
exampleZh: 她是我最好的朋友，我們總是一起做每件事。

exampleEn: We store the garden tools in the shed in the backyard.
exampleZh: 我們把園藝工具存放在後院的棚子裡。

exampleEn: The farmer shears the sheep once a year to get wool.
exampleZh: 農夫每年剪一次羊毛。

exampleEn: It was sheer luck that we found the lost keys so quickly.
exampleZh: 我們這麼快就找到了丟失的鑰匙純粹是運氣。

exampleEn: Please put a clean sheet on the bed for the guest.
exampleZh: 請為客人換張乾淨的床單。

exampleEn: The books are arranged alphabetically on the shelf for easy access.
exampleZh: 書籍按字母順序排列在架子上，便於取閱。

exampleEn: We collected beautiful seashells on the beach during our vacation.
exampleZh: 我們在度假期間在海灘上收集了美麗的貝殼。

exampleEn: We took shelter under a tree when it started to rain.
exampleZh: 開始下雨時，我們在樹下避雨。

exampleEn: The sheriff is responsible for law enforcement in the county area.
exampleZh: 警長負責縣區的執法。

exampleEn: The knight used his shield to protect himself from the sword.
exampleZh: 騎士用盾牌保護自己免受劍的傷害。

exampleEn: He works the night shift at the factory, so he sleeps days.
exampleZh: 他在工廠上夜班，所以白天睡覺。

exampleEn: The sun began to shine brightly after the storm passed away.
exampleZh: 暴風雨過後，太陽開始明亮地照耀。

exampleEn: She polished her shoes until they were shiny and looked new.
exampleZh: 她擦亮鞋子，直到它們閃閃發光，看起來很新。

exampleEn: The cargo ship carries goods across the ocean to other countries.
exampleZh: 貨船將貨物運過海洋到其他國家。

exampleEn: Free shipping is available for orders over fifty dollars on website.
exampleZh: 網站上超過五十美元的訂單可免運費。

exampleEn: Divers explored the shipwreck looking for treasure and historical artifacts.
exampleZh: 潛水員探索沉船尋找寶藏和歷史文物。

exampleEn: He wore a clean white shirt and a tie to work.
exampleZh: 他穿著潔白的襯衫打著領帶去上班。

exampleEn: She began to shiver in the cold winter wind without coat.
exampleZh: 在寒冷的冬風中，她沒有穿外套開始發抖。

exampleEn: The news of his death came as a great shock to everyone.
exampleZh: 他的死訊對每個人來說都是巨大的震驚。

exampleEn: We were shocked to hear about the sudden closure of company.
exampleZh: 聽到公司突然倒閉的消息，我們感到震驚。

exampleEn: The shocking truth was finally revealed after many years of secrecy.
exampleZh: 經過多年的保密，令人震驚的真相終於被揭露了。

exampleEn: She bought a new pair of running shoes for the marathon.
exampleZh: 她為馬拉松買了一雙新的跑鞋。

exampleEn: Don't shoot unless you are in danger and need to protect yourself.
exampleZh: 除非你有危險並需要保護自己，否則不要開槍。

exampleEn: Shooting stars are actually meteors burning up in the Earth's atmosphere.
exampleZh: 流星實際上是在地球大氣層中燃燒的隕石。

exampleEn: I need to go to the shop to buy some milk.
exampleZh: 我需要去商店買些牛奶。

exampleEn: The shop assistant helped me find the right size of jeans.
exampleZh: 店員幫我找到了合適尺碼的牛仔褲。

exampleEn: The friendly shopkeeper knows all his customers by name in town.
exampleZh: 這位友好的店主知道鎮上所有顧客的名字。

exampleEn: It is illegal to shoplift items from a store without paying.
exampleZh: 不付錢就從商店偷東西是非法的。

exampleEn: The security guard caught the shoplifter trying to steal a watch.
exampleZh: 保全抓住了試圖偷手錶的扒手。

exampleEn: Shoplifting is a crime that can lead to fines or jail.
exampleZh: 入店行竊是一種可能導致罰款或監禁的犯罪行為。

exampleEn: The savvy shopper compares prices online before making a purchase decision.
exampleZh: 精明的購物者在做出購買決定之前會在網上比較價格。

exampleEn: We went shopping at the mall and bought lots of clothes.
exampleZh: 我們去商場購物，買了很多衣服。

exampleEn: Waves crashed against the rocky shore of the island all day.
exampleZh: 整天海浪拍打著島上的岩石海岸。

exampleEn: Life is too short to worry about small things that don't matter.
exampleZh: 人生苦短，不必擔心無關緊要的小事。

exampleEn: He wore shorts and a t-shirt to the beach on Sunday.
exampleZh: 週日他穿著短褲和 T 恤去海灘。

exampleEn: There is a shortage of skilled workers in the construction industry.
exampleZh: 建築業缺乏熟練工人。

exampleEn: The train will arrive shortly, so please wait on the platform.
exampleZh: 火車即將到達，請在月台上等候。

exampleEn: Shortness of breath can be a symptom of heart or lung problems.
exampleZh: 呼吸急促可能是心臟或肺部問題的症狀。

exampleEn: Our short-term goal is to finish this project by next week.
exampleZh: 我們的短期目標是在下週之前完成這個專案。

exampleEn: He took a shot at the goal but missed by inches.
exampleZh: 他射門了，但差了幾英寸。

exampleEn: You should see a doctor if your cough doesn't get better.
exampleZh: 如果你的咳嗽沒有好轉，你應該去看醫生。

exampleEn: He carried his daughter on his shoulder so she could see.
exampleZh: 他把女兒扛在肩上，這樣她就能看見了。

exampleEn: Don't shout at me; I can hear you perfectly fine.
exampleZh: 別對我大喊大叫；我聽得很清楚。

exampleEn: Can you show me how to use this new coffee machine?
exampleZh: 你能教我怎麼用這台新咖啡機嗎？

exampleEn: He dreams of a career in showbiz, acting in movies and TV.
exampleZh: 他夢想在演藝圈工作，在電影和電視中表演。

exampleEn: The exhibition is designed to showcase the work of local artists.
exampleZh: 該展覽旨在展示當地藝術家的作品。

exampleEn: I take a hot shower every morning to wake myself up.
exampleZh: 我每天早上洗個熱水澡讓自己清醒。

exampleEn: We ordered fried shrimp as an appetizer for our seafood dinner.
exampleZh: 我們點了炸蝦作為海鮮晚餐的開胃菜。

exampleEn: Wool sweaters can shrink if you wash them in hot water.
exampleZh: 如果你用熱水洗羊毛衫，它們會縮水。

exampleEn: He gave a shrug of his shoulders to show he didn't know.
exampleZh: 他聳聳肩表示他不知道。

exampleEn: Please shut the door quietly so you don't wake the baby.
exampleZh: 請輕輕關上門，以免吵醒寶寶。

exampleEn: The shy child hid behind her mother when strangers talked specifically.
exampleZh: 當陌生人特別說話時，害羞的孩子躲在她母親身後。

exampleEn: I stayed home from work today because I felt sick and feverish.
exampleZh: 我今天沒去上班，因為我覺得不舒服和發燒。

exampleEn: Morning sickness is common in the early stages of pregnancy for women.
exampleZh: 孕吐在女性懷孕早期很常見。

exampleEn: Please write your name on the other side of the paper.
exampleZh: 請在紙的另一面寫上你的名字。

exampleEn: Pedestrians should always walk on the sidewalk for their own safety.
exampleZh: 為了自身安全，行人應始終走在人行道上。

exampleEn: She let out a long sigh of relief when it finished.
exampleZh: 結束時，她長長地鬆了一口氣。

exampleEn: The Grand Canyon is a spectacular sight to see in person.
exampleZh: 大峽谷是一個值得親眼目睹的壯觀景象。

exampleEn: We went sightseeing in London and saw Big Ben and the Palace.
exampleZh: 我們在倫敦觀光，看到了大本鐘和皇宮。

exampleEn: Please sign your name at the bottom of the contract document.
exampleZh: 請在合約文件底部簽名。

exampleEn: The red traffic light is a signal for cars to stop.
exampleZh: 紅綠燈是汽車停車的信號。

exampleEn: Please put your signature on the dotted line to confirm the agreement.
exampleZh: 請在虛線上簽名以確認協議。

exampleEn: The significance of the discovery was not fully understood at first.
exampleZh: 這一發現的重要意義起初並未被完全理解。

exampleEn: There has been a significant increase in sales over the last quarter.
exampleZh: 上一季度的銷售額有了顯著增長。

exampleEn: The new policy will significantly reduce the amount of waste produced.
exampleZh: 新政策將顯著減少產生的廢物量。

exampleEn: A red light usually signifies danger or a warning to stop immediately.
exampleZh: 紅燈通常表示危險或立即停止的警告。

exampleEn: Follow the signpost to find the way to the nearest town.
exampleZh: 跟隨路標找到去最近城鎮的路。

exampleEn: The silence in the library was broken by a loud cough suddenly.
exampleZh: 圖書館的寂靜突然被一聲大聲的咳嗽打破了。

exampleEn: He remained silent throughout the meeting and didn't say a single word.
exampleZh: 他在整個會議期間保持沉默，一句話也沒說。

exampleEn: She wept silently in the corner, trying not to disturb anyone else.
exampleZh: 她在角落裡默默地哭泣，試圖不打擾其他人。

exampleEn: She wore a beautiful dress made of soft and smooth silk fabric.
exampleZh: 她穿著一件由柔軟光滑的絲綢面料製成的漂亮連衣裙。

exampleEn: Don't be silly; there are no monsters hiding under your bed.
exampleZh: 別傻了；你的床底下沒有藏著怪物。

exampleEn: He won a silver medal in the swimming competition at the Olympics.
exampleZh: 他在奧運會游泳比賽中獲得了銀牌。

exampleEn: Please set the table with the special silverware for the dinner party.
exampleZh: 請為晚宴擺好專用的銀器。

exampleEn: The two sisters look very similar, but their personalities are quite different.
exampleZh: 這兩姐妹看起來很像，但性格卻大不相同。

exampleEn: There is a striking similarity between the two paintings in terms of style.
exampleZh: 這兩幅畫在風格上有驚人的相似之處。

exampleEn: Similarly, we must consider the environmental impact of our decisions carefully.
exampleZh: 同樣，我們必須仔細考慮我們的決定對環境的影響。

exampleEn: The instructions were simple and easy to follow for everyone involved.
exampleZh: 說明很簡單，參與的每個人都容易遵循。

exampleEn: The simplification of the tax code will make it easier to file taxes.
exampleZh: 稅法的簡化將使報稅變得更加容易。

exampleEn: We need to simplify the process to make it more efficient and faster.
exampleZh: 我們需要簡化流程以使其更有效率和更快。

exampleEn: I simply cannot understand why he would do such a foolish thing.
exampleZh: 我簡直無法理解他為什麼會做這種蠢事。

exampleEn: The simultaneous release of the movie worldwide caused a sensation among fans.
exampleZh: 這部電影在全球同步上映在粉絲中引起了轟動。

exampleEn: The two explosions happened simultaneously, shocking everyone in the city.
exampleZh: 兩起爆炸同時發生，震驚了城裡的每個人。

exampleEn: I haven't seen him since we graduated from high school ten years ago.
exampleZh: 自從我們十年前高中畢業以來，我就沒見過他。

exampleEn: Please accept my sincere apologies for the mistake I made yesterday.
exampleZh: 請接受我對昨天犯下的錯誤的真誠道歉。

exampleEn: I could hear the sincerity in his voice when he said he was sorry.
exampleZh: 當他說對不起時，我能聽出他聲音中的誠意。

exampleEn: She loves to sing in the shower every morning to start her day.
exampleZh: 她喜歡每天早上在淋浴時唱歌來開始她的一天。

exampleEn: The famous singer performed her greatest hits at the sold-out concert.
exampleZh: 這位著名歌手在座無虛席的音樂會上演唱了她最熱門的歌曲。

exampleEn: I could hear the birds singing happily in the trees outside my window.
exampleZh: 我能聽到窗外樹上的鳥兒快樂地歌唱。

exampleEn: He is single and looking for a partner to share his life with.
exampleZh: 他單身，正在尋找一個伴侶分享他的生活。

exampleEn: The word 'child' is singular, while 'children' is the plural form.
exampleZh: 單詞 'child' 是單數，而 'children' 是複數形式。

exampleEn: Please put the dirty dishes in the sink after you finish eating.
exampleZh: 吃完飯後請把髒碗盤放在水槽裡。

exampleEn: Excuse me, sir, could you please tell me the time?
exampleZh: 打擾一下，先生，請問現在幾點了？

exampleEn: My older sister helps me with my homework when I get stuck.
exampleZh: 當我遇到困難時，我姐姐會幫我做作業。

exampleEn: My brother's wife is my sister-in-law, and she is very kind.
exampleZh: 我哥哥的妻子是我的嫂子，她很善良。

exampleEn: Please sit down and make yourself comfortable while you wait.
exampleZh: 請坐下來，在等待時讓自己舒適一點。

exampleEn: The construction site is fenced off to prevent unauthorized access for safety.
exampleZh: 為了安全起見，建築工地被圍起來以防止未經授權的進入。

exampleEn: We gathered in the sitting room to watch the movie together comfortably.
exampleZh: 我們聚集在客廳舒適地一起看電影。

exampleEn: The political situation in the country is very unstable at the moment.
exampleZh: 該國目前的政治局勢非常不穩定。

exampleEn: My daughter is six years old and just started primary school.
exampleZh: 我女兒六歲，剛開始上小學。

exampleEn: In many countries, you can legally drive a car at sixteen years old.
exampleZh: 在許多國家，你可以在十六歲時合法開車。

exampleEn: There are sixty seconds in one minute and sixty minutes in an hour.
exampleZh: 一分鐘有六十秒，一小時有六十分鐘。

exampleEn: What size shoes do you wear so I can check the stock?
exampleZh: 你穿多大號的鞋，以便我檢查庫存？

exampleEn: She loves to skate on the frozen lake in the winter time.
exampleZh: 她喜歡冬天在結冰的湖面上滑冰。

exampleEn: He rode his skateboard to the park to meet his friends.
exampleZh: 他騎著滑板去公園見他的朋友。

exampleEn: The skateboarder performed impressive tricks on the ramp at the skate park.
exampleZh: 滑板運動員在滑板公園的坡道上表演了令人印象深刻的特技。

exampleEn: Skateboarding is a popular hobby among teenagers in the city streets.
exampleZh: 滑板是城市街道上青少年的一種流行愛好。

exampleEn: We went ice skating yesterday and had a lot of fun together.
exampleZh: 昨天我們去滑冰了，玩得很開心。

exampleEn: The skeleton provides the structural framework for the human body effectively.
exampleZh: 骨架有效地為人體提供了結構框架。

exampleEn: The artist made a quick sketch of the landscape before painting it.
exampleZh: 藝術家在繪畫之前快速畫了一張風景素描。

exampleEn: They go to the mountains every winter to ski and snowboard.
exampleZh: 他們每年冬天都去山裡滑雪和滑雪板。

exampleEn: Skiing is an exciting winter sport that requires balance and skill.
exampleZh: 滑雪是一項需要平衡和技巧的刺激冬季運動。

exampleEn: Cooking is a useful skill that everyone should learn at some point.
exampleZh: 烹飪是一項每個人都應該在某個時候學習的有用技能。

exampleEn: She is a skilled carpenter who can build beautiful furniture by hand.
exampleZh: 她是一位熟練的木匠，可以手工製作漂亮的傢俱。

exampleEn: The skillful surgeon performed the delicate operation with great precision and care.
exampleZh: 熟練的外科醫生非常精確和小心地進行了精細的手術。

exampleEn: He skillfully maneuvered the car through the heavy traffic to arrive on time.
exampleZh: 他熟練地操縱汽車穿過繁忙的交通準時到達。

exampleEn: I usually skim the headlines of the newspaper to get the news quickly.
exampleZh: 我通常瀏覽報紙的標題以快速獲取新聞。

exampleEn: Too much sun exposure can damage your skin and cause sunburn.
exampleZh: 過多的陽光照射會損害你的皮膚並導致曬傷。

exampleEn: Don't skip breakfast; it is the most important meal of the day.
exampleZh: 不要不吃早餐；這是一天中最重要的一餐。

exampleEn: She wore a long flowery skirt to the summer garden party.
exampleZh: 她穿了一條長長的碎花裙去參加夏季花園派對。

exampleEn: The sky was a clear blue with fluffy white clouds floating by.
exampleZh: 天空是清澈的藍色，飄著蓬鬆的白雲。

exampleEn: The skylark sang its beautiful song as it flew high in the sky.
exampleZh: 雲雀在高空飛翔時唱著優美的歌。

exampleEn: The skyscraper is the tallest building in the city, dominating the skyline.
exampleZh: 這座摩天大樓是城市中最高的建築，主宰著天際線。

exampleEn: Everyone looked skyward as the fireworks exploded in a burst of color.
exampleZh: 當煙花在色彩爆發中爆炸時，每個人都仰望天空。

exampleEn: Don't slam the door when you leave; close it gently please.
exampleZh: 離開時不要用力關門；請輕輕關上。

exampleEn: Teenagers often use slang words that their parents don't understand well.
exampleZh: 青少年經常使用父母不太理解的俚語。

exampleEn: She gave him a slap on the face for being so rude.
exampleZh: 因為他如此粗魯，她給了他一記耳光。

exampleEn: The company decided to slash prices to clear the old inventory quickly.
exampleZh: 公司決定大幅降價以快速清理舊庫存。

exampleEn: The senseless slaughter of innocent animals must be stopped immediately.
exampleZh: 必須立即停止對無辜動物的無謂屠殺。

exampleEn: He worked like a slave to finish the project on time.
exampleZh: 他像奴隸一樣工作以按時完成專案。

exampleEn: Slavery was abolished in the United States in the nineteenth century.
exampleZh: 美國在十九世紀廢除了奴隸制。

exampleEn: I need to get at least eight hours of sleep every night.
exampleZh: 我每晚至少需要八小時的睡眠。

exampleEn: He spent a sleepless night worrying about the upcoming exam results.
exampleZh: 他度過了一個不眠之夜，擔心即將到來的考試結果。

exampleEn: I feel very sleepy after eating such a large lunch today.
exampleZh: 今天吃了這麼豐盛的午餐後，我覺得很睏。

exampleEn: He rolled up his sleeves and got ready to do the hard work.
exampleZh: 他捲起袖子準備做艱苦的工作。

exampleEn: Would you like a slice of cake with your coffee or tea?
exampleZh: 你想喝咖啡或茶時來一塊蛋糕嗎？

exampleEn: The children love to go down the slide in the playground repeatedly.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在操場上一遍又一遍地滑滑梯。

exampleEn: There is a slight chance of rain later, but it should be fine.
exampleZh: 稍後有輕微降雨的機會，但應該沒事。

exampleEn: She felt slightly better after taking the medicine and resting for a while.
exampleZh: 服藥並休息了一會兒後，她感覺稍微好了一點。

exampleEn: She is tall and slim, and looks like a fashion model.
exampleZh: 她又高又苗條，看起來像個時裝模特。

exampleEn: Be careful not to slip on the wet floor near the entrance.
exampleZh: 小心不要在入口附近的濕地板上滑倒。

exampleEn: A sliver of light came through the crack in the curtains.
exampleZh: 一絲光線穿過窗簾的縫隙射進來。

exampleEn: The company's new advertising slogan is catchy and easy to remember.
