exampleZh: 公司的新廣告口號朗朗上口，容易記住。

exampleEn: The skiers raced down the steep slope of the mountain at high speed.
exampleZh: 滑雪者高速衝下陡峭的山坡。

exampleEn: His handwriting is very sloppy and difficult to read for the teacher.
exampleZh: 他的字跡很潦草，老師很難辨認。

exampleEn: Insert the coin into the slot to start the game machine immediately.
exampleZh: 將硬幣插入插槽以立即啟動遊戲機。

exampleEn: The traffic was moving very slow due to the accident ahead.
exampleZh: 由於前方發生事故，交通移動非常緩慢。

exampleEn: Please speak slowly so that I can understand what you are saying.
exampleZh: 請慢點說，這樣我才能明白你在說什麼。

exampleEn: They live in a small apartment in the center of the city.
exampleZh: 他們住在市中心的一間小公寓裡。

exampleEn: He is a smart student who always gets good grades in school.
exampleZh: 他是一個聰明的學生，在學校總是取得好成績。

exampleEn: The ball hit the window and smashed the glass into pieces.
exampleZh: 球擊中窗戶，將玻璃打碎成碎片。

exampleEn: I love the smell of freshly baked bread in the morning deeply.
exampleZh: 我深深地喜歡早晨新鮮出爐的麵包的味道。

exampleEn: She greeted everyone with a warm and friendly smile on her face.
exampleZh: 她臉上帶著溫暖友好的微笑迎接每個人。

exampleEn: The blacksmith forged the iron into a horseshoe on the anvil.
exampleZh: 鐵匠在鐵砧上將鐵鍛造成馬蹄鐵。

exampleEn: Dark smoke billowed from the burning building into the sky above.
exampleZh: 黑煙從燃燒的建築物滾滾升上天空。

exampleEn: He is a heavy smoker and has been trying to quit for years.
exampleZh: 他是一個重度吸菸者，多年來一直試圖戒菸。

exampleEn: Smoke poured out of the tall factory smokestack, polluting the air.
exampleZh: 煙霧從高大的工廠煙囪湧出，污染了空氣。

exampleEn: Smoking is strictly prohibited in all public buildings and transport.
exampleZh: 所有公共建築和交通工具嚴禁吸菸。

exampleEn: The baby's skin feels soft and smooth to the touch.
exampleZh: 嬰兒的皮膚摸起來柔軟光滑。

exampleEn: Everything went smoothly according to plan, and we finished on time.
exampleZh: 一切都按計畫順利進行，我們按時完成了。

exampleEn: I like to have a healthy snack like fruit between meals.
exampleZh: 我喜歡在兩餐之間吃水果等健康零食。

exampleEn: The snake slithered silently through the tall grass hunting for prey.
exampleZh: 蛇在長草叢中無聲地滑行，尋找獵物。

exampleEn: The dry twig made a loud snap when I stepped on it.
exampleZh: 當我踩到乾樹枝時，它發出了巨大的啪嗒聲。

exampleEn: He tried to sneak out of the house without his parents noticing.
exampleZh: 他試圖在父母沒有注意到的情況下溜出房子。

exampleEn: He looked at her with a sneer of contempt on his face.
exampleZh: 他臉上帶著輕蔑的冷笑看著她。

exampleEn: Use a tissue to cover your mouth when you sneeze, please.
exampleZh: 打噴嚏時請用紙巾摀住嘴。

exampleEn: The dog began to sniff the ground, following the scent trail.
exampleZh: 狗開始嗅地面，跟蹤氣味痕跡。

exampleEn: My husband snores so loudly that I sometimes have to sleep elsewhere.
exampleZh: 我丈夫打鼾太大聲了，有時我不得不睡在別處。

exampleEn: We expect heavy snow tomorrow, so school might be cancelled.
exampleZh: 預計明天會有大雪，所以學校可能會停課。

exampleEn: The children had a snowball fight in the park after the snowstorm.
exampleZh: 暴風雪過後，孩子們在公園裡打雪仗。

exampleEn: He bought a new snowboard for his trip to the Alps.
exampleZh: 他為阿爾卑斯山之旅買了一個新的滑雪板。

exampleEn: Snowboarding is one of the most popular winter sports among young people.
exampleZh: 滑雪板是年輕人最受歡迎的冬季運動之一。

exampleEn: The snowstorm trapped us in the cabin for three days without power.
exampleZh: 暴風雪將我們困在小屋裡三天沒有電。

exampleEn: We went for a walk on a snowy winter afternoon in the woods.
exampleZh: 我們在一個下雪的冬日下午去樹林裡散步。

exampleEn: It was raining, so we decided to stay indoors and watch movies.
exampleZh: 下雨了，所以我們決定待在室內看電影。

exampleEn: Soak the beans in water overnight before cooking them for the soup.
exampleZh: 在煮湯之前，將豆子在水中浸泡一夜。

exampleEn: We got completely soaked in the sudden downpour of rain yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天突如其來的傾盆大雨把我們全身都濕透了。

exampleEn: After a long hike, a soaking bath helps relax the tired muscles.
exampleZh: 長途徒步旅行後，泡澡有助於放鬆疲敝的肌肉。

exampleEn: Wash your hands with soap and warm water to kill germs.
exampleZh: 用肥皂和溫水洗手以殺死細菌。

exampleEn: My grandmother loves watching her favorite soap opera every afternoon.
exampleZh: 我祖母喜歡每天下午看她最喜歡的肥皂劇。

exampleEn: The eagle began to soar high above the mountains on the wind currents.
exampleZh: 老鷹開始乘風在群山之上高高翱翔。

exampleEn: She began to sob uncontrollably when she heard the sad news.
exampleZh: 聽到這個悲傷的消息，她開始無法控制地抽泣。

exampleEn: The so-called expert didn't seem to know much about the topic.
exampleZh: 這位所謂的專家似乎對這個話題知之甚少。

exampleEn: Soccer is played by millions of people around the world passionately.
exampleZh: 全世界有數百萬人熱情地踢足球。

exampleEn: She is a very sociable person who enjoys meeting new people.
exampleZh: 她是一個非常善於交際的人，喜歡結識新朋友。

exampleEn: Social media has changed the way we communicate with friends and family.
exampleZh: 社群媒體改變了我們與朋友和家人交流的方式。

exampleEn: Social networking sites like Facebook allow people to connect globally easily.
exampleZh: 像 Facebook 這樣的社群網站允許人們輕鬆地在全球範圍內聯繫。

exampleEn: College is a great place to socialize and make lifelong friends.
exampleZh: 大學是社交和結交終生朋友的好地方。

exampleEn: He is socially awkward and finds it difficult to talk to strangers.
exampleZh: 他在社交方面很笨拙，發現很難與陌生人交談。

exampleEn: We live in a multicultural society where people from different backgrounds coexist.
exampleZh: 我們生活在一個多元文化的社會中，來自不同背景的人共存。

exampleEn: I can't find the other sock to match this one anywhere.
exampleZh: 我到處都找不到與這隻襪子相配的另一隻襪子。

exampleEn: Too much soda can be bad for your teeth and health generally.
exampleZh: 喝太多蘇打水通常對你的牙齒和健康有害。

exampleEn: We sat on the comfortable sofa and watched TV all evening.
exampleZh: 我們坐在舒適的沙發上，看了一晚上的電視。

exampleEn: The kitten's fur was soft and fluffy to the touch.
exampleZh: 小貓的毛摸起來柔軟蓬鬆。

exampleEn: I'd like a cold soft drink with my burger and fries.
exampleZh: 我想在漢堡和薯條搭配一杯冷軟飲料。

exampleEn: She spoke softly to the baby to lull him to sleep.
exampleZh: 她輕聲對嬰兒說話，哄他入睡。

exampleEn: I love the softness of this blanket; it keeps me warm.
exampleZh: 我喜歡這條毯子的柔軟；它讓我保持溫暖。

exampleEn: You need to install the latest software update to fix the bugs.
exampleZh: 你需要安裝最新的軟體更新來修復錯誤。

exampleEn: The fertile soil is perfect for growing vegetables in the garden.
exampleZh: 肥沃的土壤非常適合在花園裡種植蔬菜。

exampleEn: Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity to power the house.
exampleZh: 太陽能電池板將陽光轉化為電能為房屋供電。

exampleEn: The soldier fought bravely to defend his country during the war.
exampleZh: 士兵在戰爭期間勇敢地保衛國家。

exampleEn: Ice is the solid form of water when it freezes.
exampleZh: 冰是水結冰時的固體形式。

exampleEn: The solidity of the foundation ensures the safety of the building structure.
exampleZh: 地基的堅固性確保了建築結構的安全。

exampleEn: Hamlet's famous soliloquy 'To be or not to be' explores life and death.
exampleZh: 哈姆雷特著名的獨白“生存還是毀滅”探討了生與死。

exampleEn: He performed a guitar solo that impressed everyone in the audience.
exampleZh: 他表演了一段吉他獨奏，給觀眾留下了深刻的印象。

exampleEn: We need to find a solution to this problem as soon as possible.
exampleZh: 我們需要盡快找到這個問題的解決方案。

exampleEn: Can you help me solve this difficult math problem for homework?
exampleZh: 你能幫我解決這個難題的數學作業嗎？

exampleEn: Water is known as the universal solvent because it dissolves many substances.
exampleZh: 水被稱為通用溶劑，因為它能溶解許多物質。

exampleEn: Would you like some coffee or tea with your breakfast today?
exampleZh: 你今天的早餐想喝點咖啡還是茶？

exampleEn: Somebody left their umbrella on the bus; I wonder who it is.
exampleZh: 有人把雨傘忘在公車上了；我想知道是誰。

exampleEn: I hope to visit Japan someday and see the cherry blossoms.
exampleZh: 我希望有一天能去日本看櫻花。

exampleEn: Somehow, we managed to finish the project on time despite the delays.
exampleZh: 不知何故，儘管有延誤，我們還是設法按時完成了專案。

exampleEn: Someone is knocking at the door; can you go and see who?
exampleZh: 有人在敲門；你能去看看是誰嗎？

exampleEn: Let's go someplace quiet where we can talk without being interrupted.
exampleZh: 我們去個安靜的地方，我們可以不受干擾地交談。

exampleEn: There is something wrong with my car; it's making a strange noise.
exampleZh: 我的車有問題；它發出奇怪的聲音。

exampleEn: We should meet for lunch sometime next week to catch up.
exampleZh: 我們應該在下週某個時候見面吃午飯敘舊。

exampleEn: Sometimes I like to go for a long walk to clear my head.
exampleZh: 有時我喜歡長途散步來清醒頭腦。

exampleEn: I felt somewhat tired after the long journey, but happy to arrive.
exampleZh: 長途旅行後我覺得有點累，但很高興到達。

exampleEn: I lost my keys somewhere in the house, but I can't find them.
exampleZh: 我把鑰匙弄丟在房子裡的某個地方，但我找不到。

exampleEn: His son plays on the school football team and is very talented.
exampleZh: 他的兒子在校足球隊踢球，非常有天賦。

exampleEn: That song reminds me of my childhood and brings back memories.
exampleZh: 那首歌讓我想起了我的童年，勾起了回憶。

exampleEn: Her son-in-law is a doctor and takes good care of her daughter.
exampleZh: 她的女婿是一名醫生，很好地照顧她的女兒。

exampleEn: Shakespeare wrote many beautiful sonnets about love and beauty.
exampleZh: 莎士比亞寫了許多關於愛和美的優美十四行詩。

exampleEn: We will be arriving at our destination soon, so please get ready.
exampleZh: 我們很快就會到達目的地，所以請做好準備。

exampleEn: The mother tried to soothe the crying baby with a gentle lullaby.
exampleZh: 母親試圖用溫柔的搖籃曲安撫哭泣的嬰兒。

exampleEn: She has a sophisticated taste in fashion and always looks elegant.
exampleZh: 她對時尚有獨到的品味，看起來總是很優雅。

exampleEn: As a sophomore in college, he is studying biology and chemistry.
exampleZh: 作為大學二年級學生，他正在學習生物和化學。

exampleEn: My muscles are sore after the intense workout at the gym yesterday.
exampleZh: 昨天在健身房劇烈運動後，我的肌肉酸痛。

exampleEn: He felt deep sorrow after the loss of his beloved pet dog.
exampleZh: 失去心愛的寵物狗後，他感到深深的悲傷。

exampleEn: I am sorry for being late; there was heavy traffic on the way.
exampleZh: 對不起，我遲到了；路上的交通很擁擠。

exampleEn: What sort of music do you like to listen to in free time?
exampleZh: 在空閒時間你喜歡聽哪種音樂？

exampleEn: She believes that the soul lives on after the body dies.
exampleZh: 她相信身體死後靈魂仍然存在。

exampleEn: The sound of the waves crashing on the beach is very relaxing.
exampleZh: 海浪拍打海灘的聲音讓人很放鬆。

exampleEn: The movie has an amazing soundtrack that fits the story perfectly.
exampleZh: 這部電影有令人驚嘆的原聲帶，與故事完美契合。

exampleEn: I made a pot of vegetable soup for dinner on a cold winter day.
exampleZh: 在寒冷的冬日，我做了一鍋蔬菜湯作為晚餐。

exampleEn: The lemon tasted very sour, making his face pucker up funny.
exampleZh: 檸檬嘗起來很酸，讓他的臉有趣地皺了起來。

exampleEn: The sun is the main source of energy for all life on Earth.
exampleZh: 太陽是地球上所有生命的主要能量來源。

exampleEn: Birds fly south in the winter to find warmer weather.
exampleZh: 鳥類在冬天向南飛尋找更溫暖的天氣。

exampleEn: The wind is blowing from the southeast, bringing warm air.
exampleZh: 風從東南吹來，帶來溫暖的空氣。

exampleEn: They live in the southern part of the country where it is sunny.
exampleZh: 他們住在該國陽光明媚的南部。

exampleEn: The river flows southward until it reaches the sea eventually.
exampleZh: 河流向南流動，直到最終到達大海。

exampleEn: The southwest region is known for its deserts and canyons.
exampleZh: 西南地區以其沙漠和峽谷而聞名。

exampleEn: I bought a keychain as a souvenir to remember my trip.
exampleZh: 我買了一個鑰匙扣作為紀念品來紀念我的旅行。

exampleEn: The Soviet Union was a major world power during the Cold War era.
exampleZh: 蘇聯是冷戰時期的世界主要大國。

exampleEn: Soybeans are a rich source of protein and are used in many foods.
exampleZh: 大豆富含蛋白質，用於許多食物中。

exampleEn: She spent the day at the spa getting a massage and facial.
exampleZh: 她在水療中心度過了一天，接受按摩和麵部護理。

exampleEn: There is plenty of space in the trunk for all our luggage.
exampleZh: 後備箱有足夠的空間放我們所有的行李。

exampleEn: The astronauts traveled to the moon in a technologically advanced spaceship.
exampleZh: 太空人乘坐技術先進的宇宙飛船前往月球。

exampleEn: We had spaghetti and meatballs for dinner, which is my favorite meal.
exampleZh: 我們晚餐吃了義大利麵和肉丸，這是我最喜歡的一餐。

exampleEn: The bridge spans the river, connecting the two sides of the city.
exampleZh: 這座橋橫跨河流，連接城市的兩側。

exampleEn: Do you have a spare pen that I could borrow for a moment?
exampleZh: 你有備用筆可以借我一下嗎？

exampleEn: We grilled some delicious spareribs at the barbecue party last weekend.
exampleZh: 上週末我們在燒烤派對上烤了一些美味的排骨。

exampleEn: A small spark can start a large fire if it is dry.
exampleZh: 如果乾燥，一個小火花就會引發大火。

exampleEn: Her eyes began to sparkle with joy when she saw the present.
exampleZh: 當她看到禮物時，她的眼睛開始閃爍著喜悅的光芒。

exampleEn: We drank sparkling water with lemon during the hot summer lunch.
exampleZh: 在炎熱的夏季午餐期間，我們喝了加檸檬的氣泡水。

exampleEn: A small sparrow landed on the windowsill and chirped happily.
exampleZh: 一隻小麻雀落在窗台上，高興地嘰嘰喳喳。

exampleEn: Please speak clearly and slowly so that everyone can understand you.
exampleZh: 請說清楚、慢一點，這樣每個人都能聽懂你在說什麼。

exampleEn: The guest speaker gave an inspiring talk about leadership and success.
exampleZh: 演講嘉賓就領導力和成功進行了鼓舞人心的演講。

exampleEn: She made a special cake for her daughter's birthday celebration.
exampleZh: 她為女兒的生日慶祝活動做了一個特別的蛋糕。

exampleEn: He is a heart specialist who treats patients with cardiovascular diseases.
exampleZh: 他是一位治療心血管疾病患者的心臟專家。

exampleEn: The restaurant specializes in authentic Italian cuisine made with fresh ingredients.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳專營採用新鮮食材烹製的正宗義大利美食。

exampleEn: This cake was made specially for your birthday celebration tonight.
exampleZh: 這個蛋糕是今晚為你的生日慶祝活動特製的。

exampleEn: The restaurant's specialty is handmade pasta with a secret sauce.
exampleZh: 這家餐廳的招牌菜是配有秘製醬汁的手工義大利麵。

exampleEn: There are many different species of birds living in this forest.
exampleZh: 這片森林裡生活著許多不同種類的鳥類。

exampleEn: Can you be more specific about what you want for dinner?
exampleZh: 你能更具體地說明你晚餐想吃什麼嗎？

exampleEn: I specifically asked you not to be late for the meeting today.
exampleZh: 我特別要求你今天開會不要遲到。

exampleEn: Please specify the color and size when you order the shirt online.
exampleZh: 在網上訂購襯衫時，請註明顏色和尺碼。

exampleEn: The fireworks display was a magnificent spectacle that lit up the sky.
exampleZh: 煙花匯演是一場照亮天空的壯麗奇觀。

exampleEn: The view from the top of the mountain was absolutely spectacular.
exampleZh: 山頂的景色絕對壯觀。

exampleEn: The stadium was packed with spectators cheering for their favorite team.
exampleZh: 體育場擠滿了為自己喜歡的球隊加油的觀眾。

exampleEn: She gave a moving speech about the importance of education for all.
exampleZh: 她發表了一篇關於普及教育重要性的感人演講。

exampleEn: The car was traveling at a high speed on the highway.
exampleZh: 汽車在高速公路上高速行駛。

exampleEn: The police pulled over the speeder and gave him a ticket.
exampleZh: 警察攔下超速駕駛者並給他開了罰單。

exampleEn: Can you tell me how to spell your last name correctly?
exampleZh: 你能告訴我你的姓氏怎麼拼寫才正確嗎？

exampleEn: The audience was spellbound by the magician's amazing tricks on stage.
exampleZh: 觀眾被魔術師在舞台上驚人的戲法迷住了。

exampleEn: Her spelling has improved a lot since she started reading more books.
exampleZh: 自從她開始閱讀更多書籍以來，她的拼寫有了很大進步。

exampleEn: I like to spend my weekends relaxing at home with my family.
exampleZh: 我喜歡在週末和家人在家放鬆。

exampleEn: The earth is not a perfect sphere, but it is close to one.
exampleZh: 地球不是一個完美的球體，但它接近一個球體。

exampleEn: Variety is the spice of life, so try new things often.
exampleZh: 多樣性是生活的調味品，所以要經常嘗試新事物。

exampleEn: I can't eat very spicy food because it hurts my stomach.
exampleZh: 我不能吃太辣的食物，因為它會傷我的胃。

exampleEn: A large spider spun a web in the corner of the room.
exampleZh: 一隻大蜘蛛在房間的角落裡結了一張網。

exampleEn: Be careful not to spill your coffee on the clean carpet.
exampleZh: 小心不要把咖啡灑在乾淨的地毯上。

exampleEn: The dancer began to spin around and around on the stage gracefully.
exampleZh: 舞者開始在舞台上優雅地旋轉。

exampleEn: Spinach is a healthy green vegetable that is rich in iron.
exampleZh: 菠菜是一種富含鐵的健康綠色蔬菜。

exampleEn: The staircase wound upwards in a spiral to the top of the tower.
exampleZh: 樓梯呈螺旋狀向上蜿蜒至塔頂。

exampleEn: Although the team lost, they kept their team spirit high throughout.
exampleZh: 雖然球隊輸了，但他們始終保持著高昂的團隊精神。

exampleEn: She went on a spiritual journey to find inner peace and meaning.
exampleZh: 她踏上了尋找內心平靜和意義的精神之旅。

exampleEn: He went out for a walk in spite of the heavy rain.
exampleZh: 儘管下著大雨，他還是出去散步了。

exampleEn: The children love to splash in the puddles after the rain stops.
exampleZh: 雨停後，孩子們喜歡在水坑裡潑水。

exampleEn: The mud splattered all over my new shoes when the car passed.
exampleZh: 汽車駛過時，泥漿濺滿了我的新鞋。

exampleEn: Let's split the bill evenly between the four of us for dinner.
exampleZh: 讓我們四個人平攤晚餐的費用。

exampleEn: Don't spoil your appetite by eating too many snacks before dinner.
exampleZh: 晚飯前不要吃太多零食，以免壞了胃口。

exampleEn: The company spokesman announced the launch of the new product yesterday.
exampleZh: 公司發言人昨天宣布推出新產品。

exampleEn: The government spokeswoman refused to comment on the ongoing investigation details.
exampleZh: 政府發言人拒絕就正在進行的調查細節發表評論。

exampleEn: Use a damp sponge to wipe the table clean after the meal.
exampleZh: 飯後用濕海綿把桌子擦乾淨。

exampleEn: The company agreed to sponsor the local football team for the season.
exampleZh: 該公司同意贊助當地足球隊這個賽季。

exampleEn: She used a spoon to stir the sugar into her hot tea.
exampleZh: 她用勺子把糖攪拌進熱茶裡。

exampleEn: Football is the most popular sport in many countries around the world.
exampleZh: 足球是世界上許多國家最受歡迎的運動。

exampleEn: He is good at sports and plays basketball, soccer, and tennis.
exampleZh: 他擅長運動，打籃球、足球和網球。

exampleEn: We go to the sports center every Saturday to swim and exercise.
exampleZh: 我們每週六都去體育中心游泳和鍛鍊。

exampleEn: Good sportsmanship means respecting your opponents and playing by the rules.
exampleZh: 良好的體育精神意味著尊重你的對手並遵守規則。

exampleEn: Can you spot the difference between these two almost identical pictures?
exampleZh: 你能看出這兩張幾乎相同的照片之間的區別嗎？

exampleEn: She used hair spray to keep her hairstyle in place all day.
exampleZh: 她用髮膠讓髮型整天保持原樣。

exampleEn: The fire spread quickly through the dry forest due to strong winds.
exampleZh: 由於強風，大火在乾燥的森林中迅速蔓延。

exampleEn: He used a spreadsheet to organize the budget and track expenses.
exampleZh: 他使用電子表格來組織預算和跟蹤費用。

exampleEn: Flowers start to bloom in the spring when the weather gets warmer.
exampleZh: 天氣變暖時，花朵在春天開始綻放。

exampleEn: The runners began to sprint towards the finish line in the final lap.
exampleZh: 賽跑者在最後一圈開始向終點衝刺。

exampleEn: The promise of a bonus spurred the team to work harder.
exampleZh: 獎金的承諾激勵團隊更加努力地工作。

exampleEn: The spy gathered secret information and sent it back to his country.
exampleZh: 間諜收集機密資訊並將其發送回國。

exampleEn: The police squad raided the building and arrested the criminals inside.
exampleZh: 警察小隊突襲了大樓並逮捕了裡面的罪犯。

exampleEn: A square has four equal sides and four right angles.
exampleZh: 正方形有四個相等的邊和四個直角。

exampleEn: He accidentally squashed the tomato in the shopping bag under the milk.
exampleZh: 他不小心把購物袋裡的番茄壓在牛奶下面了。

exampleEn: Squeeze the lemon to get the juice out for the recipe.
exampleZh: 擠壓檸檬以取出汁液用於食譜。

exampleEn: He was stabbed in the arm during the fight but will recover.
exampleZh: 他在打鬥中手臂被刺傷，但會康復。

exampleEn: Political stability is essential for economic growth and foreign investment.
exampleZh: 政治穩定對經濟增長和外國投資至關重要。

exampleEn: The patient's condition is stable now after the successful surgery.
exampleZh: 手術成功後，病人的病情現在穩定了。

exampleEn: There is a stack of books on the desk waiting to be read.
exampleZh: 桌子上有一堆書等著讀。

exampleEn: The stadium was filled with fans watching the World Cup final match.
exampleZh: 體育場擠滿了觀看世界盃決賽的球迷。

exampleEn: The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful during our stay there.
exampleZh: 我們住在那裡期間，飯店工作人員非常友好和樂於助人。

exampleEn: The actors performed on stage in front of a live audience.
exampleZh: 演員們在現場觀眾面前在舞台上表演。

exampleEn: He began to stagger after drinking too much alcohol at the party.
exampleZh: 在聚會上喝了太多酒後，他開始搖搖晃晃。

exampleEn: Be careful not to stain your white shirt with the tomato sauce.
exampleZh: 小心不要把番茄醬弄髒你的白襯衫。

exampleEn: She walked up the stairs to her bedroom on the second floor.
exampleZh: 她走上樓梯到二樓的臥室。

exampleEn: A lot of money is at stake in this high-risk investment.
exampleZh: 這項高風險投資危及很多錢。

exampleEn: The car engine stalled in the middle of the busy intersection.
exampleZh: 汽車發動機在繁忙的十字路口中間熄火了。

exampleEn: He tends to stammer when he is nervous or speaking in public.
exampleZh: 他在緊張或在公共場合講話時往往會口吃。

exampleEn: Put a stamp on the envelope before you mail the letter.
exampleZh: 寄信前在信封上貼郵票。

exampleEn: Please stand up when the judge enters the courtroom.
exampleZh: 法官進入法庭時請起立。

exampleEn: We maintain a high standard of quality in all our products.
exampleZh: 我們所有產品都保持高質量標準。

exampleEn: The doctors are on standby in case of an emergency at the hospital.
exampleZh: 醫生們正在待命，以防醫院發生緊急情況。

exampleEn: Traffic came to a complete standstill because of the accident ahead.
exampleZh: 由於前方發生事故，交通完全停滯。

exampleEn: The poem consists of four stanzas, each with four lines.
exampleZh: 這首詩由四節組成，每節四行。

exampleEn: Look at the bright star shining in the night sky above us.
exampleZh: 看我們上方夜空中閃耀的明亮星星。

exampleEn: It is rude to stare at people, so please look away.
exampleZh: 盯著別人看是不禮貌的，所以請把目光移開。

exampleEn: Let's start the meeting now so we can finish on time.
exampleZh: 讓我們現在開始會議，以便我們能按時結束。

exampleEn: The loud noise startled the cat, and it ran under the sofa.
exampleZh: 巨大的噪音嚇了貓一跳，它跑到了沙發底下。

exampleEn: Millions of people are facing starvation due to the severe drought.
exampleZh: 由於嚴重乾旱，數百萬人面臨飢餓。

exampleEn: Without food, the animals will starve to death in the harsh winter.
exampleZh: 沒有食物，動物們將在嚴酷的冬天餓死。

exampleEn: I'm starving because I haven't eaten anything since breakfast this morning.
exampleZh: 我快餓死了，因為我今天早上早飯後什麼都沒吃。

exampleEn: The president will visit every state in the country during his campaign.
exampleZh: 總統將在競選期間訪問該國的每個州。

exampleEn: The witness gave a statement to the police about what she saw.
exampleZh: 目擊者向警方陳述了她所看到的情況。

exampleEn: He was a respected statesman who worked for peace and international cooperation.
exampleZh: 他是一位受人尊敬的政治家，致力於和平與國際合作。

exampleEn: The governor declared a statewide emergency due to the approaching hurricane.
exampleZh: 由於颶風逼近，州長宣布全州進入緊急狀態。

exampleEn: I will meet you at the train station at five o'clock.
exampleZh: 我五點鐘在火車站見你。

exampleEn: Statistics show that smoking increases the risk of lung cancer significantly.
exampleZh: 統計數據顯示，吸菸會顯著增加患肺癌的風險。

exampleEn: The statue of Liberty is a famous landmark in New York City.
exampleZh: 自由女神像是紐約市著名的地標。

exampleEn: What is the status of your application? Has it been approved yet?
exampleZh: 你的申請狀態如何？批准了嗎？

exampleEn: We plan to stay at a hotel near the beach for our vacation.
exampleZh: 我們計畫在假期住在海灘附近的飯店。

exampleEn: The company has been growing steadily over the past five years.
exampleZh: 在過去的五年裡，公司一直在穩步增長。

exampleEn: You need a steady hand to paint such fine details on the canvas.
exampleZh: 你需要一雙穩定的手才能在畫布上畫出如此精細的細節。

exampleEn: He ordered a medium-rare steak with fries at the restaurant for dinner.
exampleZh: 晚餐他在餐廳點了一份三分熟的牛排配薯條。

exampleEn: It is wrong to steal money or property from other people.
exampleZh: 偷別人的錢或財產是錯誤的。

exampleEn: Steam rose from the hot cup of coffee on the table.
exampleZh: 桌上熱氣騰騰的咖啡冒出蒸汽。

exampleEn: The skyscraper is built with a strong steel frame to withstand wind.
exampleZh: 摩天大樓是用堅固的鋼架建造的，以抵禦風。

exampleEn: He looked at her with a steely determination in his eyes.
exampleZh: 他眼裡帶著鋼鐵般的決心看著她。

exampleEn: The hill was so steep that we had trouble climbing up it.
exampleZh: 這座山太陡了，我們爬上去很費勁。

exampleEn: Use the steering wheel to steer the car in the right direction.
exampleZh: 使用方向盤將汽車轉向正確的方向。

exampleEn: Keep both hands on the steering wheel while driving for safety.
exampleZh: 為了安全起見，開車時請雙手握住方向盤。

exampleEn: The flower has a long green stem that supports the petals.
exampleZh: 這朵花有長長的綠色莖支撐著花瓣。

exampleEn: Take a step forward and introduce yourself to the class, please.
exampleZh: 請向前邁一步，向全班介紹你自己。

exampleEn: His stepfather treats him like his own son and loves him dearly.
exampleZh: 他的繼父待他如親生兒子，非常愛他。

exampleEn: Cinderella's stepmother was cruel and made her do all the housework.
exampleZh: 灰姑娘的繼母很殘忍，讓她做所有的家務。

exampleEn: We should avoid judging people based on stereotypes and get to know them.
exampleZh: 我們應該避免基於刻板印象來判斷人，而要了解他們。

exampleEn: The teacher gave the students a stern warning about cheating on exams.
exampleZh: 老師對學生考試作弊發出了嚴厲警告。

exampleEn: She cooked a delicious beef stew with vegetables for dinner.
exampleZh: 她晚餐煮了一鍋美味的蔬菜燉牛肉。

exampleEn: Don't stick your head out of the window while the bus is moving.
exampleZh: 公車行駛時不要把頭伸出窗外。

exampleEn: He put a sticker on his laptop to personalize it.
exampleZh: 他在筆記本電腦上貼了一張貼紙以使其個性化。

exampleEn: My hands are sticky from eating the sweet honey bun.
exampleZh: 吃了甜蜂蜜麵包，我的手黏糊糊的。

exampleEn: My neck feels stiff after sleeping in an uncomfortable position all night.
exampleZh: 整晚睡在不舒服的姿勢後，我的脖子感覺僵硬。

exampleEn: The water in the pond was perfectly still, reflecting the trees.
exampleZh: 池塘裡的水完全靜止，倒映著樹木。

exampleEn: Caffeine is a stimulant found in coffee that keeps you awake.
exampleZh: 咖啡因是咖啡中發現的一種興奮劑，可以讓你保持清醒。

exampleEn: The government lowered taxes to stimulate the economy and encourage spending.
exampleZh: 政府降低稅收以刺激經濟並鼓勵消費。

exampleEn: Babies need plenty of mental stimulation to help their brains develop.
exampleZh: 嬰兒需要大量的精神刺激來幫助他們的大腦發育。

exampleEn: Don't be stingy; share your candy with your friends.
exampleZh: 別吝嗇；和你的朋友分享你的糖果。

exampleEn: The garbage bin began to stink in the hot summer sun.
exampleZh: 垃圾桶在炎熱的夏日陽光下開始發臭。

exampleEn: Use a spoon to stir the soup so it doesn't burn.
exampleZh: 用勺子攪拌湯，以免燒焦。

exampleEn: She had to get three stitches in her finger after the cut.
exampleZh: 割傷後，她的手指不得不縫了三針。

exampleEn: The store is out of stock of the item you wanted.
exampleZh: 這家商店你想要的商品沒貨了。

exampleEn: Investing in the stock market carries risks but can be profitable.
exampleZh: 投資股票市場有風險，但也可能有利可圖。

exampleEn: The country has a stockpile of oil reserves for emergencies.
exampleZh: 該國擁有石油儲備以備不時之需。

exampleEn: My stomach is growling because I am very hungry right now.
exampleZh: 我的肚子在咕咕叫，因為我現在很餓。

exampleEn: He stayed home from school because he had a bad stomachache.
exampleZh: 他因為胃痛厲害而沒去上學。

exampleEn: The boy threw a stone into the river and watched the splashes.
exampleZh: 男孩往河這扔了一塊石頭，看著水花飛濺。

exampleEn: The ancient castle features impressive stonework that has lasted for centuries.
exampleZh: 這座古老的城堡擁有令人印象深刻的石製品，已經延續了幾個世紀。

exampleEn: She sat on a high stool at the kitchen counter to eat.
exampleZh: 她坐在廚房櫃檯的高腳凳上吃飯。

exampleEn: Please stop the car; I need to get out here.
exampleZh: 請停車；我需要在這裡下車。

exampleEn: We had a brief stopover in Dubai on our way to London.
exampleZh: 在去倫敦的路上，我們在杜拜短暫停留。

exampleEn: The coach used a stopwatch to time the runners during practice.
exampleZh: 教練在練習期間使用秒錶為跑步者計時。

exampleEn: We put the winter clothes in storage until next year.
exampleZh: 我們把冬衣存放在倉庫裡直到明年。

exampleEn: I need to go to the grocery store to buy some food.
exampleZh: 我需要去雜貨店買些食物。

exampleEn: A severe storm with thunder and lightning is approaching the city.
exampleZh: 一場帶有雷電的強烈風暴正在逼近這座城市。

exampleEn: The weather was stormy, so we cancelled our boat trip.
exampleZh: 天氣暴風雨，所以我們取消了乘船旅行。

exampleEn: Grandma told us a bedtime story about a magical kingdom.
exampleZh: 奶奶給我們講了一個關於魔法王國的睡前故事。

exampleEn: He is a gifted storyteller who can keep an audience captivated.
exampleZh: 他是一位這有天賦的故事講述者，可以吸引觀眾。

exampleEn: She cooked the soup on the stove for an hour.
exampleZh: 她在爐子上煮了一個小時的湯。

exampleEn: Draw a straight line from point A to point B on paper.
exampleZh: 在紙上從 A 點到 B 點畫一條直線。

exampleEn: Please straighten your room and put your clothes away.
exampleZh: 請整理你的房間並把你的衣服收好。

exampleEn: The instructions were straightforward and easy to understand for everyone.
exampleZh: 說明簡單明瞭，每個人都容易理解。

exampleEn: Lifting heavy weights can put a strain on your back muscles.
exampleZh: 舉重會給你的背部肌肉帶來壓力。

exampleEn: The ship sailed through the narrow strait between the two islands.
exampleZh: 這艘船駛過兩個島嶼之間狹窄的海峽。

exampleEn: A single strand of hair was found at the crime scene.
exampleZh: 在犯罪現場發現了一根頭髮。

exampleEn: It was strange that he left without saying goodbye to anyone.
exampleZh: 奇怪的是，他沒有和任何人說再見就離開了。

exampleEn: She has been acting strangely lately, as if she is hiding something.
exampleZh: 她最近表現得很奇怪，好像在隱瞞什麼。

exampleEn: My mother told me never to talk to strangers on the street.
exampleZh: 我媽媽告訴我永遠不要在街上和陌生人說話。

exampleEn: The vines threatened to strangle the young tree if not removed.
exampleZh: 如果不清除，藤蔓可能會勒死這棵小樹。

exampleEn: The general made a strategic decision to retreat and regroup.
exampleZh: 將軍做出撤退和重組的戰略決定。

exampleEn: We need to develop a marketing strategy to increase our sales.
exampleZh: 我們需要制定行銷策略來增加我們的銷售額。

exampleEn: She drank her soda through a plastic straw at the restaurant.
exampleZh: 她在餐廳用塑膠吸管喝蘇打水。

exampleEn: I love eating fresh strawberries with cream in the summer.
exampleZh: 我喜歡在夏天吃新鮮草莓配奶油。

exampleEn: A small stream flows through the forest and into the river.
exampleZh: 一條小溪流過森林，匯入河流。

exampleEn: Be careful when you cross the busy street during rush hour.
exampleZh: 在尖峰時段過繁忙的街道時要小心。

exampleEn: He lifted the heavy box with ease, showing his great strength.
exampleZh: 他輕鬆地舉起了沉重的箱子，展示了他巨大的力量。

exampleEn: Exercise helps to strengthen your muscles and improve your overall health.
exampleZh: 運動有助於增強肌肉並改善整體健康。

exampleEn: She is under a lot of stress at work due to deadlines.
exampleZh: 由於截止日期，她在工作中承受著很大的壓力。

exampleEn: I feel stressed when I have too much work to do.
exampleZh: 當我有太多工作要做時，我感到有壓力。

exampleEn: Moving to a new house can be a very stressful experience.
exampleZh: 搬新家可能是一種非常有壓力的經歷。

exampleEn: It is important to stretch your muscles before and after exercise.
exampleZh: 在運動前後伸展肌肉很重要。

exampleEn: The area was stricken by a devastating earthquake that destroyed many homes.
exampleZh: 該地區遭受了毀滅性的地震，摧毀了許多房屋。

exampleEn: Our teacher is very strict about homework and does not accept lateness.
exampleZh: 我們的老師對家庭作業非常嚴格，不接受遲交。

exampleEn: Smoking is strictly forbidden in the hospital building and grounds.
exampleZh: 醫院大樓和場地內嚴禁吸菸。

exampleEn: He walked with a confident stride, looking straight ahead.
exampleZh: 他邁著自信的步伐走著，直視前方。

exampleEn: The workers decided to go on strike to demand higher wages.
exampleZh: 工人們決定罷工以要求更高的工資。

exampleEn: There is a striking resemblance between the father and his son.
exampleZh: 父親和兒子之間有驚人的相似之處。

exampleEn: He tied the package with a piece of strong string securely.
exampleZh: 他用一根結實的繩子把包裹繫好。

exampleEn: He cut the paper into thin strips to make a decoration.
exampleZh: 他把紙剪成細條做裝飾。

exampleEn: The zebra has black and white stripes on its body.
exampleZh: 斑馬身上有黑白條紋。

exampleEn: We should always strive to do our best in everything we do.
exampleZh: 我們應該始終努力在我們做的每件事上做到最好。

exampleEn: He suffered a stroke that left him partially paralyzed on one side.
exampleZh: 他中風了，導致他一側部分癱瘓。

exampleEn: He is strong enough to lift the heavy table by himself.
exampleZh: 他足夠強壯，可以獨自舉起沉重的桌子。

exampleEn: I strongly advise you to see a doctor about that cough.
exampleZh: 我強烈建議你去看醫生治療咳嗽。

exampleEn: The structure of the building is earthquake-resistant and very safe.
exampleZh: 這座建築的結構抗震，非常安全。

exampleEn: He had to struggle to make ends meet with his low salary.
exampleZh: 他不得不為靠微薄的薪水維持生計而掙扎。

exampleEn: He is too stubborn to admit that he made a mistake.
exampleZh: 他太固執了，不願承認自己犯了錯。

exampleEn: She stubbornly refused to listen to anyone's advice on the matter.
exampleZh: 她固執地拒絕聽取任何人對這件事的建議。

exampleEn: The car got stuck in the mud and we couldn't push it out.
exampleZh: 車陷在泥裡，我們推不出來。

exampleEn: The student raised his hand to ask the teacher a question.
exampleZh: 學生舉手向老師提問。

exampleEn: The artist paints in her studio which has lots of natural light.
exampleZh: 這位藝術家在她的工作室裡畫畫，那裡有充足的自然光。

exampleEn: I need to study hard for my history exam tomorrow.
exampleZh: 我需要為明天的歷史考試努力學習。

exampleEn: Please put your stuff in the locker before entering the gym.
exampleZh: 進入健身房前請把你的東西放在儲物櫃裡。

exampleEn: The child hugged her stuffed bear tightly while sleeping.
exampleZh: 孩子睡覺時緊緊抱著她的填充熊。

exampleEn: He stumbled over a rock in the dark and nearly fell.
exampleZh: 他在黑暗中被一塊石頭絆倒，差點摔倒。

exampleEn: The sudden news seemed to stun everyone in the room into silence.
exampleZh: 突然的消息似乎讓房間裡的每個人都驚呆了，陷入了沉默。

exampleEn: She looked stunning in her elegant evening gown at the party.
exampleZh: 她在派對上穿著優雅的晚禮服看起來令人驚艷。

exampleEn: It was a stupid mistake to leave the keys in the car.
exampleZh: 把鑰匙忘在車裡是一個愚蠢的錯誤。

exampleEn: She has a unique style of dressing that sets her apart.
exampleZh: 她有一種獨特的著裝風格，這讓她與眾不同。

exampleEn: He always wears stylish clothes and looks very fashionable.
exampleZh: 他總是穿著時髦的衣服，看起來很時尚。

exampleEn: The hair stylist cut and colored her hair for the wedding.
exampleZh: 髮型師為婚禮給她剪了頭髮並染了色。

exampleEn: Her fear of dogs may come from a subconscious memory of childhood.
exampleZh: 她對狗的恐懼可能來自童年的潛意識記憶。

exampleEn: India is a vast country located on the Asian subcontinent.
exampleZh: 印度是一個位於亞洲次大陸的廣闊國家。

exampleEn: Punk rock was a popular subculture among youth in the 1970s.
exampleZh: 龐克搖滾是 1970 年代青年中流行的一種亞文化。

exampleEn: They live in a new subdivision with quiet streets and modern houses.
exampleZh: 他們住在一個安靜的街道和現代房屋的新分區。

exampleEn: Math is my favorite subject in school because I like numbers.
exampleZh: 數學是我在學校最喜歡的科目，因為我喜歡數字。

exampleEn: The subjunctive mood is used to express wishes or hypothetical situations.
exampleZh: 虛擬語氣用於表達願望或假設的情況。

exampleEn: The submarine dove deep into the ocean to avoid detection.
exampleZh: 潛艇潛入深海以避免被發現。

exampleEn: Please submit your application before the deadline on Friday.
exampleZh: 請在週五截止日期前提交您的申請。

exampleEn: The movie has an interesting subplot involving the main character's brother.
exampleZh: 這部電影有一個涉及主角兄弟的有趣支線情節。

exampleEn: The storm began to subside, and the wind died down finally.
exampleZh: 風暴開始平息，風終於停了。

exampleEn: Water is a liquid substance that is essential for all life.
exampleZh: 水是所有生命必不可少的液體物質。

exampleEn: He donated a substantial amount of money to the local charity.
exampleZh: 他向當地的慈善機構捐贈了一筆可觀的錢。

exampleEn: You can use honey as a substitute for sugar in this recipe.
exampleZh: 在這個食譜中，你可以用蜂蜜代替糖。

exampleEn: I prefer watching foreign movies with subtitles rather than dubbed versions.
exampleZh: 我更喜歡看帶字幕的外國電影，而不是配音版本。

exampleEn: There is a subtle difference between the two colors that is hard to see.
exampleZh: 這兩種顏色之間有細微的差別，很難看出。

exampleEn: If you subtract five from ten, you are left with five.
exampleZh: 如果你從十減去五，你還剩下五。

exampleEn: They moved to a quiet suburb outside the city for a better life.
exampleZh: 為了更好的生活，他們搬到了城外安靜的郊區。

exampleEn: I take the subway to work every day because it is fast.
exampleZh: 我每天坐地鐵上班，因為它很快。

exampleEn: If you work hard and never give up, you will surely succeed.
exampleZh: 如果你努力工作並且永不放棄，你一定會成功。

exampleEn: The party was a great success, and everyone had a wonderful time.
exampleZh: 派對非常成功，每個人都玩得很開心。

exampleEn: He is a successful businessman who owns several companies in the city.
exampleZh: 他是一位成功的商人，在城市裡擁有幾家公司。

exampleEn: She successfully completed the marathon after months of training hard.
exampleZh: 經過幾個月的艱苦訓練，她成功完成馬拉松比賽。

exampleEn: It rained for three successive days, causing floods in the area.
exampleZh: 連續下了三天雨，導致該地區發生洪水。

exampleEn: I have never seen such a beautiful sunset in my entire life.
exampleZh: 我一生中從未見過如此美麗的日落。

exampleEn: The baby sucked on her pacifier contentedly while sleeping in her crib.
exampleZh: 嬰兒睡在嬰兒床上時心滿意足地吸著奶嘴。

exampleEn: A sudden noise in the middle of the night woke us all up.
exampleZh: 半夜突然的噪音把我們都吵醒了。

exampleEn: Suddenly, the lights went out and the room was plunged into darkness.
exampleZh: 突然，燈滅了，房間陷入了黑暗。

exampleEn: He decided to sue the company for damages after the accident.
exampleZh: 事故發生後，他決定起訴公司要求賠償。

exampleEn: Many people suffer from allergies in the spring when flowers bloom.
exampleZh: 春天花開時，許多人患有過敏症。

exampleEn: The war caused great suffering to the innocent civilians in the region.
exampleZh: 戰爭給該地區的無辜平民造成了巨大的痛苦。

exampleEn: We have sufficient food and water to last for a week easily.
exampleZh: 我們有足夠的食物和水，可以輕鬆維持一週。

exampleEn: The meat was not cooked sufficiently, so it was still raw inside.
exampleZh: 肉煮得不夠熟，所以裡面還是生的。

exampleEn: Adding the suffix '-ly' to 'quick' makes the adverb 'quickly'.
exampleZh: 在 'quick' 後面加上後綴 '-ly' 就變成了副詞 'quickly'。

exampleEn: I take two spoonfuls of sugar in my coffee every morning.
exampleZh: 我每天早上在咖啡裡放兩勺糖。

exampleEn: I suggest that we leave early to avoid the heavy traffic.
exampleZh: 我建議我們早點出發以避開繁忙的交通。

exampleEn: Do you have any suggestion for a good restaurant nearby for dinner?
exampleZh: 你對附近有沒有好的晚餐餐廳有什麼建議嗎？

exampleEn: Depression can sometimes lead to thoughts of suicide in severe cases.
exampleZh: 在嚴重的情況下，抑鬱症有時會導致自殺念頭。

exampleEn: He wore a dark blue suit and tie to the job interview.
exampleZh: 他穿著深藍色西裝，打著領帶去面試。

exampleEn: This movie is not suitable for young children due to violence.
exampleZh: 由於暴力，這部電影不適合幼兒觀看。

exampleEn: Please dress suitably for the cold weather outside today.
exampleZh: 今天外面天氣冷，請穿著得體。

exampleEn: I packed my clothes and shoes in a large suitcase for travel.
exampleZh: 我把衣服和鞋子裝在一個大皮箱裡去旅行。

exampleEn: Sulfur is a yellow element that has a strong, unpleasant smell.
exampleZh: 硫是一種黃色元素，具有強烈難聞的氣味。

exampleEn: The sum of two and two is four, as everyone knows.
exampleZh: 眾所周知，二加二的總和是四。

exampleEn: Can you summarize the main points of the article in a few sentences?
exampleZh: 你能用幾句話概括這篇文章的要點嗎？

exampleEn: Here is a brief summary of what we discussed in the meeting.
exampleZh: 這是我們在會議上討論內容的簡要摘要。

exampleEn: We usually go to the beach for our summer vacation every year.
exampleZh: 我們每年通常去海灘過暑假。

exampleEn: They finally reached the summit of the mountain after a long climb.
exampleZh: 經過長時間的攀登，他們終於到達了山頂。

exampleEn: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west daily.
exampleZh: 太陽每天東升西落。

exampleEn: She likes to live on the beach and sunbathe in the summer.
exampleZh: 她喜歡住在海灘上，在夏天享受日光浴。

exampleEn: A single sunbeam shone through the clouds and lit up the field.
exampleZh: 一束陽光穿過雲層照亮了田野。

exampleEn: We go to church every Sunday morning with the whole family.
exampleZh: 我們全家每個星期天早上都去教堂。

exampleEn: Before clocks were invented, people used a sundial to tell time.
exampleZh: 在發明時鐘之前，人們使用日晷來計時。

exampleEn: The sunflower turns its head to follow the sun across the sky.
exampleZh: 向日葵轉過頭跟隨天空中的太陽。

exampleEn: He wore sunglasses to protect his eyes from the bright sunlight.
exampleZh: 他戴著墨鏡保護眼睛免受強烈陽光的傷害。

exampleEn: Plants need sunlight and water to grow and stay healthy.
exampleZh: 植物需要陽光和水才能生長並保持健康。

exampleEn: It was a sunny day, perfect for a picnic in the park.
exampleZh: 這是一個陽光明媚的日子，非常適合在公園野餐。

exampleEn: We got up early to watch the beautiful sunrise over the ocean.
exampleZh: 我們早起觀看海上美麗的日出。

exampleEn: The sky turned red and orange during the spectacular sunset.
exampleZh: 在壯觀的日落期間，天空變成了紅色和橙色。

exampleEn: The warm sunshine made everyone feel happy and full of energy.
exampleZh: 溫暖的陽光讓每個人都感到快樂和充滿活力。

exampleEn: She did a super job on the project and got an A.
exampleZh: 她在這個專案上做得很好，得了 A。

exampleEn: The food at the restaurant was superb, the best I've ever had.
exampleZh: 餐廳的食物很棒，是我吃過最好的。

exampleEn: The building superintendent is responsible for maintenance and repairs.
exampleZh: 大樓管理員負責維護和維修。

exampleEn: This product is superior to the others in terms of quality.
exampleZh: 該產品在質量方面優於其他產品。

exampleEn: In grammar, 'best' is the superlative form of the adjective 'good'.
exampleZh: 在語法中，'best' 是形容詞 'good' 的最高級形式。

exampleEn: I go to the supermarket once a week to buy groceries.
exampleZh: 我每週去一次超市買雜貨。

exampleEn: She believes in ghosts and other supernatural beings that exist.
exampleZh: 她相信鬼魂和其他存在的超自然生物。

exampleEn: The singer became a global superstar after her first album release.
exampleZh: 這位歌手在首張專輯發行後成為了全球超級巨星。

exampleEn: It is a common superstition that breaking a mirror brings bad luck.
exampleZh: 打破鏡子會帶來厄運是一個普遍的迷信。

exampleEn: The teacher had to supervise the students during the exam strictly.
exampleZh: 老師必須在考試期間嚴格監督學生。

exampleEn: Children should not swim without adult supervision for safety reasons.
exampleZh: 出於安全原因，兒童不應在沒有成人監督的情況下游泳。

exampleEn: My supervisor gave me some helpful feedback on my work performance.
exampleZh: 我的主管對我的工作表現提供了一些有益的反饋。

exampleEn: We usually have a light supper in the evening around seven.
exampleZh: 我們通常在晚上七點左右吃一頓便餐。

exampleEn: He takes a vitamin supplement every day to stay healthy.
exampleZh: 他每天服用維生素補充劑以保持健康。

exampleEn: We need to find a new supplier for our raw materials.
exampleZh: 我們需要為我們的原材料尋找新的供應商。

exampleEn: The water supply was cut off due to a burst pipe.
exampleZh: 由於水管爆裂，供水被切斷。

exampleEn: I will always support you in whatever you choose to do.
exampleZh: 無論你選擇做什麼，我都會永遠支持你。

exampleEn: He is a strong supporter of environmental protection and recycling.
exampleZh: 他是環境保護和回收利用的堅定支持者。

exampleEn: Her family was very supportive when she decided to change careers.
exampleZh: 當她決定轉行時，她的家人非常支持。

exampleEn: I suppose you are right about the answer, but I'm not sure.
exampleZh: 我想你的答案是對的，但我不太確定。

exampleEn: Supposedly, this is the best restaurant in town, according to reviews.
exampleZh: 根據評論，據說是鎮上最好的餐廳。

exampleEn: He tried to suppress a yawn during the boring meeting.
exampleZh: 在無聊的會議期間，他試圖忍住打哈欠。

exampleEn: Are you sure that you locked the door before we left?
exampleZh: 你確定我們離開前你鎖門了嗎？

exampleEn: Surely you can't be serious about quitting your job now.
exampleZh: 你現在肯定不是真的想辭職吧。

exampleEn: He likes to surf the internet for news and information daily.
exampleZh: 他喜歡每天上網瀏覽新聞和資訊。

exampleEn: The surface of the lake was calm and smooth like glass.
exampleZh: 湖面平靜光滑如鏡。

exampleEn: Surfing is a popular sport on the beaches of California coast.
exampleZh: 衝浪是加利福尼亞海岸海灘上的一項流行運動。

exampleEn: There was a sudden surge in electricity that damaged the computer.
exampleZh: 電力突然激增損壞了電腦。

exampleEn: The surgeon performed a complex heart operation on the patient.
exampleZh: 外科醫生對病人進行了複雜的心臟手術。

exampleEn: She is recovering from knee surgery and needs to rest for weeks.
exampleZh: 她正在從膝蓋手術中恢復，需要休息幾週。

exampleEn: Please write your first name and surname on the form.
exampleZh: 請在表格上寫下您的名字和姓氏。

exampleEn: The party was a complete surprise; I had no idea about it.
exampleZh: 這場派對完全是個驚喜；我對此一無所知。

exampleEn: I was surprised to see him at the party because he hates crowds.
exampleZh: 我很驚訝在派對上看到他，因為他討厭人群。

exampleEn: It is surprising how much he has changed in just one year.
exampleZh: 僅僅一年時間他的變化如此之大，令人驚訝。

exampleEn: Surprisingly, the cheap hotel was actually very clean and comfortable.
exampleZh: 令人驚訝的是，這家便宜的飯店實際上非常乾淨舒適。

exampleEn: The army had to surrender after running out of ammunition and food.
exampleZh: 耗盡彈藥和食物後，軍隊不得不投降。

exampleEn: High walls surround the castle to protect it from attackers.
exampleZh: 高牆環繞著城堡以保護其免受攻擊者的侵害。

exampleEn: The surrounding countryside is beautiful with rolling hills and green fields.
exampleZh: 周圍的鄉村很美，有起伏的山丘和綠色的田野。

exampleEn: Animals adapt to their surroundings in order to survive in nature.
exampleZh: 動物適應周圍環境是為了在自然界中生存。

exampleEn: The bank is under 24-hour video surveillance for security reasons.
exampleZh: 出於安全原因，銀行受到 24 小時視頻監控。

exampleEn: We conducted a survey to find out what customers want.
exampleZh: 我們進行了一項調查以找出客戶想要什麼。

exampleEn: Water is essential for the survival of all living things on Earth.
exampleZh: 水對地球上所有生物的生存至關重要。

exampleEn: Camels can survive in the desert for days without drinking water.
exampleZh: 駱駝可以在沙漠中生存數天不喝水。

exampleEn: She is the sole survivor of the plane crash that killed everyone else.
exampleZh: 她是造成其他人死亡的飛機失事中的唯一倖存者。

exampleEn: The police suspect that he was involved in the robbery last night.
exampleZh: 警方懷疑他參與了昨晚的搶劫案。

exampleEn: The school decided to suspend the student for fighting in class.
exampleZh: 學校決定因在課堂上打架而讓該學生停學。

exampleEn: He looked at the stranger with suspicion, wondering what he wanted.
exampleZh: 他懷疑地看著陌生人，想知道他想要什麼。

exampleEn: There is a suspicious car parked outside the house for hours.
exampleZh: 有一輛可疑的車停在房子外面好幾個小時了。

exampleEn: The man was acting suspiciously, looking over his shoulder constantly.
exampleZh: 那個人舉止可疑，不斷地回頭看。

exampleEn: We need food and water to sustain life and energy levels.
exampleZh: 我們需要食物和水來維持生命和能量水平。

exampleEn: Chew your food well before you try to swallow it down.
exampleZh: 在你試圖吞嚥之前，好好咀嚼你的食物。

exampleEn: A graceful white swan swam across the lake silently.
exampleZh: 一隻優雅的白天鵝靜靜地游過湖面。

exampleEn: A swarm of bees flew around the hive in the garden.
exampleZh: 一群蜜蜂在花園裡的蜂箱周圍飛來飛去。

exampleEn: I swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, and nothing else.
exampleZh: 我發誓說實話，全部實話，別無其他。

exampleEn: He wiped the sweat from his forehead after the long run.
exampleZh: 長跑後他擦去了額頭上的汗水。

exampleEn: She wore a warm wool sweater on the cold winter day.
exampleZh: 在寒冷的冬日，她穿了一件溫暖的羊毛衫。

exampleEn: He put on a hooded sweatshirt to go for a jog outside.
exampleZh: 他穿上一件連帽運動衫去外面慢跑。

exampleEn: I need to sweep the floor because it is covered in dust.
exampleZh: 我需要掃地，因為地板上滿是灰塵。

exampleEn: This apple is very sweet and juicy, perfect for a snack.
exampleZh: 這個蘋果非常甜且多汁，非常適合作為零食。

exampleEn: He bought flowers for his sweetheart on Valentine's Day.
exampleZh: 他在情人節為他的愛人買了花。

exampleEn: His ankle began to swell after he twisted it playing soccer.
exampleZh: 踢足球扭傷後，他的腳踝開始腫脹。

exampleEn: The cheetah is a swift runner, capable of high speeds.
exampleZh: 獵豹是一種快速的奔跑者，能夠高速奔跑。

exampleEn: I learned to swim when I was five years old.
exampleZh: 我五歲時學會了游泳。

exampleEn: She is a strong swimmer and competes in national championships.
exampleZh: 她是一名強壯的游泳運動員，參基全國錦標賽。

exampleEn: Swimming is a great exercise for the whole body and mind.
exampleZh: 游泳對身心都是極好的鍛鍊。

exampleEn: Don't forget to pack your swimming costume for the beach trip.
exampleZh: 去海灘旅行別忘了帶上你的泳衣。

exampleEn: We have a swimming pool in our backyard for hot summer days.
exampleZh: 我們後院有一個游泳池，適合炎熱的夏天。

exampleEn: She bought a new swimsuit for her vacation in Hawaii.
exampleZh: 她為夏威夷度假買了一件新泳衣。

exampleEn: The children love to play on the swing in the park.
exampleZh: 孩子們喜歡在公園裡盪鞦韆。

exampleEn: Please switch off the lights when you leave the room.
exampleZh: 離開房間時請關燈。

exampleEn: Her eyes were swollen from crying all night long.
exampleZh: 她的眼睛因為哭了一整晚而腫了。

exampleEn: The knight drew his sword to defend the king from enemies.
exampleZh: 騎士拔劍保護國王免受敵人的傷害。

exampleEn: The word 'banana' has three syllables: ba-na-na.
exampleZh: 單詞 'banana' 有三個音節：ba-na-na。

exampleEn: The dove is a universal symbol of peace and hope.
exampleZh: 鴿子是和平與希望的普遍象徵。

exampleEn: The lighting of the candle was symbolic of hope for the future.
exampleZh: 點燃蠟燭象徵著對未來的希望。

exampleEn: She was very sympathetic when I told her about my problems.
exampleZh: 當我告訴她我的問題時，她非常同情。

exampleEn: I can sympathize with your situation because I have been there too.
exampleZh: 我能同情你的處境，因為我也經歷過。

exampleEn: He felt deep sympathy for the homeless people on the street.
exampleZh: 他對街上的無家可歸者深表同情。

exampleEn: Beethoven's Ninth Symphony is a masterpiece of classical music.
exampleZh: 貝多芬的第九交響曲是古典音樂的傑作。

exampleEn: Fever is a common symptom of the flu and other infections.
exampleZh: 發燒是流感和其他感染的常見症狀。

exampleEn: Down syndrome is a genetic condition that affects development.
exampleZh: 唐氏症是一種影響發育的遺傳病。

exampleEn: 'Happy' is a synonym for 'joyful' because they mean similar things.
exampleZh: 'Happy' 是 'joyful' 的同義詞，因為它們的意思相似。

exampleEn: The digestive system breaks down food into nutrients for the body.
exampleZh: 消化系統將食物分解成身體所需的營養。

exampleEn: We need a systematic approach to solve this complex problem efficiently.
exampleZh: 我們需要一種系統的方法來有效地解決這個複雜的問題。

exampleEn: Please clear the table after dinner and put the dishes away.
exampleZh: 晚飯後請清理桌子並把盤子收好。

exampleEn: We played a game of table tennis in the recreation room.
exampleZh: 我們在娛樂室打了一場乒乓球。

exampleEn: She put a clean white tablecloth on the dining table.
exampleZh: 她在餐桌上鋪了一塊乾淨的白色桌布。

exampleEn: Add one tablespoon of olive oil to the salad dressing.
exampleZh: 在沙拉醬中加入一湯匙橄欖油。

exampleEn: He uses his tablet to read e-books and watch movies.
exampleZh: 他用平板電腦看電子書和看電影。

exampleEn: The tabloid newspaper is full of celebrity gossip and scandals.
exampleZh: 小報上滿是名人八卦和醜聞。

exampleEn: She used a tack to pin the poster to the wall.
exampleZh: 她用圖釘把海報釘在牆上。

exampleEn: The football player made a great tackle to stop the opponent.
exampleZh: 足球運動員做了一個精彩的鏟球來阻止對手。

exampleEn: Blind people rely on their tactile sense to read Braille.
exampleZh: 盲人依靠觸覺閱讀盲文。

exampleEn: The price tag says that this shirt costs twenty dollars.
exampleZh: 價格標籤上說這件襯衫二十美元。

exampleEn: The dog wagged its tail happily when its owner came home.
exampleZh: 當主人回家時，狗高興地搖著尾巴。

exampleEn: Please take this medicine three times a day after meals.
exampleZh: 請在飯後每天服用這種藥三次。

exampleEn: We ordered Chinese takeaway for dinner because we didn't want to cook.
exampleZh: 我們晚餐點了中餐外賣，因為我們不想做飯。

exampleEn: The plane's takeoff was smooth and we were in the air quickly.
exampleZh: 飛機起飛很順利，我們很快就升空了。

exampleEn: She told us a fairy tale about a princess and a dragon.
exampleZh: 她給我們講了一個關於公主和龍的童話故事。

exampleEn: She has a natural talent for playing the piano beautifully.
exampleZh: 她有彈鋼琴的天賦，彈得很美。

exampleEn: He is a talented artist who can draw anything he sees.
exampleZh: 他是一位才華橫溢的藝術家，可以畫出他看到的任何東西。

exampleEn: We need to talk about the plans for the upcoming holiday.
exampleZh: 我們需要談談即將到來的假期計畫。

exampleEn: She is a very talkative person and loves to chat with everyone.
exampleZh: 她是一個非常健談的人，喜歡和每個人聊天。

exampleEn: He is very tall and can easily reach the top shelf.
exampleZh: 他很高，可以輕鬆夠到頂層架子。

exampleEn: The lion in the circus was tame and did tricks for food.
exampleZh: 馬戲團裡的獅子很溫順，為了食物表演雜技。

exampleEn: She got a nice tan after spending a week at the beach.
exampleZh: 在海灘度過一週後，她曬成了漂亮的古銅色。

exampleEn: Fill the gas tank before we start our long road trip.
exampleZh: 在我們開始長途公路旅行之前把油箱加滿。

exampleEn: His skin was tanned from working outdoors in the sun all summer.
exampleZh: 他的皮膚因為整個夏天都在戶外陽光下工作而曬黑了。

exampleEn: Please turn off the tap tightly to stop the water dripping.
exampleZh: 請關緊水龍頭以停止滴水。

exampleEn: Use some sticky tape to wrap the birthday present securely.
exampleZh: 用一些膠帶把生日禮物包好。

exampleEn: Our target is to increase sales by ten percent this year.
exampleZh: 我們的目標是今年將銷售額增加百分之十。

exampleEn: Completing this task will require a lot of time and effort.
exampleZh: 完成這項任務需要大量的時間和精力。

exampleEn: This soup has a delicious taste of chicken and fresh herbs.
exampleZh: 這湯有雞肉和新鮮香草的美味。

exampleEn: The food was bland and tasteless without any salt or spices.
exampleZh: 沒有鹽或香料，食物平淡無味。

exampleEn: The homemade apple pie was very tasty and everyone wanted more.
exampleZh: 自製的蘋果派非常好吃，大家都想要更多。

exampleEn: The old flag was in tatters after the strong storm winds.
exampleZh: 強烈風暴過後，舊旗幟破爛不堪。

exampleEn: He has a tattoo of a dragon on his left arm.
exampleZh: 他的左臂上有一個龍的紋身。

exampleEn: Other children used to taunt him about his glasses at school.
exampleZh: 其他孩子過去常在學校嘲笑他的眼鏡。

exampleEn: We have to pay income tax on the money we earn.
exampleZh: 我們必須對我們賺的錢繳納所得稅。

exampleEn: We took a taxi to the airport because we were running late.
exampleZh: 我們坐計程車去機場，因為我們快遲到了。

exampleEn: Would you like a cup of tea with milk and sugar?
exampleZh: 你想來一杯加牛奶和糖的茶嗎？

exampleEn: She loves to teach English to young children in primary school.
exampleZh: 她喜歡在小學教幼兒英語。

exampleEn: Our math teacher explains difficult concepts very clearly to us.
exampleZh: 我們的數學老師向我們非常清楚地解釋複雜的概念。

exampleEn: Teaching is a rewarding profession that shapes the future generation.
exampleZh: 教學是一個塑造下一代的有益職業。

exampleEn: Our football team won the championship game last weekend.
exampleZh: 我們的足球隊上週末贏得了冠軍賽。

exampleEn: He passed the ball to his teammate who scored the winning goal.
exampleZh: 他把球傳給隊友，隊友射進了制勝一球。

exampleEn: Teamwork is essential for the success of any group project.
exampleZh: 團隊合作對於任何小組專案的成功都至關重要。

exampleEn: A tear rolled down her cheek as she watched the sad movie.
exampleZh: 看著這部悲傷的電影，一滴眼淚順著她的臉頰滾落。

exampleEn: Don't tease your little brother; it hurts his feelings.
exampleZh: 不要戲弄你的弟弟；這會傷害他的感情。

exampleEn: Add one teaspoon of sugar to the coffee for a little sweetness.
exampleZh: 在咖啡中加入一茶匙糖，增加一點甜味。

exampleEn: The project was delayed due to some unforeseen technical difficulties.
exampleZh: 由於一些無法預見的技術困難，專案被推遲了。

exampleEn: Technically, you are right, but in practice, it works differently.
exampleZh: 嚴格來說，你是對的，但在實踐中，它的運作方式不同。

exampleEn: He uses a special technique to paint with watercolors effectively.
exampleZh: 他使用一種特殊的技巧有效地用水彩畫畫。

exampleEn: Technological advancements have changed our lives in many ways.
exampleZh: 技術進步在許多方面改變了我們的生活。

exampleEn: Modern technology makes it easier to communicate with people globally.
exampleZh: 現代技術使與全球各地的人交流變得更加容易。

exampleEn: As a teen, she loved listening to pop music and dancing.
exampleZh: 作為一名青少年，她喜歡聽流行音樂和跳舞。

exampleEn: Teenage years can be a difficult time of change and growth.
exampleZh: 青少年時期可能是一個充滿變化和成長的困難時期。

exampleEn: The teenager spent hours on his phone texting his friends.
exampleZh: 這名青少年花了幾個小時用手機給朋友發簡訊。

exampleEn: The telecommunications industry connects people all over the world.
exampleZh: 電信行業連接世界各地的人們。

exampleEn: Before email, people sent a telegram for urgent messages.
exampleZh: 在電子郵件出現之前，人們發送電報傳遞緊急訊息。

exampleEn: Please answer the telephone; it has been ringing for a while.
exampleZh: 請接電話；已經響了一會兒了。

exampleEn: He used a telescope to look at the craters on the moon.
exampleZh: 他用望遠鏡觀察月球上的隕石坑。

exampleEn: We watched the news on television to see what was happening.
exampleZh: 我們在電視上看新聞，看看發生了什麼事。

exampleEn: Can you tell me a story before I go to sleep?
exampleZh: 我睡覺前你能給我講個故事嗎？

exampleEn: The bank teller counted the money and gave me a receipt.
exampleZh: 銀行出納員數了錢並給了我收據。

exampleEn: He has a bad temper and gets angry very easily.
exampleZh: 他脾氣暴躁，很容易生氣。

exampleEn: The region has a temperate climate with mild summers and winters.
exampleZh: 該地區氣候溫和，夏季和冬季氣候溫和。

exampleEn: The temperature dropped below freezing last night, bringing snow.
exampleZh: 昨晚氣溫降至冰點以下，帶來了雪。

exampleEn: People went to the temple to pray and offer incense.
exampleZh: 人們去寺廟祈禱和上香。

exampleEn: The shop is temporarily closed for renovations but will reopen soon.
exampleZh: 這家商店暫時關閉進行裝修，但很快就會重新營業。

exampleEn: This is just a temporary solution until we find a permanent one.
exampleZh: 這只是一個臨時解決方案，直到我們找到永久解決方案。

exampleEn: Don't tempt me with that cake; I'm on a diet.
exampleZh: 別用那個蛋糕誘惑我；我在節食。

exampleEn: He resisted the temptation to eat the chocolate before dinner.
exampleZh: 他忍住了晚飯前吃巧克力的誘惑。

exampleEn: I have ten fingers on my hands and ten toes.
exampleZh: 我的手上有十個手指，腳上有十個腳趾。

exampleEn: She tends to get nervous before big exams or presentations.
exampleZh: 在大型考試或演講之前，她往往會感到緊張。

exampleEn: He has a tendency to be late for meetings if not reminded.
exampleZh: 如果不提醒，他開會往往會遲到。

exampleEn: The meat was cooked until it was tender and falling off the bone.
exampleZh: 肉煮得很爛，骨肉分離。

exampleEn: She kissed her baby tenderly on the forehead before putting him to sleep.
exampleZh: 她在哄寶寶睡覺前溫柔地吻了他的額頭。

exampleEn: He spoke with great tenderness about his late wife and their life together.
exampleZh: 他帶著極大的溫柔談到了他已故的妻子和他們在一起的生活。

exampleEn: We play tennis every Saturday morning at the local sports club.
exampleZh: 我們每週六早上在當地的體育俱樂部打網球。

exampleEn: The atmosphere in the room was tense as we waited for the news.
exampleZh: 在我們等待消息時，房間裡的氣氛很緊張。

exampleEn: There is a lot of tension between the two countries right now.
exampleZh: 目前兩國之間存在很多緊張關係。

exampleEn: We pitched our tent near the river and built a campfire.
exampleZh: 我們在河邊搭起帳篷，生起營火。

exampleEn: The president serves a four-year term in office before the next election.
exampleZh: 總統在下次選舉前任職四年。

exampleEn: The flight departs from Terminal 3 at the international airport.
exampleZh: 航班從國際機場 3 號航站樓起飛。

exampleEn: We sat on the terrace enjoying the view of the ocean sunset.
exampleZh: 我們坐在露台上欣賞海邊日落的景色。

exampleEn: I have a terrible headache and need to lie down for a while.
exampleZh: 我頭痛欲裂，需要躺一會兒。

exampleEn: I am terribly sorry for breaking your favorite vase by accident.
exampleZh: 非常抱歉不小心打碎了你最喜歡的花瓶。

exampleEn: He did a terrific job on the project and received a promotion.
exampleZh: 他在這個專案上做得非常出色，並獲得了晉升。

exampleEn: The child was terrified of the dark and needed a nightlight.
exampleZh: 孩子害怕黑暗，需要一盞夜燈。

exampleEn: The loud thunder seemed to terrify the poor dog completely.
exampleZh: 巨大的雷聲似乎把這隻可憐的狗嚇壞了。

exampleEn: It was a terrifying experience to be stuck in the elevator for hours.
exampleZh: 被困在電梯裡幾個小時是一次可怕的經歷。

exampleEn: Wolves mark their territory to warn other packs to stay away.
exampleZh: 狼標記自己的領地以警告其他狼群遠離。

exampleEn: She screamed in terror when she saw the ghost in the haunted house.
exampleZh: 當她在鬼屋裡看到鬼時，她驚恐地尖叫起來。

exampleEn: Governments around the world are working together to fight against terrorism.
exampleZh: 世界各國政府正在共同努力打擊恐怖主義。

exampleEn: The terrorist attack caused widespread panic and fear in the city.
exampleZh: 恐怖襲擊在該市引起了廣泛的恐慌和恐懼。

exampleEn: I have a math test tomorrow, so I need to study tonight.
exampleZh: 我明天有數學考試，所以我今晚需要學習。

exampleEn: The witness was called to testify in court about what he saw.
exampleZh: 證人被傳喚出庭作證，講述他所看到的情況。

exampleEn: Her testimony was crucial in proving the defendant's innocence in the trial.
exampleZh: 她的證詞對於證明被告在審判中的清白至關重要。

exampleEn: Please send me a text when you arrive safely at home.
exampleZh: 當你安全到家時，請給我發簡訊。

exampleEn: I received a text message from my friend inviting me to lunch.
exampleZh: 我收到了朋友的簡訊，邀請我吃午飯。

exampleEn: Open your textbook to page fifty and read the first paragraph.
exampleZh: 把教科書翻到第五十頁，閱讀第一段。

exampleEn: I am taller than my brother, but he is stronger than me.
exampleZh: 我比我哥哥高，但他比我強壯。

exampleEn: I want to thank you for all your help and support recently.
exampleZh: 我想感謝你最近所有的幫助和支持。

exampleEn: I am thankful for my family and friends who always support me.
exampleZh: 我很感謝我的家人和朋友一直支持我。

exampleEn: Thanks for the ride home; I really appreciate it.
exampleZh: 謝謝你載我回家；我很感激。

exampleEn: Is that the book you were telling me about yesterday?
exampleZh: 那是你昨天告訴我的那一本書嗎？

exampleEn: The sun is shining brightly in the sky today.
exampleZh: 今天太陽在天空中明亮地照耀著。

exampleEn: We went to the theater to see a new play last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚我們去劇院看了一齣新戲。

exampleEn: He was arrested for the theft of a car from the parking lot.
exampleZh: 他因從停車場偷竊汽車而被捕。

exampleEn: They parked their car in the driveway and went inside the house.
exampleZh: 他們把車停在車道上，走進屋子。

exampleEn: That house on the corner is theirs; they moved in last week.
exampleZh: 拐角處的那棟房子是他們的；他們上週搬進去了。

exampleEn: I gave them the keys so they could let themselves in.
exampleZh: 我把鑰匙給了他們，這樣他們就可以自己進去了。

exampleEn: The theme of the party is 'Under the Sea', so dress up.
exampleZh: 派對的主題是“海底世界”，所以打扮一下。

exampleEn: They enjoyed themselves at the amusement park and rode all the rides.
exampleZh: 他們在遊樂園玩得很開心，坐了所有的遊樂設施。

exampleEn: First we will eat dinner, and then we will watch a movie.
exampleZh: 首先我們吃晚飯，然後我們看電影。

exampleEn: The political theorist wrote a book about democracy and freedom.
exampleZh: 政治理論家寫了一本關於民主和自由的書。

exampleEn: Darwin's theory of evolution explains how species change over time.
exampleZh: 達爾文的進化論解釋了物種如何隨時間變化。

exampleEn: She sees a therapist once a week to talk about her anxiety.
exampleZh: 她每週看一次治療師，談論她的焦慮。

exampleEn: Physical therapy helped him recover from his knee injury quickly.
exampleZh: 物理治療幫助他從膝蓋受傷中快速康復。

exampleEn: Put the box over there on the table, please.
exampleZh: 請把盒子放在那邊的桌子上。

exampleEn: He moved to France in 2010 and lived there happily thereafter.
exampleZh: 他於 2010 年移居法國，此後在那裡幸福地生活。

exampleEn: I was ill, and therefore I could not come to work today.
exampleZh: 我病了，因此今天不能來上班。

exampleEn: The nurse used a thermometer to check my temperature.
exampleZh: 護士用體溫計檢查我的體溫。

exampleEn: These apples are delicious; you should try one yourself.
exampleZh: 這些蘋果很好吃；你應該自己嘗一個。

exampleEn: She is writing her master's thesis on climate change effects.
exampleZh: 她正在寫關於氣候變化影響的碩士論文。

exampleEn: They are going to the cinema tonight to watch a movie.
exampleZh: 他們今晚要去電影院看電影。

exampleEn: The fog was so thick that we couldn't see the road ahead.
exampleZh: 霧太濃了，我們看不清前面的路。

exampleEn: The bread was thickly sliced and toasted for breakfast.
exampleZh: 麵包被切成厚片並烤過作為早餐。

exampleEn: The ice has a thickness of two inches, so it's not safe.
exampleZh: 冰的厚度為兩英寸，所以不安全。

exampleEn: The thief stole her purse while she wasn't looking.
exampleZh: 小偷趁她不注意偷了她的錢包。

exampleEn: He pulled a muscle in his thigh while running the race.
exampleZh: 他在跑步比賽時拉傷了大腿肌肉。

exampleEn: She is very thin because she exercises a lot and eats healthy.
exampleZh: 她很瘦，因為她經常運動並且飲食健康。

exampleEn: What is that thing on the table over there?
exampleZh: 那邊桌子上的那個東西是什麼？

exampleEn: I think it is going to rain, so take an umbrella.
exampleZh: 我想天要下雨了，帶把傘吧。

exampleEn: He is a deep thinker who likes to ponder life's big questions.
exampleZh: 他是一個深刻的思想家，喜歡思考生活中的大問題。

exampleEn: This is the third time I have called you today.
exampleZh: 這是我今天第三次給你打電話。

exampleEn: The story is written in the third person, using 'he' and 'she'.
exampleZh: 這個故事是用第三人稱寫的，使用 'he' 和 'she'。

exampleEn: Thirdly, we must consider the cost of the project carefully.
exampleZh: 第三，我們必須仔細考慮專案的成本。

exampleEn: He drank a glass of water to quench his thirst after running.
exampleZh: 跑步後他喝了一杯水解渴。

exampleEn: I am very thirsty; can I have a glass of water please?
exampleZh: 我很渴；請給我一杯水好嗎？

exampleEn: She will turn thirteen next month and become a teenager.
exampleZh: 下個月她將年滿十三歲，成為一名青少年。

exampleEn: There are thirty days in the month of June.
exampleZh: 六月有三十天。

exampleEn: This is my favorite book; I have read it many times.
exampleZh: 這是我最喜歡的書；我讀過很多遍了。

exampleEn: The police conducted a thorough search of the house for clues.
exampleZh: 警方對這所房子進行了徹底搜查以尋找線索。

exampleEn: I enjoyed the movie thoroughly and would recommend it to anyone.
exampleZh: 我非常喜歡這部電影，並將其推薦給任何人。

exampleEn: Those shoes are too expensive; I can't afford them right now.
exampleZh: 那雙鞋太貴了；我現在買不起。

exampleEn: He went to work even though he was feeling sick.
exampleZh: 即使他感覺不舒服，他還是去上班了。

exampleEn: I had a thought about how we can solve this problem effectively.
exampleZh: 我有一個關於我們如何有效地解決這個問題的想法。

exampleEn: It was very thoughtful of you to bring me flowers when I was sick.
exampleZh: 我生病時你給我送花真是太體貼了。

exampleEn: It was thoughtless of him to make such a rude comment publicly.
exampleZh: 他公開發表如此粗魯的評論真是欠考慮。

exampleEn: There were over a thousand people at the concert last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚的音樂會有超過一千人。

exampleEn: She used a needle and thread to sew the button back on.
exampleZh: 她用針線把鈕扣縫回去。

exampleEn: Pollution poses a serious threat to the environment and wildlife.
exampleZh: 污染對環境和野生動物構成嚴重威脅。

exampleEn: He threatened to call the police if they didn't leave immediately.
exampleZh: 他威脅說如果他們不立即離開就報警。

exampleEn: The dark clouds look threatening; a storm is coming soon.
exampleZh: 烏雲看起來很險惡；暴風雨即將來臨。

exampleEn: I have three brothers and two sisters in my family.
exampleZh: 我家有三個兄弟和兩個姐妹。

exampleEn: It was a thrill to ride the roller coaster for the first time.
exampleZh: 第一次坐過山車真是一種刺激。

exampleEn: She was thrilled to hear that she got the job she wanted.
exampleZh: 聽到她得到了想要的工作，她很高興。

exampleEn: We watched a suspenseful thriller movie that kept us on the edge.
exampleZh: 我們看了一部懸疑驚悚電影，讓我們緊張不已。

exampleEn: The football match ended in a thrilling penalty shootout victory.
exampleZh: 足球比賽以驚心動魄的點球大戰勝利結束。

exampleEn: My throat is sore, enabling me to swallow or speak properly.
exampleZh: 我的喉嚨痛，使我無法正確吞嚥或說話。

exampleEn: The train went through the tunnel and emerged on the other side.
exampleZh: 火車穿過隧道，從另一邊出來。

exampleEn: People throughout the country celebrated the national holiday together.
exampleZh: 全國各地的人們共同慶祝國慶節。

exampleEn: Don't throw trash on the ground; put it in the bin.
exampleZh: 不要把垃圾扔在地上；把它放在垃圾桶裡。

exampleEn: He gave a thumbs up to show that he agreed with the plan.
exampleZh: 他豎起大拇指表示同意這個計畫。

exampleEn: He hit the table with a loud thump to get everyone's attention.
exampleZh: 他重重地敲了一下桌子以引起大家的注意。

exampleEn: We heard the loud rumble of thunder before the rain started.
exampleZh: 雨開始前我們聽到了巨大的雷聲。

exampleEn: The audience gave the performers a thunderous applause at the end.
exampleZh: 最後觀眾給予表演者雷鳴般的掌聲。

exampleEn: The thunderstorm brought heavy rain and strong winds last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚的雷暴帶來了大雨和強風。

exampleEn: I have a dentist appointment on Thursday morning at ten o'clock.
exampleZh: 週四早上十點我有個牙醫預約。

exampleEn: He studied hard, and thus he passed the exam with high marks.
exampleZh: 他努力學習，因此以高分通過了考試。

exampleEn: Put a tick in the box if you agree to the terms.
exampleZh: 如果你同意這些條款，請在方框裡打勾。

exampleEn: I bought a ticket for the concert online yesterday.
exampleZh: 我昨天在網上買了一張音樂會的票。

exampleEn: The feather tickled her nose and made her sneeze loudly.
exampleZh: 羽毛弄癢了她的鼻子，讓她大聲打噴嚏。

exampleEn: The tide comes in and goes out twice a day at the beach.
exampleZh: 海灘上的潮水每天漲落兩次。

exampleEn: Please keep your room tidy and put your toys away.
exampleZh: 請保持房間整潔，把玩具收好。

exampleEn: He learned how to tie his shoelaces when he was five.
exampleZh: 他五歲時學會了繫鞋帶。

exampleEn: The tiger is a powerful predator that lives in the jungle.
exampleZh: 老虎是生活在叢林中的強大捕食者。

exampleEn: This shirt is too tight for me; I need a larger size.
exampleZh: 這件襯衫對我來說太緊了；我需要大一號的。

exampleEn: You need to tighten the screws on the chair so it doesn't wobble.
exampleZh: 你需要擰緊椅子上的螺絲，以免它晃動。

exampleEn: Hold on tightly to the handrail when you go down the stairs.
exampleZh: 下樓梯時緊緊抓住扶手。

exampleEn: The acrobat walked carefully across the tightrope high above crowd.
exampleZh: 雜技演員小心翼翼地走過人群上方的高空鋼絲。

exampleEn: She wore black tights under her skirt to keep her legs warm.
exampleZh: 她在裙子下面穿了黑色緊身褲以此保暖。

exampleEn: The bathroom floor is covered with blue and white ceramic tiles.
exampleZh: 浴室地板鋪著藍白相間的瓷磚。

exampleEn: Wait here till I come back; don't go anywhere else.
exampleZh: 在這裡等我回來；不要去別的地方。

exampleEn: What time is it? I don't want to be late for class.
exampleZh: 現在幾點了？我不想上課遲到。

exampleEn: The little black dress is a timeless fashion item for women.
exampleZh: 小黑裙是女性永恆的時尚單品。

exampleEn: We appreciate the timeliness of your response to our urgent request.
exampleZh: 我們感謝您對我們緊急請求的及時回應。

exampleEn: His timely intervention prevented the argument from turning into a fight.
exampleZh: 他的及時干預阻止了爭吵演變成打架。

exampleEn: I have told you a thousand times to clean your room.
exampleZh: 我已經告訴你一千次去打掃你的房間了。

exampleEn: Check the bus timetable to see when the next bus arrives.
exampleZh: 查看公車時刻表，看看下一班公車什麼時候到。

exampleEn: Good timing is essential when telling a joke to make it funny.
exampleZh: 講笑話時，好的時機對於使其有趣至關重要。

exampleEn: We opened a tin of beans to make a quick dinner.
exampleZh: 我們打開一罐豆子做了一頓快餐。

exampleEn: The baby has tiny hands and feet that are so cute.
exampleZh: 嬰兒的手腳很小，太可愛了。

exampleEn: The waiter gave us a good tip on what to order.
exampleZh: 服務員給了我們一個關於點什麼的好建議。

exampleEn: She walked on tiptoe so she wouldn't wake up the sleeping baby.
exampleZh: 她踮著腳尖走，以免吵醒熟睡的嬰兒。

exampleEn: The car got a flat tire on the highway, so we stopped.
exampleZh: 車在高速公路上爆胎了，所以我們停了下來。

exampleEn: I am very tired after working all day; I need some sleep.
exampleZh: 整天工作後我很累；我需要睡覺。

exampleEn: Her tiredness showed in the dark circles under her eyes.
exampleZh: 她的疲憊顯露在黑眼圈上。

exampleEn: The long journey was tiresome, but we finally reached our destination.
exampleZh: 長途旅行很累人，但我們終於到達了目的地。

exampleEn: It was a tiring day, but we accomplished a lot of work.
exampleZh: 這是累人的一天，但我們完成了很多工作。

exampleEn: She used a tissue to wipe her tears away during the movie.
exampleZh: 看電影時，她用紙巾擦去了眼淚。

exampleEn: The title of the book is 'The Great Gatsby'.
exampleZh: 這本書的書名是《大亨小傳》。

exampleEn: I am going to the store to buy some milk and bread.
exampleZh: 我要去商店買些牛奶和麵包。

exampleEn: We made a toast to the bride and groom at the wedding.
exampleZh: 我們在婚禮上向新郎新娘敬酒。

exampleEn: Smoking tobacco is harmful to your health and causes cancer.
exampleZh: 吸食菸草對健康有害並導致癌症。

exampleEn: Today is a beautiful day with clear blue skies and sunshine.
exampleZh: 今天是美好的一天，藍天白雲，陽光普照。

exampleEn: He stubbed his toe on the table leg and cried out in pain.
exampleZh: 他的腳趾撞到了桌腿，痛得大叫起來。

exampleEn: She painted her toenails red to match her new sandals.
exampleZh: 她把腳趾甲塗成紅色以搭配她的新涼鞋。

exampleEn: We worked together on the project and finished it on time.
exampleZh: 我們一起做這個專案並按時完成了它。

exampleEn: Farmers toil in the fields from sunrise to sunset every day.
exampleZh: 農民每天從日出到日落在田裡勞作。

exampleEn: Excuse me, where is the toilet? I need to use it.
exampleZh: 請問廁所在哪裡？我要去。

exampleEn: We should be tolerant of other people's beliefs and opinions.
exampleZh: 我們應該寬容他人的信仰和意見。

exampleEn: I cannot tolerate rude behavior in my classroom at any time.
exampleZh: 我任何時候都不能容忍在我的教室裡有粗魯的行為。

exampleEn: You have to pay a toll to use this highway bridge.
exampleZh: 使用這座公路橋必須支付通行費。

exampleEn: She sliced a ripe red tomato for the salad lunch.
exampleZh: 她切了一個成熟的紅番茄做午餐沙拉。

exampleEn: They visited the tomb of the unknown soldier to pay respects.
exampleZh: 他們參觀了無名戰士墓以示敬意。

exampleEn: I will see you tomorrow morning at the coffee shop.
exampleZh: 明天早上咖啡店見。

exampleEn: The elephant weighs over a ton, making it a heavy animal.
exampleZh: 大象重達一噸以上，是一種笨重的動物。

exampleEn: Don't speak to me in that tone of voice; it's disrespectful.
exampleZh: 不要用那種語氣跟我說話；這是不尊重的。

exampleEn: The doctor asked him to stick out his tongue for examination.
exampleZh: 醫生讓他伸出舌頭檢查。

exampleEn: We are going to a concert tonight to see our favorite band.
exampleZh: 我們今晚要去聽音樂會看我們最喜歡的樂隊。

exampleEn: This soup is too hot to eat right now; let it cool.
exampleZh: 這湯現在太熱了，不能吃；讓它涼一涼。

exampleEn: A hammer is a useful tool for driving nails into wood.
exampleZh: 錘子是將釘子釘入木頭的有用工具。

exampleEn: I have a loose tooth that feels like it will fall out.
exampleZh: 我有一顆鬆動的牙齒，感覺快要掉了。

exampleEn: He went to the dentist because he had a terrible toothache.
exampleZh: 他去看牙醫，因為他牙痛得很厲害。

exampleEn: You should change your toothbrush every three months for hygiene.
exampleZh: 為了衛生，你應該每三個月更換一次牙刷。

exampleEn: Squeeze some toothpaste onto your toothbrush before brushing.
exampleZh: 刷牙前在牙刷上擠一些牙膏。

exampleEn: He climbed to the top of the mountain and enjoyed the view.
exampleZh: 他爬上山頂欣賞風景。

exampleEn: The topic of today's lesson is global warming and climate change.
exampleZh: 今天課的主題是全球變暖和氣候變化。

exampleEn: He used a torch to see in the dark cave underground.
exampleZh: 他用手電筒在地下黑暗的洞穴裡看東西。

exampleEn: The tornado destroyed many houses in the town with its strong winds.
exampleZh: 龍捲風以其強風摧毀了鎮上的許多房屋。

exampleEn: The cat has a beautiful tortoiseshell coat of many colors mixed.
exampleZh: 貓有一件美麗的玳瑁色外套，混合了多種顏色。

exampleEn: Waiting for the exam results was pure torture for the students.
exampleZh: 等待考試結果對學生來說純粹是折磨。

exampleEn: Let's toss a coin to decide who goes first in the game.
exampleZh: 讓我們扔硬幣決定誰在遊戲中先走。

exampleEn: The total cost of the trip was more than we expected.
exampleZh: 旅行的總費用比我們預期的要多。

exampleEn: I totally agree with your opinion on this matter completely.
exampleZh: 我完全同意你對這件事的看法。

exampleEn: Don't touch the wet paint on the wall; it's still drying.
exampleZh: 不要觸摸牆上未乾的油漆；它還在幹。

exampleEn: The exam was very tough, but I think I passed it.
exampleZh: 考試很難，但我想我通過了。

exampleEn: We took a guided tour of the city's historic landmarks.
exampleZh: 我們在導遊的帶領下參觀了城市的歷史地標。

exampleEn: The tour guide explained the history of the castle to us.
exampleZh: 導遊向我們解釋了城堡的歷史。

exampleEn: Tourism is a major industry in this country, attracting many visitors.
exampleZh: 旅遊業是這個支柱產業，吸引了許多遊客。

exampleEn: The tourist took photos of the famous monument with his camera.
exampleZh: 遊客用相機拍下了這座著名紀念碑的照片。

exampleEn: Our team participated in a football tournament and won first place.
exampleZh: 我們的球隊參加了足球錦標賽並獲得了第一名。

exampleEn: She walked towards the door to greet her guests warmly.
exampleZh: 她走向門口熱情地迎接客人。

exampleEn: Dry yourself with a towel after you get out of the shower.
exampleZh: 洗完澡後用毛巾擦乾。

exampleEn: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark in Paris, France.
exampleZh: 艾菲爾鐵塔是法國巴黎著名的地標。

exampleEn: I live in a small town where everyone knows each other.
exampleZh: 我住在一個每個人都互相認識的小鎮。

exampleEn: The factory released toxic chemicals into the river, polluting it.
exampleZh: 工廠將有毒化學物質排放到河流中，污染了河流。

exampleEn: The child played with his favorite toy car on the floor.
exampleZh: 孩子在地板上玩他最喜歡的玩具車。

exampleEn: The police found no trace of the missing person anywhere.
exampleZh: 警方到處都找不到失蹤人員的踪跡。

exampleEn: Follow the track through the woods to find the hidden cabin.
exampleZh: 沿著樹林裡的小路找到隱藏的小屋。

exampleEn: He wore a comfortable tracksuit for his morning jog around park.
exampleZh: 他穿著舒適的運動服在公園裡晨跑。

exampleEn: International trade helps countries exchange goods and services globally.
exampleZh: 國際貿易幫助各國在全球範圍內交換商品和服務。

exampleEn: The stock trader made a lot of money on the market today.
exampleZh: 股票交易員今天在市場上賺了很多錢。

exampleEn: It is a family tradition to have a big dinner on Christmas Eve.
exampleZh: 平安夜吃一頓豐盛的晚餐是家庭傳統。

exampleEn: She wore a traditional dress to the cultural festival celebration.
exampleZh: 她穿著傳統服飾參加文化節慶祝活動。

exampleEn: Traditionally, the bride wears a white dress on her wedding day.
exampleZh: 傳統上，新娘在婚禮當天穿白色連衣裙。

exampleEn: There was heavy traffic on the highway this morning during rush hour.
exampleZh: 今天早上尖峰時段高速公路交通擁堵。

exampleEn: We got stuck in a traffic jam and missed the movie start.
exampleZh: 我們遇到了交通堵塞，錯過了電影的開頭。

exampleEn: Wait for the traffic light to turn green before you cross.
exampleZh: 過馬路前等紅綠燈變綠。

exampleEn: The earthquake was a terrible tragedy that killed thousands of people.
exampleZh: 地震是一場可怕的悲劇，造成數千人死亡。

exampleEn: It was a tragic accident that took the lives of two young drivers.
exampleZh: 這是一場奪去兩名年輕司機生命的悲慘事故。

exampleEn: We hiked along the mountain trail to reach the summit.
exampleZh: 我們沿著山路徒步到達山頂。

exampleEn: We watched the trailer for the new movie and it looked exciting.
exampleZh: 我們看了新電影的預告片，看起來很精彩。

exampleEn: I take the train to work every morning to avoid traffic.
exampleZh: 我每天早上坐火車上班以避開交通。

exampleEn: The new trainee is learning how to use the company software.
exampleZh: 新實習生正在學習如何使用公司軟體。

exampleEn: My personal trainer helps me with my workout routine at gym.
exampleZh: 我的私人教練在健身房幫我做日常鍛鍊。

exampleEn: He is undergoing intense training for the upcoming olympic games.
exampleZh: 他正在為即將到來的奧運會進行高強度訓練。

exampleEn: Honesty is a character trait that is highly valued by everyone.
exampleZh: 誠實是一種受到大家高度重視的性格特徵。

exampleEn: He was branded a traitor for betraying his country's secrets.
exampleZh: 他因背叛國家機密而被烙上叛徒的烙印。

exampleEn: We took a tram through the city center to see the sights.
exampleZh: 我們乘電車穿過市中心看風景。

exampleEn: The tramp asked for some spare change to buy food.
exampleZh: 流浪漢要了一些零錢買食物。

exampleEn: Don't trample on the flowers in the garden; walk on the path.
exampleZh: 不要踐踏花園裡的花朵；走在小路上。

exampleEn: The university requires an official transcript of your high school grades.
exampleZh: 大學需要你高中成績的正式成績單。

exampleEn: She decided to transfer to a different school for better opportunities.
exampleZh: 她決定轉學到另一所學校以獲得更好的機會。

exampleEn: The caterpillar will eventually transform into a beautiful butterfly.
exampleZh: 毛毛蟲最終會變成美麗的蝴蝶。

exampleEn: The city has undergone a major transformation in recent years.
exampleZh: 這座城市近年來發生了重大轉變。

exampleEn: The patient needed a blood transfusion after the serious accident.
exampleZh: 嚴重事故後，病人需要輸血。

exampleEn: The transient nature of fashion means trends change very quickly.
exampleZh: 時尚的短暫性意味著潮流變化很快。

exampleEn: The invention of the transistor revolutionized the electronics industry.
exampleZh: 晶體管的發明徹底改變了電子工業。

exampleEn: The transition from student to employee can be challenging for many.
exampleZh: 從學生到員工的轉變對許多人來說可能具有挑戰性。

exampleEn: We are in a transitional period between the old and new systems.
exampleZh: 我們正處於新舊制度之間的過渡時期。

exampleEn: A transitive verb requires a direct object to complete its meaning.
exampleZh: 及物動詞需要一個直接賓語來完成其意義。

exampleEn: Can you translate this sentence from English to Spanish for me?
exampleZh: 你能幫我把這句話從英語翻譯成西班牙語嗎？

exampleEn: The translation of the poem lost some of its original beauty.
exampleZh: 這首詩的翻譯失去了一些原本的美感。

exampleEn: She works as a translator for the United Nations in Geneva.
exampleZh: 她在日內瓦聯合國擔任翻譯。

exampleEn: The transmission of the virus can be prevented by washing hands.
exampleZh: 勤洗手可以預防病毒的傳播。

exampleEn: Mosquitoes can transmit diseases like malaria to humans easily.
exampleZh: 蚊子很容易將瘧疾等疾病傳播給人類。

exampleEn: The glass is transparent, so you can see clearly through it.
exampleZh: 玻璃是透明的，所以你可以清楚地看透它。

exampleEn: We use trucks to transport goods from the factory to the store.
exampleZh: 我們用卡車將貨物從工廠運送到商店。

exampleEn: Public transportation in the city includes buses, trains, and subways.
exampleZh: 城市裡的公共運輸包括公車、火車和地鐵。

exampleEn: The mouse was caught in a trap that we set in the kitchen.
exampleZh: 老鼠被我們在廚房設的陷阱抓住了。

exampleEn: Please throw your trash in the bin and keep the park clean.
exampleZh: 請把垃圾扔進垃圾桶，保持公園清潔。

exampleEn: In the future, I want to travel around the world and see new places.
exampleZh: 將來，我想環遊世界，看看新的地方。

exampleEn: The travel agent helped us book our flight and hotel for the trip.
exampleZh: 旅行社幫我們預訂了旅行的機票和飯店。

exampleEn: The exhausted traveler rested at the inn before continuing his journey.
exampleZh: 疲憊的旅行者在繼續旅程之前在客棧休息。

exampleEn: Explorers had to traverse the dangerous jungle to reach the lost city.
exampleZh: 探險家必須穿越危險的叢林才能到達失落的城市。

exampleEn: The waiter carried a tray of drinks to our table carefully.
exampleZh: 服務員小心翼翼地把一托盤飲料端到我們的桌子上。

exampleEn: Be careful not to tread on the flowers when you walk in the garden.
exampleZh: 在花園裡走的時候小心不要踩到花。

exampleEn: The pirates buried their treasure on a deserted island long ago.
exampleZh: 海盜很久以前把他們的寶藏埋在一個荒島上。

exampleEn: I will treat you to dinner tonight to celebrate your birthday.
exampleZh: 今晚我請你吃晚飯來慶祝你的生日。

exampleEn: He is receiving treatment for his back pain at the hospital.
exampleZh: 他正在醫院接受背痛治療。

exampleEn: The two countries signed a peace treaty to end the long war.
exampleZh: 兩國簽署了和平條約以結束長期的戰爭。

exampleEn: We sat under the shade of a large oak tree to have our picnic.
exampleZh: 我們坐在大橡樹的樹蔭下野餐。

exampleEn: They went on a long trek through the mountains of Nepal.
exampleZh: 他們去尼泊爾山區進行了一次長途徒步旅行。

exampleEn: She began to tremble with cold as she waited for the bus in the snow.
exampleZh: 她在雪地裡等公車時開始冷得發抖。

exampleEn: The team put in a tremendous amount of effort to win the game.
exampleZh: 球隊付出了巨大的努力才贏得了比賽。

exampleEn: Prices have increased tremendously over the last few years.
exampleZh: 過去幾年價格大幅上漲。

exampleEn: We felt a slight tremor during the earthquake last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚地震時我們感到了輕微的震動。

exampleEn: There is a growing trend towards healthy eating and exercise.
exampleZh: 健康飲食和運動的趨勢越來越明顯。

exampleEn: The new drug is currently undergoing clinical trials on patients.
exampleZh: 這種新藥目前正在患者身上進行臨床試驗。

exampleEn: A triangle has three sides and three angles totaling 180 degrees.
exampleZh: 三角形有三個邊和三個角，總共 180 度。

exampleEn: The indigenous tribe lives in the rainforest and preserves its culture.
exampleZh: 土著部落生活在雨林中並保護其文化。

exampleEn: The magician performed a card trick that amazed the audience.
exampleZh: 魔術師表演了一個讓觀眾驚嘆的紙牌戲法。

exampleEn: This is a tricky problem that requires careful thought to solve.
exampleZh: 這是一個棘手的問題，需要仔細思考才能解決。

exampleEn: Certain smells can trigger memories from childhood unexpectedly.
exampleZh: 某些氣味會意外地引發童年的記憶。

exampleEn: I need to trim my hair because it is getting too long and messy.
exampleZh: 我需要修剪頭髮，因為它太長太亂了。

exampleEn: A trio of musicians played jazz music at the cafe last night.
exampleZh: 昨晚在咖啡館裡，三位音樂家演奏了爵士樂。

exampleEn: We are planning a trip to Italy for our summer vacation.
exampleZh: 我們正在計畫暑假去義大利旅行。

exampleEn: The victory was a great triumph for the team after years of loss.
exampleZh: 這場勝利是球隊多年失利後的巨大勝利。

exampleEn: Don't worry about trivial details; focus on the main problem.
exampleZh: 不要擔心瑣碎的細節；專注於主要問題。

exampleEn: She pushed the shopping trolley around the supermarket aisles.
exampleZh: 她推著購物車在超市過道裡轉。

exampleEn: The troop of soldiers marched in formation during the parade.
exampleZh: 閱兵式上，部隊列隊行進。

exampleEn: He proudly displayed the trophy he won on the shelf in his room.
exampleZh: 他自豪地把他贏得的獎盃陳列在他房間的架子上。

exampleEn: We went on a cruise to the warm waters of the tropic zone.
exampleZh: 我們乘遊輪去了熱帶地區溫暖的水域。

exampleEn: Bananas and pineapples are examples of tropical fruits we eat.
exampleZh: 香蕉和菠蘿是我們吃的熱帶水果的例子。

exampleEn: He got into trouble for not doing his homework on time.
exampleZh: 他因為沒有按時做作業而惹上了麻煩。

exampleEn: The mosquito bite was troublesome and itchy for several days.
exampleZh: 被蚊子咬後幾天都很麻煩和發癢。

exampleEn: He wore a pair of black trousers and a white shirt to work.
exampleZh: 他穿著一條黑色褲子和一件白色襯衫去上班。
